content: Zaaj ywgtoog kws Vaajtswv qha rua Amauxes tug tub Yaxayas, kuas nwg pum txug cov Yudas hab lub nroog Yeluxalees, thaus lub sijhawm kws Uxiyas, Yauthaas, Ahas hab Hexekiyas puab ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yudas.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb, ca le noog tej lug kws kuv has! Tej mivnyuas kws kuv yug hab tu hlub tau ntxeev sab rua kuv.

Nyuj paub has tas leejtwg yog nyuj tug tswv, hab neeg luav paub has tas lub dlaab zaub kws tug tswv pub rua neeg luav noj nyob qhov twg. Tabsis cov Yixalayees tsi paub puab tug TSWV, kuv tsaav tuabneeg tsi totaub hlo le.”

Tsaav tuabneeg kws ua txhum, mej yog cov kws muaj kev txhum luj. Cov noob kws ua phem ua qas, cov mivnyuas kws ua kev puamtsuaj! Mej tau tso tug TSWV tseg lawm. Mej tau tuam mom cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv hab tig nrausqaum rua nwg.

Vim le caag mej pheej yuav tsim kev nyuaj sab hab ntxeev sab tsi tseg le? Mej puas xaav kuas kuv rau txim rua mej ntxiv? Mej tej taubhau tub ua kav txhaab thoob plawg, hab mej tej sab tej ntsws tub mob ncug nco lawm.

Txij ndlua huv kutaw moog nto plawg sau taubhau, thoob plawg mej lub cev tub tsi muaj ib qho zoo le; tsuas pum o, dloog hab ua qhov txhaab xwb. Mej tub tsi qhwv mej tej qhov txhaab, tsi tu kuas zoo hab muab tshuaj rua le.

Mej lub tebchaws nyob qhuav qhawv tseg, mej tej nroog kub nyab taag tshuav txhaa aav lawm xwb. Lwm tsaav tuabneeg tuaj txeeb mej lub tebchaws kaav taabmeeg mej, hab muab txhua yaam kws mej muaj ua puamtsuaj taag.

Tug TSWV tub muab Xi-oos tug ntxhais tso povtseg zoo le lub tsev pheebsuab kws nyob huv lub vaaj txiv maab lossis zoo le lub tsev kws nyob huv dlaim teb dlib lossis zoo le lub nroog kws luas vij lawm.
Yog has tas tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj tsi paab kuas peb qee leej dlim, peb yuav zoo ib yaam le lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas ntaag.
Cov tuabneeg kws kaav lub nroog Xaudoos, mej ca le noog tug TSWV tej lug los mas! Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Kaumaulas, mej ca le tig qhovntsej noog peb tug Vaajtswv tej lug qha.

Tug TSWV nug has tas, “Tej khoom kws mej coj tuaj fij ntau heev rua kuv ntawd, puas tseemceeb rua kuv? Tej yaaj hab tej roj tsaj kws mej muab tuaj hlawv fij rua kuv, dlhuav kuv heev lawm. Kuv yeej tsi txaus sab yuav tej ntshaav yaaj, ntshaav nyuj hab ntshaav tshis ntawd le.
Leejtwg kuas mej nqaa tej nuav tuaj rua kuv thaus mej tuaj pehawm kuv? Leejtwg kuas mej ua tej nuav, hab ncig moog ncig lug ntawm kuv lub Tuamtsev?

Tseg tsi xob nqaa mej tej khoom fij kws tsi muaj nqes tuaj lawm! Kuv dlhuav mej tej paa moov tshuaj tsw qaab kws mej hlawv ntawd kawg le. Kuv tiv tsi taug mej tej rooj noj rooj haus kws mej ua thaus Hli Xab, tej nub Xanpataus hab thaus mej tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai; mej ua txhum vim mej ua tsi ncaaj.
Kuv ntxub qhov kws mej ua rooj noj rooj haus thaus Hli Xab, hab tej nub Xanpataus. Tej ntawd yog lub nraa kws kuv dlhuav ris heev lawm.
“Thaus mej tsaa teg thov kuv, kuv yuav tsi saib mej. Txawm yog mej yuav thov ntev npaum le caag los kuv yuav tsi noog, rua qhov mej tej teg tua tuabneeg.
Ntxuav kuas mej huv; tso plhuav tej kev phem kev qas kws kuv pum mej ua nuav tseg. Tso plhuav kev phem kev qas tseg
hab xyum ua tuabneeg zoo, nrhav kev ncaaj nceeg, paab tej tuabneeg kws raug tsimtxom, ua ncaaj rua cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab paab cov puj ntsuag.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Peb ca le lug sis has txug zaaj nuav. Txawm yog mej tej kev txhum yuav lab cuag ntshaav, kuv yuav ua kuas dlawb paug le dlaus,  Txawm yog mej tej kev txhum dlub dloog ncab los kuv yuav ua kuas dlawb paug le tej plaub yaaj.
Yog mej noog kuv lug, mej yuav tau noj txhua yaam zoo kws cog huv lub tebchaws nuav;
tabsis yog mej tsi noog kuv lug, mej ua tuabneeg sab tawv hab ntxeev sab, mej yuav raug kev pluj kev tuag. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has tej lug nuav ntaag.”
Lub nroog kws muaj kev ncaaj nceeg, nwgnuav dlhau moog ua namndlav, thaus u muaj tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg nyob puv nkaus huv, tabsis nwgnuav tshuav cov tuabneeg tua tuabneeg nyob lawm xwb.

Lub nroog Yeluxalees, yaav taag lug koj zoo ib yaam le cov tseem nyaj, tabsis nwgnuav mej tub tsi muaj nqes le lawm. Yaav taag lug koj zoo le tej cawv txiv maab kws qaab heev, tabsis nwgnuav koj zoo ib yaam le cov cawv kws tov dlej lawm xwb.

Koj cov numtswv tau ntxeev sab, hab thooj sab koom ntsws nrug cov tuabneeg tubsaab; puab txaus sab rua tej nyaj kws luas coj tuaj xab hab tej khoom pub. Puab tsi paab txheem cov mivnyuas ntsuag huv tsev tu plaub, hab tsi noog cov puj ntsuag tej lug peev.

Yog le ntawd, koj ca le noog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv yuav ua pauj rua mej kws yog kuv cov yeebncuab, kuas mej txhaj yuav tsi ua txhum rua kuv ib zag ntxiv lawm.
Kuv yuav tawmtsaam koj, kuv yuav muab koj tej teev dlub ntxuav kuas dlawb, hab yuav so koj qhov ceb kuas huv.
Kuv yuav pub kuas koj muaj cov thawjcoj hab cov tuavxaam ib yaam le thaus u koj muaj lawm. Ces luas txhaj yuav hu koj ua lub nroog kws zoo hab ncaaj nceeg.”
Vim Vaajtswv yog tug ncaaj nceeg, nwg txhaj cawm lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab txhua tug kws tso kev txhum tseg lawm kuas dlim.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua Vaajtswv hab cov tuabneeg kws ua txhum, nwg yuav muab tsuj kuas puamtsuaj; txhua tug kws tso nwg tseg lawm, nwg yuav muab tua huv tuabsi.
Koj yuav raug txaajmuag, vim mej txaus sab rua tej ntoo qheb ntawd; koj yuav poob ntsejmuag, vim tej vaaj tseemceeb  kws koj tau xaiv.
Koj yuav qhuav ntsws ntsee ib yaam le tug ntoo qheb kws tub tuag lawm, hab ib yaam le lub vaaj kws tsi muaj tuabneeg ywg dlej.
Vim puab tej kev ua phem ua qas, cov tuabneeg muaj zug yuav raug kev puamtsuaj, ib yaam le suavtawg kub tej quavnyaab hab tsi muaj leejtwg tua tau le.
Tej lug kws Vaajtswv qha rua Amauxes tug tub Yaxayas kuas has rua cov Yudas hab lub nroog Yeluxalees:
Yaav tom ntej nuav lub roob kws lub Tuamtsev nyob rua sau, yuav sab dlua tej hauv roob txhua lub huv tuabsi, ntau tsaav tuabneeg yuav sau nthwv tuaj rua sau lub roob ntawd.

Ntau tsaav tuabneeg yuav tuaj hab has tas, “Peb ca le moog sau tug TSWV lub roob, moog kuas txug sau cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev. Nwg yuav qha peb tej kws nwg xaav kuas peb ua; peb yuav taug txujkev kws nwg xaiv rua peb taug. Vaajtswv tej lug qhuab qha tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj; hab nwg has lug huv Xi-oos tuaj rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.”

Nwg yuav ua tug txav txim rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg, puab yuav muab puab tej ntaaj hab rag lug ntaus ua khais, hab muab tej muv ntaus ua lag. Ntau tsaav tuabneeg yuav tsi ua tsuv ua rog hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg npaaj cuabyeej sis nkaug sis tua ntxiv le lawm.
Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv, nwgnuav peb ca le taug txujkev kaaj nrig kws tug TSWV tub pub rua peb lawm.

Vaajtswv, koj tau muab koj tsaav tuabneeg kws yog Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv tso povtseg lawm; rua qhov puab lub tebchaws puv nkaus cov tuabneeg ua khawvkoob kws tuaj saab nubtuaj tuaj hab tuaj huv tebchaws Filitees tuaj.  Puab xyum ua lawv le cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws ua.
Puab lub tebchaws muaj nyaj muaj kub nplua mag, hab puab tej nyaj txag yeej tsi paub taag ib zag le. Puab lub tebchaws los muaj neeg nyob puv nkaus huv, hab puab ua tsheb neeg tsi paub tso tseg le.
Mlom nyob puv nkaus huv puab lub tebchaws, hab puab pe tej kws puab txhais teg puab.
Puab txhua tug yuav raug txu fwjchim hab poob ntsejmuag. Tug TSWV, thov tsi xob zaam txim rua puab hlo le!
Puab yuav tsiv moog nkaum huv tej qhov tsua sau tej roob tsuas, lossis khawb qhov nkaum kuas dlim tug TSWV txujkev chim, hab tsiv nkaum nwg lub fwjchim hab tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab!
Nub ntawd cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb yuav raug txu fwjchim hab thaus ntawd cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav raug kev puamtsuaj. Ces Vaajtswv tuab leeg xwb txhaj le yog tug zoo tshaaj plawg.
Nub ntawd tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav muab txhua tug kws muaj fwjchim, txhua tug kws khaavtheeb hab cov tuabneeg kws xaav ua tug luj txu fwjchim kuas taag.
Nwg yuav ua kuas cov ntoo cab peg Roob Lenpanoos hab taagnrho cov ntoo qheb huv tebchaws Npasaas puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.
Nwg yuav rhuav tshem tej roob sab hab tej hauv roob kuas puamtsuaj,
rhuav txhua lub chaw tsomfaaj hab tawmtsaam tej ntsaa yeej kws txhim zeb khov kho;
tawmtsaam lub nroog Talasis tej nkoj hab tej nkoj kws zoo nkauj kuas tawg taag.
Cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb yuav raug txu kuas qeg hab muab cov tuabneeg nruj tsiv ua kuas puamtsuaj. Nub ntawd tug TSWV tuab leeg yog tug yuav tau ntsejmuag.
Hab tej mlom yuav pluj moog taag huv tuabsi.

Tej tuabneeg suavdlawg yuav tsiv moog nkaum taag rua huv tej qhov tsua sau tej roob tsuas hab khawb qhov nkaum kuas dlim tug TSWV txujkev chim, hab tsiv nkaum nwg lub fwjchim hab tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab thaus nwg nqeg lug cu lub nplajteb nuav.
Nub ntawd, puab yuav muab tej nyaj tej kub, hab tej mlom kws puab puab, coj moog povtseg kuas taag huv tuabsi hab tso tseg rua tsuag hab puav lug ua zeg rua.

Thaus Vaajtswv nqeg lug cu lub nplajteb, tej tuabneeg suavdlawg yuav tsiv moog nkaum huv tej qhov aav hab qhov tsua sau tej roob tsuas, kuas txhaj tsiv dlim nwg txujkev chim, nwg lub fwjchim hab tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab.
Tsi xob tso sab rua cov tuabneeg kws txawj tuag. Puab muaj nqes npaum le caag?

Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, muab txhua tsaav yaam hab txhua tug tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab huv lub tebchaws Yudas kws cov tuabneeg ca sab ntsoov rua, tshem huv tuabsi moog. Nwg tseem muab puab tej zaub mov hab puab tej dlej,
puab cov tuabneeg muaj zug hab cov tubrog, cov txav txim hab cov povthawj, cov tuabneeg ua khawvkoob, hab cov txwjlaug,
tug thawj kws saib tsib caug leej tubrog hab cov thawjcoj kws nrhav kev vaammeej, cov tuavxaam tebchaws, hab txhua tug tuabneeg kws txawj khawvkoob tshem huv tuabsi moog.
Tug TSWV yuav ca puab cov tub hluas kws tsi tau paub taab ua num ua tswv kaav cov pejxeem.
Cov pejxeem ib leeg yuav tsimtxom ib leeg. Cov tub hluas yuav tsi fwm tej kev txwjlaug, hab cov tuabneeg tsi muaj meejmom yuav tsi fwm puab cov numtswv.
Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd ib tug huv ib xeem yuav has rua puab ib tug kwvtij has tas, “Koj yog tug kws tseem tshuav rig tsho naav; koj ca le lug ua tug coj peb lub sijhawm kws raug kev txomnyem nuav.”
Tabsis nwg teb has tas, “Tsi yog kuv! Kuv tsi kaam paab mej. Kuv los tsi muaj rig tsho naav hab tsi muaj mov noj ib yaam nkaus. Tsi xob tsaa kuv ua tug coj mej.”

Qhov tseeb, lub nroog Yeluxalees taabtom raug kev puamtsuaj lawm! Cov Yudas qaug taag rua huv aav! Tej lug kws puab has hab tej num kws puab ua puavleej tawmtsaam Vaajtswv; puab taabmeeg tuam mom Vaajtswv le ntaag.
Puab tej kev ua tsi ncaaj yuav rov ua povthawj tawmtsaam puab. Puab taabmeeg ua kev txhum ib yaam le cov tuabneeg Xaudoos ua. Kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab, vim puab lob kev phem lug rua puab.
Has rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tas puab yuav muaj kev zoo sab,  rua qhov puab yuav tau txais nqe zug zoo vim tej num kws puab ua.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg ua phem yuav raug kev puamtsuaj; tej kws puab tau ua rua lwm tug lawm, yuav rov lug raug puab.

Cov tuabneeg qev nyaj tsimtxom kuv tsaav tuabneeg, hab cov tuabneeg txais nyaj qee tug tswv nyaj tug. Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej cov thawjcoj coj mej moog yuam kev lawm. Yog le ntawd, mej txhaj tsi paub moog rua txujkev twg le.
Tug TSWV yeej npaaj rawv has nwg rooj plaub; nwg npaaj txhij yuav txav txim rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.

Tug TSWV coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg, cov thawjcoj hab cov kev txwjlaug tuaj txav txim. Nwg has le nuav: “Mej txeeb luas tej vaaj txiv maab, hab mej moog txeeb cov tuabneeg pluag tej khoom lug ca rua huv mej tej tsev puv nkaus le.
Mej tsi muaj cai yuam kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab tsimtxom tej tuabneeg pluag. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tej lug nuav.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej saib, cov ntxhais kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees khaavtheeb heev! Puab moog kev tsaa ntswg nuv rua sau ntuj. Puab ob lub qhovmuag saib ntsoov tej kev phem kws puab xaav ua. Puab rhais ruam moog kev mog nyoos, ua rua tej tswb kws puab coj ntawm puab kutaw nrov zum zawg.
Tabsis kuv yuav rau txim rua puab, kuv yuav chais puab tej plaubhau kuas dlu lug hab ca puab nyob taubhau dlo dlus, kuas puab txaajmuag.”
Nub ntawd tug TSWV yuav muab txhua yaam kws cov quaspuj huv Yeluxalees pheej khaavtheeb: tej saw kws puab coj ntawm cejdlaab taws, sau taubhau, ntawm cejdlaab,
tej paugteg kws coj ntawm cejdlaab teg, puab tej phuam kws paav taubhau,
tej mom, tej hum tshuaj tsw qaab kws puab coj rawv ntawm ncej npaab, hab tej hlaab kws sa ntawm dluav;
puab tej nplhaib kws puab coj ntawm ntivteg, tej kauj ntswg kws coj ntawm qhovntswg;
puab tej tab ntev kws zoo heev, tej tsho khuam hab tej naab nyaj;
puab tej tsho ntev, tej phuam ntaub maag, tej phuam paav cejdlaab, hab tej phuam ntev kws puab ntoo sau taubhau, sau huv tuabsi coj moog povtseg.

Puab xaav pleev tshuaj kuas tsw qaab, tabsis puab yuav tsw ntxhab; puab xaav sa tej hlaab kws zoo, tabsis puab yuav rhais tab; puab xaav ntsis plaubhau kuas zoo nkauj, tabsis puab yuav dlo hau; puab xaav naav tej tsoog tsho kws zoo; tabsis puab yuav naav khaub hlaab; puab tej kev zoo nkauj yuav hloov ua kev txaajmuag!
Cov txivneej huv nroog yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag, hab tej tubrog yuav tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog.
Lub nroog Yeluxalees tej roojvaag yuav quaj qw tu sab heev, hab lub nroog ntawd zoo ib yaam le tug quaspuj labqaab kws nyob huv aav.

Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd xyaa tug quaspuj yuav koom ib tug quasyawg hab has tas, “Peb nrhav rua peb noj peb naav, tabsis thov ca peb hu koj has tas, yog peb tug quasyawg, yog le ntawd, peb txhaj yuav tsi muaj kev nyuaj sab hab txaajmuag has tas peb tsi muaj quasyawg.”

Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, tug TSWV yuav ua kuas txhua yaam nroj tsuag hab ntoo huv lub tebchaws ntawd rov tuaj hlub mog nyoos hab zoo nkauj heev. Cov pejxeem Yixalayees kws seem yuav zoo sab hab tau koob meej rua tej qoobloo zoo kws puab ua tau huv tej teb.
Txhua tug tuabneeg kws seem hab muaj npe teev tseg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, yog cov kws Vaajtswv xaiv tseg, hab luas hu has tas puab yog cov dlawbhuv.

Thaus ntawd tug Tswv yuav ntxuav Xi-oos cov ntxhais tej kev txhum hab ntxuav tej ntshaav kws nrug rua huv lub plawv nroog Yeluxalees, ntawm nwg lub fwjchim kws yog kev txav txim hab lub fwjchim kws yog nplaim suavtawg.

Ces Vaajtswv tso fuab pus tsaus nti rua sau lub Roob Xi-oos hab tej chaw kws puab sis sau ua ke, nruab nub muaj fuab pus tsaus nti roog tshaav, mo ntuj muaj nplaim tawg cig laam lug pum kev. Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab lug roog lub nroog ntawd.
Nruab nub Vaajtswv lub fwjchim yuav ua dluab ntxoo lug roog lub nroog kuas tshaav tsi xob kub, ua lub chaw rua puab tau nyob hab ua lub tsev rua puab tau nkaum naag xub naag cua.
Kuv yuav hu nkauj rua tug kws kuv hlub noog, zaaj nkauj nuav has txug nwg lub vaaj txiv maab: tug kws kuv hlub muaj ib lub vaaj txiv maab nyob sau lub ncov roob kws aav zoo heev.

Nwg khawb hab khaws tej pobzeb tawm, nwg cog tej yub txiv maab zoo heev rua. Nwg ua ib lub chaw tsomfaaj zuv tej txiv maab ntawd. Nwg khawb ib lub qhov ua chaw tsuam txiv maab. Nwg tog rawv kuas tej txiv maab sav, tabsis tej txiv maab qaub kawg le.
“Nwgnuav mej cov kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov Yudas, mej ca le txav txim rua kuv hab kuv lub vaaj txiv maab.
Puas tseem tshuav tej yaam dlaabtsi kws tsimnyog kuv ua rua kuv lub vaaj txiv maab ntxiv hab? Vim le caag thaus kuv moog dle cov txiv zoo kws qaab zib, tsua dle tau cov txiv phem kws qaub xwb?

“Nwgnuav kuv qha rua mej paub qhov kws kuv yuav ua rua kuv lub vaaj txiv maab. Kuv yuav muab tej xuv hlau kws xov ncig lub vaaj rhuav povtseg, hab lub vaaj ntawd yuav raug kev puamtsuaj; kuv yuav muab tej ntsaa laajkaab rhuav huv tuabsi povtseg, kuas tej txiv maab ntawd raug luas tsuj rua huv aav.

Kuv yuav ua kuas lub vaaj txiv maab nuav tuaj nroj tsuag; kuas tsi muaj tuabneeg taav ntsis lossis npoog aav rua tej hauvpaug, kuv yuav ca xuavpaug nqai hlau hab xuavpaug rau tshws tuaj laum nwg. Kuv yuav txwv fuab cua kuas tsi muaj naag lug ywg lub vaaj nuav.”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lub vaaj txiv maab yog cov Yixalayees. Cov Yudas yog cov txiv maab kws nwg cog rua. Nwg ca sab ntsoov has tas puab yuav ua tuabneeg zoo, tabsis puab tsua ua tuabneeg tua tuabneeg. Nwg ca sab ntsoov has tas puab yuav ua tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, tabsis cov tuabneeg kws raug puab tsimtxom thov kuas muaj kev ncaaj nceeg.

Mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj lauj! Mej yuav ntau lub tsev hab ntau thaaj teb lug ntxiv rua tej kws mej tub muaj lawm. Tsi ntev yuav tsi muaj chaw rua lwm tug nrug mej nyob, tsuas tshuav mej nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd lawm xwb.
Kuv nov tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Taagnrho tej tsev luj hab zoo nkauj nuav yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob.
Cog kaum paav txiv maab, thaus sav tsuas tsuam tau ib thoob cawv xwb, hab tseb kaum kawm noob nplej, thaus sav tsuas sau tau ib kawm xwb.”
Mej yuav puamtsuaj lauj! Mej sawv thaus tsi tau kaaj ntug lug haus cawv, hab nyob tsheej taag mo haus cawv kuas mej qaug.
Thaus mej muaj noj muaj haus, mej ntaus nkauj nogncaas, ntaus nruag, tshuab raaj ntsaws, hab haus cawv. Tabsis mej tsi totaub has tas tug TSWV ua dlaabtsi,
yog le ntawd, mej txhaj yuav raug coj moog ib yaam le cov tuabneeg raug txim. Mej cov thawjcoj yuav tuag tshaib hab mej cov pejxeem yuav tuag nqhes.
Tubtuag teb tshaib nqhes heev, nwg rua ncauj rug tog puab. Tubtuag teb yuav nqog tej numtswv huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nrug cov pejxeem hab puab tej kev lomzem moog kuas taag.
Txhua tug yuav poob ntsejmuag, hab taagnrho tej tuabneeg khaavtheeb yuav raug txu fwjchim.
Tabsis tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav qha nwg lub fwjchim ntawm nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg, hab Vaajtswv tug dlawbhuv qha nwg txujkev dlawbhuv, thaus nwg txav txim rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.
Yaaj yuav noj tej nyom tuaj huv tej nroog kws raug puamtsuaj taag, hab tej mivnyuas tshis yuav ntsib lub tshaav zaub kws mog heev.
Mej yuav puamtsuaj lauj! Mej cov kws tsi kaam tso kev txhum tseg.

Mej has tas, “Ca tug TSWV ua lawv le nwg has tas nwg yuav ua, kuas peb txhaj pum yaam kws nwg ua ntawd. Ca cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv ua lawv le tej kws nwg tau npaaj tseg lawm, peb txhaj yuav paub.”

Mej yuav puamtsuaj lauj! Mej muab tej lug phem ntxeev has ua lug zoo, hab muab tej lug zoo ntxeev has ua lug phem. Mej muab lug qaab zib ntxeev ua lug ab lug dlaw, hab muab lug ab lug dlaw ntxeev has ua lug qaab zib.
Mej cov kws pum has tas mej ntse, hab mej cov kws xaav huv mej lub sab has tas mej ntse, mej yuav raug puamtsuaj lauj!
Cov tuabneeg kws haus cawv ua tau, hab cov tuabneeg sab tawv kws muab cawv sis tov haus, mej yuav raug puamtsuaj lauj!
Tabsis mej txav txim tsi ncaaj, mej yuav tej nyaj xab hab tso tug tuabneeg kws muaj txim tawm nyob ywj sab, hab rau txim rua tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg.

Yog le ntawd, nwgnuav tej quavnyaab npleg hab tej nroj puamkhaab kub nyab le caag, mej tej caag yuav lwj, yuav qhuav hab cua yuav muab ntsawj yaa taag ib yaam le ntawd, vim mej tsi leeg paub tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus txuj kevcai kws cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv tau qha tseg rua peb lawm.

Tug TSWV chim heev rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg hab nwg tsaa nwg txhais teg rau txim rua puab. Tej hauv roob yuav ua zug koog, hab yuav muab cov tuabneeg tuag tso pawg lug rua huv tej plawv kev ib yaam le tej khoom kws muab povtseg. Txawm yog tub muaj npaum le nuav los tug TSWV tseem chim tsi paub kawg, nwg tseem pheej tsaa nwg txhais teg txav txim taag zug le.
Tug TSWV ua ib yaam cim hu lub tebchaws kws nyob dleb heev,  nwg xuav hu kuas puab tuaj tim qaab ntug tuaj cuag nwg. Hab puab tuaj lawm tag lauj! Puab tso saas ceev kawg le.
Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav nkeeg, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav qaug le. Puab yuav tsi tsaug zug ib zag le, puab tej hlaab sa los tsi xoob; tej hlua khau los tsi tu.

Puab tej xub nee los zuag kawg nkaus, hab puab tej neevnti los ntaa txhua raab tshuav qeb lawm xwb, puab cov neeg tej rau tawv ib yaam le pobzeb, hab puab tej tsheb neeg ndlog zoo ib yaam le khaub zeeg cua.
Cov tubrog nyooj lawg ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav kws tum tau tsaj hab kwv moog rua qhov chaw kws tsi muaj tug lug txeeb tau ntawm nwg.

Thaus txug nub ntawd, puab yuav nyooj nrov heev thoob plawg lub tebchaws Yixalayees ib yaam le dlej havtxwv ndlaas. Tig saib lub tebchaws saib! Kev tsaus ntuj hab kev nyuaj sab lug lawm lauj! Kev tsaus ntuj muab kev kaaj laum taag lawm.
Xyoo kws Vaajntxwv Uxiyas tuag, kuv pum tug TSWV nyob sau nwg lub zwmtxwv kws nyob sab heev, hab nwg lub tsho nthuav puv nkaus huv lub Tuamtsev.
Muaj ib cov xelafees sawv puagncig tug TSWV; ib tug xelafees twg muaj rau phob tis: ob phob tis npug ntsejmuag, ob phob tis npug lub cev hab ob phob tis yaa.
Puab ib tug has rua ib tug tas: “Dlawbhuv, dlawbhuv, dlawbhuv! Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus nwg yog tug dlawbhuv! Nwg tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab thoob plawg huv qaab ntuj.”
Puab tej suab has lug ntawd ua rua ob tug ncej qhovrooj ua zug koog hab muaj paa nchu auv nab puv nkaus huv lub Tuamtsev.

Kuv tau has tas, “Kuv tsi muaj chaw ca sab rua leejtwg hlo le! Zag nuav kuv tuag lauj, rua qhov tej lug kws kuv has txhua lu puavleej txhum, hab kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg kws nrug cov tuabneeg has lug phem lug qas nyob ua ke xwb. Txawm yog le ntawd los kuv lub qhovmuag tub pum kag tug Vaajntxwv kws yog tug TSWV tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lawm.”
Ces txawm muaj ib tug xelafees yaa lug cuag kuv, nwg muab caj tais tau ib lub ncaig tawg cig lab ploog tom lub thaaj nqaa lug rua ntawm kuv.

Nwg tuav nkaus kuv ob dlaim tawv ncauj, muab lub ncaig tawg ntawd tso pluav rua ntawm kuv ob dlaim tawv ncauj hab has tas, “Nwgnuav koj tej kev txhum tub yaaj taag, hab kuv tub zaam koj lub txim lawm, rua qhov lub ncaig tawg nuav tub chwv koj ob dlaim tawv ncauj lawm.”
Ces kuv nov tug TSWV nug has tas, “Kuv yuav khaiv leejtwg moog? Leejtwg yuav ua tug sawv peb cev moog?” Ces kuv teb has tas, “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav! Thov khaiv kuv moog!”

Hab nwg has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le moog, hab has rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg le nuav: ‘Mej noog taag noog thab, tabsis mej tsi totaub; mej saib taag saib thab, tabsis mej tsi pum muaj dlaabtsi tshwmsim le.’ ”

Ces nwg has rua kuv tas, “Ca le ua kuas tsaav tuabneeg nuav lub sab ruag, qhovntsej laag qhovmuag dlig; kuas puab qhovntsej los tsi nov lug, hab puab qhovmuag los tsi pum kev, hab has lug los tsi totaub. Yog tsi ua le ntawd, nyob tsaam puab tsua tig lug cuag kuv, ces kuv khu puab zoo.”

Kuv txhaj nug has tas, “Tug TSWV, yuav zoo le nuav moog txug thaus twg?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Moog txug thaus tej nroog raug puamtsuaj taag tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob lawm, moog txug thaus tej tsev khoob lug tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob, ca moog txug thaus lub tebchaws nyob qhuav nkuag le tej roob mojsaab qhua.
Kuv yuav ntab tej tuabneeg tsiv moog pluj qaab ndlais, hab kuas lub tebchaws caj nroj tsuag nyob ntsag tu.

Txawm yog muaj tuabneeg seem nyob huv txug ib feem kaum xwb los puab tseem yuav raug puamtsuaj taag. Hab puab yuav zoo ib yaam le tej ntoo qheb kws luas muab ntuv taag tshuav lub hauvpaug lawm xwb.” (Lub hauvpaug ntoo ntawd pev txug Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg kws yuav rov hlaav tuaj dlua tshab.)

Thaus Yauthaas tug tub Ahas kws yog Uxiyas tug xeebtxwv ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas, lub tebchaws tau sawv rog. Lexees kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Xilias, hab Lemaliyas tug tub Pekas kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees tau tuaj tua lub nroog Yeluxalees, tabsis puab txeeb tsi tau.

Thaus muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Daviv cov xeebntxwv paub has tas, “Cov Xilias tau tuaj tsuam yeej rua huv cheebtsaam Efalayees lawm,” nwg lub sab hab nwg cov pejxeem tej sab tshee laim quas txag cuag le cua ntsawj tej ntoo kws nyob huv haav zoov.

Tug TSWV has rua Yaxayas has tas, “Koj coj koj tug tub Se-as Yasus,  moog cuag vaajntxwv Ahas. Meb yuav ntsib nwg ntawm ntu kev qhov chaw kws cov tuabneeg ntus ntaub nyob, ntawm tug kwj dleg kws lug peg lub paag dlej theem sau lug xaus nkaus.

Has kuas nwg ceevfaaj tsi xob ua lub sab ywjfaab ywjfwj, tsi xob ntshai lossis nyuaj sab hlo le. Rua qhov Vaajntxwv Lexees hab nwg cov pejxeem Xilias, hab Vaajntxwv Pekas kws yog Lemaliyas tug tub txujkev npautawg tsuas zoo le ob yaav nyuas qaab tawg kws nchu nchu paa lawm xwb.
Vim cov Xilias tau tuaj nrug cov Yixalayees hab puab tug vaajntxwv ntxeev sab tawmtsaam koj, puab has tas,
Ca peb moog tua lub tebchaws Yudas hab ua kuas lub tebchaws ntawd ntshai, hab peb ca le txeeb lub tebchaws ntawd lug ua peb tug, hab muab Tanpees tug tub tsaa ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws ntawd.
“Tabsis tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Tej xwm nuav yuav tsi tshwmsim ib zag le.

Vim le caag? Rua qhov cov Xilias tsi muaj zug npaum le lub tuamceeb nroog Damaxes, hab Damaxes tsi muaj zug npaum le Vaajntxwv Lexees. Tshuav rau caum tsib xyoos lawm xwb, tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees yuav tawg ua saab ua sua taag, tsi tsheej ib tsaav tuabneeg lawm.
Hab cov Yixalayees lub taubhau yog lub nroog Xamalis, hab Xamalis lub taubhau yog Lemaliyas tug tub. “ ‘Yog koj kev ntseeg tsi ruaj tsi khov, koj yuav nyob tsi ruaj tsi khov ib yaam nkaus.’ ”
Tug TSWV has dlua ib zaaj ntxiv rua Ahas has tas:

“Ca le thov tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv, ua ib yaam cim kuas tshwmsim rua koj pum. Yaam ntawd tawm huv tubtuag teb qhov kws tub tshaaj plawg lossis tawm sau qaum ntuj qhov kws sab tshaaj plawg tuaj.”
Tabsis Ahas teb has tas, “Kuv yuav tsi thov ib yaam cim dlaabtsi hab kuv yuav tsi kaam sim tug TSWV sab.”

Yaxayas teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv Daviv cov xeebntxwv, nwgnuav mej ca le noog kuv has. Qhov kws mej ua rua tuabneeg tsiv sab, puab txhaj ua tsi taug sab ntev, tseem tsi tau txaus mej sab hab los? Mej txhaj ua kuas Vaajtswv tsiv sab hab ua tsi taug sab ntev hab puas yog?
Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv yuav ua ib yaam cim tseemceeb rua mej pum lawv le tau has lug nuav. Ib tug nkaujxwb  yuav xeeb tub hab yuav yug tau ib tug mivtub, nwg yuav muab tis npe hu ua ‘Emanu-ees.’
Nwg yuav haus mig nyuj hab noj zib ntaab,  thaus nwg paub taab lawm, nwg tsi nyam ua qhov phem, tabsis nwg nyam ua qhov zoo xwb.
Thaus tug mivtub ntawd paub taab lawm, nwg tsi nyam ua qhov phem, tabsis nwg nyam qhov zoo xwb, ob tug vaajntxwv kws ua nruj ua tsiv rua koj ntshai ntawd, ob lub tebchaws yuav nyob nphob xuav tseg.

“Tug TSWV yuav coj kev txomnyem lwj sab lug rua koj, koj cov pejxeem hab koj txiv tsev tuabneeg, thaus ntawd mej yuav raug kev txomnyem heev, tseem txomnyem tshaaj thaus cov Yixalayees faib tebchaws tawm ntawm cov Yudas kws nwg coj tug vaajntxwv kaav cov Axilias tuaj tua mej.

“Nub ntawd, tug TSWV yuav xuav hu cov tuabneeg Iziv kuas sau nthwv tuaj ib yaam le yoov yaa tim ntug dlej Niles tuaj, hab hu cov tuabneeg Axilias sau nthwv huv puab lub tebchaws tuaj ib yaam le ntaab tsiv.
Puab yuav tuaj sis sau ua npoj ntwg rua huv tej haav, tej toj ntxhaab, huv tej kis pobzeb ntawm tej roob zeb, hab puab yuav nyob puv nkaus ntawm tej haav xuavpaug hab tej nraag puamkhaab.

“Nub ntawd, tug TSWV yuav ndlav ib tug txav plaubhau tim tug dlej Efalates saab nubtuaj tuaj, tug txav plaubhau ntawd yog cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv ntaag; nwg yuav chais mej cov plaubhau, mej cov fwjtxwv hab mej tej plaub thoob plawg ib ce.
“Nub ntawd, ib tug xyuas nyuj hab ob tug maum tshis xwb los yeej yuav cawm tau tug tswv teb txujsa,

tug xyuas nyuj hab obtug maum tshis ntawd yuav muaj kua mig ntau heev, hab nwg yuav muaj txaus noj txaus haus. Cov tuabneeg kws seem nyob huv lub tebchaws yuav muaj mig nyuj hab zib ntaab noj haus tsi taag le.
“Nub ntawd, tej vaaj txiv maab zoo heev kws muaj ib txheeb tsob txiv maab ib tsob twg ntaus nqe ib txheeb dlaim nyaj los yuav muab tso tseg rua maab xuavpaug hab ntoo xuavpaug laum kuas tuag taag.
Tuabneeg yuav nqaa neevnti hab xub vug moog plhob tua tsaj huv tej vaaj ntawd. Rua qhov maab xuavpaug hab ntoo xuavpaug yeej tuaj puv nkaus huv lub tebchaws ntawd.

Hab maab xuavpaug yuav tuaj puv nkaus sau tej pov roob kws zoo ua teb cog qoob cog loo, hab tsi muaj leejtwg yuav txeem tau moog rua huv le. Yuav ua chaw rua tej nyuj hab tej yaaj moog noj zaub lawm xwb.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le moog muab ib dlaim txag ntoo luj lug hab sau tej tug tsaj ntawv luj has le nuav:  ‘Maaj Nrooj Moog Fuab, Ceev Nrooj Moog Txeeb.’
Hab kuas Uliyas kws yog tug povthawj hab Yenpelekhiyas tug tub Xakaliyas kws yog ob tug tuabneeg kws mej ca sab rua, lug nrug ua timkhawv.”
Tau tsi ntev tom qaab nuav kuv tug quaspuj txawm xeeb tub. Thaus yug tau wb tug tub, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj tis nwg lub npe hu ua ‘Maaj Nrooj Moog Fuab, Ceev Nrooj Moog Txeeb.’

Ua ntej tug mivtub nuav txawj hu ‘Nam’ lossis ‘Txiv’, tej txhaab nyaj kws nyob huv lub nroog Damaxes hab tej khoom kws fuab tau huv lub nroog Xamalis lug, yuav raug tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Axilias tuaj nqaa moog taag huv tuabsi.”
Vaajtswv has dlua ib zag ntxiv.
Nwg has tas, “Vim cov tuabneeg nuav tsi leeg paub tug dlej Silau-as  kws ndlwg ntsag tu, hab ntshai Vaajntxwv Lexees hab Vaajntxwv Pekas tshee nyo.

Kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav coj tug Dlej Efalates tuaj tawmtsaam puab, nwg muaj zug hab coob kawg le, nwg yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Axilias hab taagnrho nwg cov tubrog; nwg yuav ndlwg thoob plawg tej kwj hab fuam puv nkaus ntug;

nwg yuav ndlwg moog thoob plawg lub tebchaws Yudas, yuav nyaab ntaa yeeg txij nkaus xubpwg hab nyaab txhua tsaav yaam huv tuabsi.” Tabsis Vaajtswv, thov nthuav koj ob phob tis roog taagnrho koj lub tebchaws.

Txhua tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le ntshai hab tuaj txoos ua ke los mas! Tej tebchaws kws nyob dleb, mej ca le noog! Mej npaaj rawv tog tawmtsaam, tabsis mej ntshai heev! Yog tag, mej yeej npaaj kuas txhij, tabsis mej ntshai kawg!
Ca le npaaj tswvyim, tabsis yuav ua tsi tav. Mej yuav ua tsi tau le mej has, rua qhov Vaajtswv nrug nraim peb.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv thaus nwg txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim tuav nkaus kuv, nwg ceebtoom kuas kuv tsi xob nrug cov tuabneeg nuav taug puab txujkev. Nwg has tas,
“Tsi xob koom nrug cov tuabneeg kws tuavhuv ua phem hab tsi xob ntshai tej kws puab ntshai.
Koj yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuv yog tug dlawbhuv, kuv tuab leeg txhaj yog tug kws koj yuavtsum ntshai.

Rua qhov kuv yog tug dlawbhuv kawg nkaus; kuv yuav yog lub pobzeb kws cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees dlawm qaug. Hab nwg yuav ua ib rooj ntaa npuj caws tog cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Muaj ntau leej dlawm qaug; puab yuav qaug ua rua puab nqaj ndluag ntshaav nrug, puab yuav maag rooj ntaa npuj hab lub vuj hlua.”
Mej cov kws yog kuv cov thwjtim, mej yuavtsum ceev hab khaws tej lug saamfwm kws Vaajtswv muab cob rua kuv ntawd.
Kuv yuav nyob tog tug TSWV, txawm yog nwg zais nwg lub ntsejmuag tsi pub Yakhauj tsev tuabneeg pum los kuv tseem tso sab plhuav rua nwg.
Kuv nyob ntawm nuav nrug cov mivnyuas kws tug TSWV muab pub rua kuv. Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lub zwmtxwv nyob sau lub Roob Xi-oos, nwg khaiv peb lug ua cim rua cov Yixalayees.

Tabsis cov tuabneeg yuav kuas mej ca le moog nug cov tuabneeg saib moov hab saib yaig kws puab has lug tujtawg. Puab yuav has tas, “Puas tsimnyog cov pejxeem moog tuavxaam nrug puab tej vaajtswv hab moog tuavxaam nrug cov tuabneeg tuag kuas paab cov tuabneeg caj?”
Mej yuavtsum teb puab has tas, “Noog tej lug kws tug TSWV qha rua mej xwb! Tsi xob noog cov tuabneeg txawj saib yaig tej lug, tej kws puab qha yuav tsi muaj dlaabtsi zoo rua mej.”

Cov pejxeem yuav taug kev moog thoob plawg lub tebchaws, tsi muaj kev ca sab hab tshaib plaab qaug quas zig. Thaus puab tshaib plaab hab puab chim, puab yuav foom phem rua puab tug vaajntxwv hab puab tej vaajtswv. Puab yuav tsaa qhovmuag saib sau ntuj

lossis saib huv aav, tabsis tsuas pum muaj kev nyuaj sab hab kev tsaus ntuj xwb. Luas yuav lawv puab tsiv moog rua huv qhov tsaus ntuj nti kws ua rua puab ntshai heev. Puab yuav tsiv tsi dlim tej kev txomnyem ntawd ib zag le.

Txawm le ntawd los yuav tsi muaj kev nyuaj sab rua cov tuabneeg kws tub raug kev txomnyem lug lawm. Yaav taag lug nwg tau coj kev txaajmuag lug rua xeem Xenpuloos lub tebchaws hab xeem Nathalis lub tebchaws, tabsis yaav tom ntej nuav moog, txij ndlua ntawm ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees saab nubtuaj moog txug ncua lub tebchaws kws nyob saab ntug dlej Yauladees tim u, hab peg Kalilais kws cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws nyob, nwg yuav ua kuas puab rov tau ntsejmuag.
Cov tuabneeg kws taug kev tsaus ntuj nti, tau pum kev kaaj nrig. Puab nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tsaus ntuj nti, nwgnuav tshaav ntuj ci kaaj nrig rua puab lawm.

Tug TSWV, koj ua rua puab muaj kev zoo sab heev, tub yog koj pub puab tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug. Puab txhua tug zoo sab kawg rua tej kws koj tau ua, ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws zoo sab thaus sau qoobloo, lossis zoo sab ib yaam le thaus faib tej kws moog txeeb tau lug.
Rua qhov koj tub muab tug quabtwg kws tsuam puab xubpwg, hab muab tug nplawm kws luas nplawm puab nrausqaum luv lawm.
Txhua nkawm khau kws cov tubrog rau hab puab cov rig tsho kws lu ntshaav yuav muab sau huv tuabsi coj moog hlawv.

Muaj ib tug mivnyuas tub lug yug huv peb cov lawm! Vaajtswv muab ib tug tub pub rua peb! Hab nwg yuav ua tug kaav peb, nwg lub npe yuav hu ua, “Tug Tuavxaam  kws muaj Txujci.” “Vaajtswv tug muaj Fwjchim,” “Vaaj Leej Txiv tug kws Nyob Moog Ibtxhis,” “Vaajntxwv tug kws muaj kev thaajyeeb.”

Nwg kev tswjfwm yuav nthuav luj zuj zug hab kev thaajyeeb yuav muaj tsi paub kawg, nyob sau Daviv lub zwmtxwv hab thoob plawg nwg lub tebchaws. Txij nuav moog, nwg yuav txhim khu lub tebchaws, hab tswjfwm moog rua qhov tseeb, hab coj ncaaj nceeg moog ibtxhis tsi kawg. Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus txav txim sab yuav ua lawv le tej nuav.
Tug TSWV txav txim rua Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv hab lub tebchaws Yixalayees.
Txhua tug tuabneeg yuav paub zaaj nuav, cov Efalayees hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis khaavtheeb has tas,
“Tej thwvcib tub pob taag lawm, tabsis peb yuav muab tej pobzeb lug txhim rua, muab tej nqaaj ntoo xikamaus txav povtseg taag lawm, tabsis peb yuav muab tej nqaaj ntoo thuv kws khov heev lug hloov.”
Tug TSWV tshoov puab cov yeebncuab sab  kuas tuaj tawmtsaam puab.

Cov Xilias kws nyob saab nub tuaj hab cov Filitees kws nyob saab nubpoob rua puab tej qhovncauj tuaj nqog tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees. Txawm muaj le ntawd los Vaajtswv tseem chim rua puab, hab nwg txhais teg tseem rau txim rua puab tsi tseg.
Txawm yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tub rau txim rua cov Yixalayees lawm los puab tseem tsi zeem hab tsi tig rov lug cuag tug TSWV le.
Tug TSWV yuav ua ib nub txav cov Yixalayees tej taubhau, tej kutwv, tej nplooj toovlaaj hab nplooj tauj kuas taag huv tuabsi povtseg.
Tug tuabneeg laug hab tug muaj meejmom yog lub taubhau, hab cov cevlug kws qha tej lug dlaag yog tug kutwv!
Cov tuabneeg kws coj tsoom pejxeem nuav tub yog cov coj puab yuam kev, hab txhua tug kws puab coj puavleej raug luas nqog huv tuabsi lawm.

Vim le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj tsi zoo sab rua puab cov tub hluas, hab nwg yuav tsi hlub cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab cov puj ntsuag, rua qhov txhua tug puavleej tsi fwm tug TSWV hab muaj lub sab phem kawg le, hab tej lug kws puab has puavleej yog lug phem xwb. Vim yog muaj tej nuav tug TSWV txhaj chim hab nwg txhais teg tseem rau txim tsi tseg rua puab.
Cov tuabneeg ua phem tej kev txhum cig ib yaam le lub cub suavtawg, kub tej ntoo xuavpaug hab maab xuavpaug, hab tej toj roob hauv peg nchu paa auv nab.
Vim tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus chim heev, lub tebchaws txhaj raug kub nyab, tej tuabneeg txhaj zoo le cov roj kws raug suavtawg kub; tsi muaj leejtwg yuav cawm tau nwg tej kwvtij le.
Cov pejxeem thoob tebchaws xawb txhua tsaav yaam lug noj, tabsis tsi tsau puab plaab, puab tseem rov noj puab tej mivnyuas!

Cov Manaxes tawmtsaam cov Efalayees hab cov Efalayees tawmtsaam cov Manaxes; hab ob paab nuav sis sau tawmtsaam cov Yudas. Vim tej nuav tug TSWV txhaj chim heev, hab nwg txhais teg tseem rau txim tsi tseg le.
Cov tuabneeg kws rhawv kevcai tsi ncaaj nceeg hab cov tuabneeg kws sau kevcai lug tswj kuv tsaav tuabneeg,
tsi pub kev ncaaj nceeg rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem hab txwv kuv tsaav tuabneeg pluag txuj cai kuas mej tau cov puj ntsuag hab cov mivnyuas ntsuag tug, mas mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj lauj.

Mej yuav ua le caag thaus txug nub kws Vaajtswv txav txim rua mej? Mej yuav ua le caag thaus nwg coj lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob dleb tuaj ua kuas mej puamtsuaj? Mej yuav moog kuas leejtwg paab mej, hab mej yuav muab mej tej nyaj coj moog tso rua qhov twg?
Mej yuav raug tua tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog lossis raug caab moog kaw nrug cov tuabneeg raug txim. Vim tej nuav nwg chim heev; nwg txhais teg txhaj rau txim tsi tseg rua mej.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Axilias! Kuv yuav siv cov Axilias ua raab qws rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws ua rua kuv chim.

Kuv tso cov Axilias moog tawmtsaam tsaav tuabneeg kws tsi leeg yuav Vaajtswv, kuv has kuas puab moog tawmtsaam cov tuabneeg kws ua rua kuv chim, kuas moog txeeb, moog nyag hab moog tsimtxom cov tuabneeg ntawd ib yaam le tsuj tej moov aav huv tej plawv kev.”
Tabsis tej nuav tsi lawv le fuabtais xaav, nwg lub sab tsi xaav le ntawd, nwg lub homphaj yog xaav ua kuas puamtsuaj xwb, hab txav txhua tsaav tuabneeg kuas tu kev nrho.
Nwg khaav has tas, “Tsi yog kuv cov thawj tubrog txhua tug puavleej yog vaajntxwv huv tuabsi los?
Kuv txeeb tau lub nroog Kanaus hab lub nroog Kakhemis, lub nroog Hamas hab lub nroog Alepas. Kuv txeeb tau lub nroog Xamalis hab lub nroog Damaxes huv tuabsi.
Kuv txhais teg rau txim rua cov tebchaws kws pe mlom, cov mlom ntawd tseem ntau tshaaj cov kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab lub nroog Xamalis.
Kuv tub ua rua lub nroog Xamalis hab tej mlom kws nyob huv raug puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi lawm, kuv yuav ua ib yaam le ntawd rua lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov mlom kws nyob huv kuas puamtsuaj hab.”
Tabsis tug Tswv has tas, “Thaus kuv ua kuv tej num sau Roob Xi-oos hab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees taag lawm, kuv yuav rau txim rua tug fuabtais kws kaav tebchaws Axilias, vim nwg txujkev khaavtheeb.”

Tug fuabtais kws kaav tebchaws Axilias khaav has tas, “Tej num nuav yog kuv tuab leeg ua tav xwb. Kuv muaj zug, muaj tswvyim hab ntse heev. Kuv naam lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej nrim dlej nrim aav hab txhaav puab tej nyaj txag nqaa lug. Kuv zoo le tug txiv nyuj kws nrau cov tuabneeg kws nyob sau tej zwmtxwv kuas poob taag.

Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav zoo ib yaam le tej zeg noog, kuv muab puab tej nyaj txag yoojyim ib yaam le kuv muab tej qai noog; tsi muaj ib tug twg ntxuaj tis kuas kuv ntshai hab tsi muaj ib tug twg qheb qhovncauj nthe kuv.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Raab taus muaj peevxwm tsaav tau fwjchim luj dlua tug kws siv raab taus los? Raab kaw tseemceeb dlua tug kws siv raab kaw los? Raab qws nqaa tsi taug tug tuabneeg kws siv raab qws? Tsuas yog tug tuabneeg kws siv raab qws txhaj nqaa taug raab qws xwb.”
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav tso kaab mob lug rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws puab txaav kuas puab rog rog. Huv puab lub nrog cev yuav kub ib yaam le suavtawg hlawv.

Vaajtswv yog cov Yixalayees lub teeb kws ci pum kev, nwg yog lub cubtawg ntawd ntaag. Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv yuav ua tug nplaim tawg, nub ntawd yuav kub txhua yaam, txawm yog tej maab xuavpaug hab tej ntoo xuavpaug los yuav kub nyab taag huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV yuav muab nwg tej haav zoov hab nwg tej teb ua kuas puamtsuaj taag, tsi has tug ntsujplig hab lub cev, yuav zoo ib yaam le tej kaab mob phem lug raug cov tuabneeg ntawd kuas puamtsuaj ntaag.
Huv lub haav zoov ntawd tsuas tshuav tsob puav ntoo lawm xwb, txawm yog tej mivnyuas yau los yeej suav txheeb.

Nub ntawd cov Yixalayees kws seem yuav tsi vaamkhom lub tebchaws kws muab puab ua puamtsuaj ntawd. Tabsis puab yuav muab sab npuab tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv, tug ncaaj nceeg hab tug tseeb.
Cov Yixalayees kws seem, yuav rov lug cuag puab tug Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus.

Txawm yog cov Yixalayees coob npaum le tej xuabzeb ntawm ntug havtxwv los cov kws tau rov lug muaj tsawg kawg le. Kev txav txim yeej muaj teem tseg rua tuabneeg lawm, hab yeej tsimnyog puab raug kawg le.
Tug TSWV tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug rua huv lub nplajteb nuav lawv le nwg has tseg lawm.

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Kuv tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Xi-oos, mej tsi xob ntshai cov Axilias thaus puab nqaa qws hab nqaa nplawm tuaj ntaus mej, ib yaam le cov Iziv tau ua rua mej.
Kuv txujkev chim kws rau txim rua mej tub yuav dlhau, kuv txujkev chim yuav ua kuas puab raug kev puamtsuaj.

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, kuv yuav muab kuv tug nplawm ntaus puab ib yaam le kuv ntaus cov Midias ntawm lub Pobzeb Aules, hab kuv tsaa kuv tug nplawm rua sau cov dlej havtxwv, ib yaam le kuv ua rua cov Iziv.
Nub ntawd, kuv yuav tso kuas mej dlim ntawm cov Axilias, puab lub nraa nyaav yuav nplaam sau mej xubpwg, hab puab tug quabtwg ntawm mej cejdlaab yuav luv.”
Cov tubrog Axilias tau moog txeeb lub nroog A-is;  puab tuaj dlhau lub nroog Minkaloos, puab txhaj muab puab tej khoom coj tuaj tso rua huv lub nroog Mikamas.

Puab hlaa dlhau plawg lub kwj haa rua saab tid, hab puab pw ib mos huv lub nroog Nkenpas! Cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog Lamas ntshai heev, hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Vaajntxwv Xa-ules lub zog Nkinpe-as tsiv taag lawm.
Cov tuabneeg Nkalees, ca le quaj los mas! Cov tuabneeg La-isas, ca le noog! Cov tuabneeg Anathaus, ca le teb nwg!
Cov tuabneeg Mamenas taabtom tsiv, hab cov tuabneeg Nkenpas yuavtsum tsiv tag kuas dlim.
Nub nua yeebncuab tub tuaj puv taag rua huv lub nroog Naunpas lawm, hab puab yuav yog nrig rua lub Roob Xi-oos kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav muab puab txu kuas poob ib yaam le txu tej ceg ntoo. Puab txujkev khaavtheeb hab tsaav fwjchim kws sab heev yuav raug muab ntuv kuas qaug hab poob tsim.
Tug TSWV yuav muab taus ntuv puab ib yaam le ntuv ntoo huv plawv zoov, txawm yog tej ntoo kws zoo heev peg Roob Lenpanoos los yeej yuav qaug taag tuabsi!
Daviv caajceg zoo ib yaam le tsob ntoo kws tub muab ntuv lawm; tabsis lub hauvpaug rov hlaav dlua ib tug ntsuag tshab. Yog le ntawd, tug vaajntxwv tshab yuav sawv huv Daviv cov xeebntxwv lug.
Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig yuav pub kuas nwg muaj tswvyim, muaj kev txawj ntse hab paub tswj nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg yuav paub tug TSWV lub sab nyam hab fwm tug TSWV,
hab nwg nyob kaaj sab lug vim nwg noog Vaajtswv lug. Nwg yuav tsi txav txim lawv le nwg lub qhovmuag pum lossis nwg lub qhovntsej nov,

nwg yuav txav txim ncaaj nceeg rua cov tuabneeg pluag, hab tsaa cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj leejtwg paab txuj cai. Nwg lu lug has zoo yaam le raab qws kws ntaus lub nplajteb nuav, hab nwg tej paa yuav tua cov tuabneeg sab phem.
Kev ncaaj nceeg yuav ua nwg txuj hlaab sa, hab kev ua sab ncaaj yuav ua pluaj ntaub rua nwg paav dluav.
Maa hab yaaj yuav nyob tau ua ke, tsuv pomtxwv yuav pw nrug mivnyuas tshis. Mivnyuas nyuj hab mivnyuas tsuv ntxhuav yuav noj zaub ua ke, hab tej mivnyuas yau yuav ua cov yug tej tsaj ntawd.
Nyuj hab dlais yuav noj zaub ua ke, mivnyuas nyuj hab mivnyuas dlais yuav pw ua ke; tsuv ntxhuav yuav noj quavnyaab ib yaam le nyuj noj.
Txawm yog tug mivnyuas yau kws tseem noj mig, moog ua si ze ntawm tug naab muaj taug lub qhov los tsi ntshai, hab mivnyuas yau yuav cev teg kov naab los naab tsi tum.
Sau Xi-oos kws yog Vaajtswv lub Roob dlawbhuv yuav tsi muaj kev txhawj kev ntshai lossis kev phem kev qas. Tej tuabneeg thoob nplajteb yuav paub tug TSWV ib yaam le dlej puv nkaus havtxwv.
Muaj ib nub Yexais tug Caag yuav sawv ua ib yaam cim tseemceeb rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg pum; puab yuav tuaj sis sau rua huv nwg lub nroog hab hawm nwg.

Nub ntawd, tug Tswv yuav siv nwg lub fwjchim moog coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws tseem tshuav nyob peg tebchaws Axilias hab nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, huv tebchaws Pathalaus, tebchaws Sudaas, tebchaws Elames, tebchaws Npanpiloos, hab Hamas, hab tej tebchaws kws nyob lawv ntug dlej havtxwv, tej koog povtxwv huv havtxwv rov lug nyob rua huv puab tej qub teb qub chaw dlua.

Tug Tswv yuav ua ib yaam cim qha rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg paub has tas, nwg taabtom sau cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas kws tau tsiv moog nyob ua saab ua sua rua plaub ceg kaum ntuj lawm, rov qaab lug nyob ua ke dlua.

Cov Yixalayees tej kev khib yuav yaaj taag moog, cov Yudas tej yeebncuab yuav raug txav kuas tu; cov Yixalayees yuav tsi khib cov Yudas ntxiv, hab cov Yudas yuav tsi ua yeebncuab rua cov Yixalayees lawm.

Puab yuav sau zog ua ke moog tawmtsaam cov Filitees kws nyob saab nubpoob, hab puab ua ke moog fuab cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab nub tuaj. Puab yuav tua yeej cov Edoos hab cov Mau-am, hab cov Amoos yuav noog puab lug.
Tug TSWV yuav ua kuas Havtxwv Xu-es qhuav hab tso khaub zeeg cua ntsawj tug dlej Efalates kuas nqhuab, tsuas tseg xyaa ceg dlej miv xwb, kuas leejtwg los hlaa tau.
Yuav muaj ib txuj nam kev luj huv tebchaws Axilias rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees taug rov lug ib yaam le thaus u puab cov yawmkoob rov nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Nub ntawd tej tuabneeg yuav hu nkauj has tas, “Tug TSWV, kuv ua koj tsaug! Koj tau chim heev rua kuv, tabsis nwgnuav koj tsi chim hab koj nplig kuv lub sab lawm.
Vaajtswv yeej yog kuv tug cawmseej; kuv yuav ca sab rua nwg hab yuav tsi muaj kev ntshai le. Tug TSWV yog kuv tug zug, kuv txhaj hu nkauj qhuas nwg; hab nwg yog kuv tug cawmseej.
Cov tuabneeg nqhes dlej zoo sab heev rua cov dlej ntshab le caag, Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg zoo sab heev thaus nwg cawm puab dlim le ntawd.”

Txug nub ntawd, cov tuabneeg yuav hu nkauj zoo sab has tas, “Ua tug TSWV tsaug! Hu nwg lug paab mej los mas! Qha tej kws nwg tau ua taag lug rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg! Qha nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus rua puab paub!
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv vim nwg tau ua tej txujci tseemceeb. Ca kuas lub nplajteb tau nov zaaj nuav.
Mej txhua tug kws nyob huv lub nroog Xi-oos ca le qw hab hu nkauj! Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv yog tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, nwg nyob nrug nraim nwg tsaav tuabneeg.”
Vaajtswv kuas Amauxes tug tub Yaxayas has cov lug nuav rua lub nroog Npanpiloos.
Tsaa ib tug chij ntaus rog rua sau lub ncov roob dlo dlo, qw nrov nrov rua cov tubrog; hab cu teg rua puab kuas ca le moog txeem cov numtswv tej roojvaag nroog.
Tug TSWV txhaj hu nwg cov tubrog kws muaj cuabkaav hab sab tawv tuaj tua npluav rog dlawbhuv hab rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws nwg chim rua.

Noog cov suab nrov sau roob, yog cov tuabneeg kws coob coob tej suab, ntau tsaav tuabneeg hab ntau lub tebchaws tej suab tuaj sis sau ua ke. Vaajtswv kws yog tug thawj rog, taabtom txhij nwg cov tubrog moog ntaus rog.
Puab tuaj huv tej tebchaws kws nyob dleb tim qaab ntug kawg tuaj. Vim tug TSWV txujkev chim, nwg txhaj lug tawmtsaam tej tebchaws ntawd kuas puamtsuaj taagnrho.
Mej ca le ntsaaj los mas! Nub kws tug TSWV yuav lug tub ze heev lawm, yog nub kws tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus coj kev puamtsuaj lug rua mej.
Txhua tug tuabneeg txhais npaab yuav tsaug leeg, hab txhua tug txivneej yuav qaug zug taag.

Puab yuav ntshai heev hab ib ce mob cuag le tug quaspuj mob plaab yug mivnyuas. Puab ntshai kawg, ib leeg tsaa qhovmuag saib ib leeg, hab puab lub ntsejmuag kub cuag suavtawg txhab, vim puab txujkev txaajmuag.
Nub kws tug TSWV lug, yuav muaj kev nruj tsiv, kev npautawg hab kev chim. Lub nplajteb yuav ua suabpuam taag, hab txhua tug tuabneeg txhum yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.
Txhua lub nubqub sau nruab ntug hab tej ntsauv nubqub yuav tsi ci, lub nub los yuav tsaus, hab lub hli los yuav tsi pum kev.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj luj heev lug rua lub nplajteb, hab rau txim rua cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas vim puab tej kev txhum, rua qhov puab muaj txim. Kuv yuav txu cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb lub fwjchim hab rau txim rua cov tuabneeg sab phem kws ua nruj ua tsiv.
Cov tuabneeg kws seem muaj nqes tshaaj tej tseem kub.
Nub ntawd, kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, yuav qha kuv txujkev chim, kuv yuav ua kuas lub ntuj cu ua zug koog, hab cu lub nplajteb kuas txaav tawm ntawm nwg qhov chaw moog.

“Cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nyob huv lub nroog Npanpiloos yuav tsiv rov qaab moog rua huv puab lub tebchaws, ib yaam le tej kauv kws tuabneeg moog lawv tua, hab zoo ib yaam le paab yaaj kws tsi muaj tug tswv saib.
Tug kws luas ntsib yuav raug muab no kuas tshaab, hab tug kws luas nteg tau yuav raug muab ntaaj tua kuas tuag.

Thaus ntawd puab yuav nrhav tsi muaj kev paab lawm, puab tej mivyuas mog yuav raug luas nplawm kuas tuag taabmeeg puab, puab tej tsev yuav raug luas txeeb, hab puab tej quaspuj yuav raug luas coj moog yuam.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv taabtom tshoov cov Medes  sab kuas moog tua lub nroog Npanpiloos. Nyaj los puab tsi quavntsej hab kub los puab yeej tsi ntshaw le.
Puab yuav muab neevnti hab xub vug tua cov tub hluas. Puab yuav tsi taabncuab cov mivyuas mog hab tsi hlub tshua cov mivnyuas yau le.

Lub nroog Npanpiloos kws zoo nkauj tshaaj plawg tej nroog huv tuabsi; yog lub nroog kws muaj cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb. Tabsis kuv kws yog tug TSWV, yuav hlawv lub nroog Npanpiloos povtseg ib yaam le kuv tub hlawv lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas lawm!
Yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg moog nyob rua huv ntxiv lawm. Cov tuabneeg Alav los yuav tsi moog teeb puab tej tsevntaub, hab tej tuabneeg yug yaaj los tsi caab puab tej yaaj moog noj zaub rua huv lawm hab.
Lub nroog ntawd yuav ua qhov chaw rua tej tsaj tom taj suabpuam lug nyob, hab ua chaw rua plaas lug ua zeg. Yuav ua qhov chaw rua noog ntxhuav nyob, sai yuav lug nyob hab tsuj kuas puamtsuaj taag.
Tej chaw faajxwm hab tej loog yuav ua chaw rua maa lab hab maa ntsuab nqov ntuj. Npanpiloos lub sijhawm tub lug yuav txug! Nwg lub caij tub yuav dlhau.”
Tug TSWV hlub hab ncu txug Yakhauj; nwg txhaj rov xaiv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees dlua, hab yuav tso puab rov qaab lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws. Cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws yuav lug nrug puab nyob.

Ntau tsaav tuabneeg yuav paab coj cov Yixalayees rov qaab lug rua huv puab lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV muab pub rua puab lawm, hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws yuav ua cov Yixalayees qhev nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd. Cov tuabneeg kws thaus u nteg cov Yixalayees, nwgnuav cov Yixalayees yuav nteg puab, hab cov Yixalayees yuav tswjfwm cov tuabneeg kws thaus u tsimtxom puab.
Tug TSWV yuav tso cov Yixalayees dlim ntawm puab tej kev lwj sab, kev txomnyem, hab kev raug luas yuam ua num nyaav.
Thaus tug TSWV ua tej nuav, puab yuav thuam tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Npanpiloos has tas: “Tug vaajntxwv kws limham tshaaj plawg tub qaug lawm! Nwg yuav tsi tau tsimtxom leejtwg ntxiv lawm!
Tug TSWV tub muab tug tuabneeg nruj tsiv tug qws hab tug cwj luv povtseg,
vim puab siv puab txujkev chim tsimtxom tej tuabneeg hab tsi tseg txujkev tsimtxom tej tsaav tuabneeg kws puab moog tua yeej le.
Nwgnuav lub nplajteb muaj kev thaajyeeb nyob kaaj sab lug, hab txhua tug yuav hu nkauj zoo sab.
Tej ntoo thuv hab ntoo cab kws nyob peg Roob Lenpanoos zoo sab heev hab has tas, ‘Tug vaajntxwv ntawd qaug lawm, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj ntuv peb lawm.’

“Tubtuag teb qheb qhovrooj lug tog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Npanpiloos. Cov muaj fwjchim thaus u kws kaav lub nplajteb nuav tej plig sawv zum zawg tuaj tog koj thaus koj lug. Cov vaajntxwv ntawd tej plig tawm zum zawg sau puab tej zwmtxwv.
Puab yuav has rua nwg tas, ‘Nwgnuav koj los yeej tsaug muas hab zoo ib yaam le peb lawm xwb.
Koj ibtxwm ntaus nkauj nogncaas qhuas koj, tabsis nwgnuav koj lug nyob huv tubtuag teb nuav lawm; koj pw sau lub txaaj kws muaj kaas ua koj dlaim choj pua hab dlaim choj vuv.’ ”

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav Npanpiloos, koj yog lub nubqub kws ci thaus yuav kaaj ntug, koj tau poob sau ntuj lug lawm! Yaav taag lug koj tua yeej ntau tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis nwgnuav koj tub raug muab pov rua huv aav lawm.

Koj xaav has tas, koj yuav nce moog sau ntuj hab coj koj lub zwmtxwv moog teeb rua sau Vaajtswv tej nubqub kws sab tshaaj plawg. Koj xaav has tas koj yuav moog nyob le tug vaajtswv rua sau lub roob ntawd saab qaumteb, qhov chaw kws tej vaajtswv tuaj sis sau ua ke.
Koj has tas, koj yuav nce moog sau cov fuab hab ua ib yaam le Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.
Tabsis koj yuav raug luas muab coj moog pov rua huv tubtuag teb lub qhov kws tub tshaaj plawg.
Cov tuabneeg tuag kws pum koj tuaj, yuav tsaa qhovmuag saib koj. Puab yuav nug has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav puas yog tug kws cu lub nplajteb hab txhua lub tebchaws ua zug koog?

Tug txivneej nuav puas yog tug kws ua rua ntau lub nroog raug puamtsuaj hab muab lub nplajteb ntxeev ua suabpuam taag lawm? Tug txivneej nuav puas yog tug kws tsi tso nwg cov tuabneeg raug txim moog tsev le?”
Taagnrho tej vaajntxwv ntawm txhua tsaav tuabneeg, nyag yuav pw huv nyag lub qhov ntxaa,

tabsis koj tsi muaj qhov ntxaa, hab muab koj lub cev povtseg lwj tsug rua saab nrau. Tej tubrog kws tuag rua huv tshaav rog tej cev tsuam koj lub cev sis xyaw rua huv lub qhov pobzeb hab muab txhub rua.

Rua qhov koj muab koj lub tebchaws ua puamtsuaj taag hab koj tua koj tsaav tuabneeg, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg muab koj coj moog faus le lwm tug vaajntxwv. Yuav tsi pub koj tsev tuabneeg kws ua phem ib tug seem hlo le.
Npaaj qhov chaw coj nwg cov tub moog tua, vim tej kev txhum kws puab cov yawmkoob tau ua lug lawm, tsi xob pub puab tau kaav lub nplajteb nuav hab tsim tej nroog kuas puv nplajteb hlo le.

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Kuv yuav ua rua lub nroog Npanpiloos kuas puamtsuaj taag. Kuv tsi tseg ib yaam dlaabtsi hlo le, mivnyuas yau los tsi tseg ca, tsi pub kuas muaj ib tug seem. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has tej lug nuav ntaag.

Kuv yuav muab lub nroog Npanpiloos ntxeev ua haav av, hab ua chaw rua plaas nyob. Kuv yuav muab raab qws rhuab kws yog kev puamtsuaj cheb lub nroog Npanpiloos hab txhua yaam moog povtseg. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has tej lug nuav ntaag.”
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus coglug has tas, “Kuv tau kom tseg le caag lawm, kuv yuav ua lawv le ntawd. Kuv tau npaaj sab le caag, kuv yuav ua kuas tav le ntawd.

Kuv yuav muab cov Axilias ua kuas puamtsuaj taag rua huv kuv lub tebchaws kws cov Yixalayees nyob, hab muab puab log rua sau kuv tej hauv roob. Kuv yuav tso kuas kuv tsaav tuabneeg dlim ntawm cov Axilias tug quabtwg hab kuas dlim ntawm tej kev nyuaj sab kws puab raug.
Ntawm nuav yog kuv lub homphaj rua lub nplajteb, hab kuv tsaa kuv txhais teg moog rau txim rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg.”
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus npaaj sab ua le nuav: nwg tsaa nwg txhais teg rau txim, hab tsi muaj leejtwg cheem tau nwg.
Xyoo kws Vaajntxwv Ahas tuag, muaj ib tsaab xuv tuaj has le nuav:

Cov tuabneeg Filitees, tug nplawm kws nplawm mej luv lawm, tabsis mej tsi xob rawm zoo sab. Thaus ib tug naab tuag lawm, muaj dlua lwm tug kws nyaum tshaaj lug hloov tug ntawd chaw. Lub qai naab dlaug tau ib tug zaaj kws yaa tau.

Tug TSWV yuav ua tug tswv yug yaaj rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem kws yog nwg tsaav tuabneeg hab yuav ca puab nyob kaaj sab lug. Tabsis nwg yuav tso kev tshaib nqhes lug rua cov Filitees, hab yuav tsi pub kuas ib tug muaj sa nyob le.
Cov Filitees tej nroog, ca le quaj qw thov kev paab los mas! Mej ca le ntshai! Yuav muaj paa nchu auv nab saab peg qaumteb tuaj, ua rua cov tubrog tsi muaj ib tug sab tawv tiv tau hlo le.

Peb yuav teb cov Filitees tsaab xuv kws puab has tuaj rua peb le caag? Peb yuav teb rua puab has tas, “Vaajtswv yog tug txhim khu lub roob Xi-oos, kuas nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws raug kev txomnyem txhaj tau chaw cawm sav.”
Ntawm nuav yog cov lug kws has txug lub tebchaws Mau-am. Ib mos xwb lub nroog Ales hab lub nroog Kis raug kev puamtsuaj taag, hab lub tebchaws nyob ntsag tu.

Cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Dinpoos  nce moog quaj huv puab tej tsev teev dlaab sau tej ncov roob. Cov Mau-am kws nyob thoob plawg lub nroog Nenpus hab Medinpas quaj tu sab nrho, muab puab tej plaubhau hab tej fwjtxwv chais povtseg.
Tej tuabneeg puavleej npua ntaub tsaaj moog nyob tom tej kev; cov tuabneeg moog quaj nyav huv plawv nroog hab sau tej ruv tsev.

Cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Hesenpoos hab Ele-ales tsaa suab hlo quaj, puab tej suab quaj nrov moog txug tim Yahaxes. Tub yog vim le nuav cov tubrog txhaj ntshai tshee nyo, hab puab zug ntaug taag huv tuabsi.

Kuv lub sab quaj dlhi rua lub tebchaws Mau-am! Cov tuabneeg tawg tsiv moog rua huv lub nroog Xau-as, hab moog rua huv lub nroog Elas Selesiyas. Muaj qee leej quaj taug kev nce moog rua peg lub nroog Luhithas, muaj qee leej taug kev tsiv moog rua huv lub nroog Haulauna-ees, puab quaj nrov heev rua puab tej kev pemsij ntawd.
Tug Dlej Nimilees nqhuab lawm, tej nyom kws tuaj ntawm ob saab ntug dlej tuag taag, hab tsi tshuav ib yaam nroj tsuag dlaabtsi tseem ntsuab nyob qhov twg le.
Cov tuabneeg nrhav kev coj puab tej khoom kws seem tsiv moog hlaa lub Haav Vilaus.
Tej suab quaj nrov thoob plawg tebchaws Mau-am. Nyob huv lub nroog Ela-ees hab Npe-elimes los yeej nov tej suab quaj huv tuabsi.

Tug dlej huv lub nroog Dinpoos tsuas pum ntshaav lab ploog. Tsi taag le ntawd xwb, Vaajtswv tseem muab tej yaam kws phem tshaaj plawg, tsub ntxiv rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv hab. Cov tuabneeg Mau-am kws tsiv dlim hab cov kws seem nyob huv lub tebchaws, puavleej raug tsuv ntxhuav tum tuag taag.

Cov Mau-am tso tuabneeg caab ib tug mivnyuas yaaj huv lub nroog Xelas taug txujkev huv taj suabpuam tuaj rua sau lub roob Xi-oos, ua khoom pub rua tug nom kaav lub tebchaws kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Mau-am cov ntxhais moog sawv ntawm ntug Dlej Alenoos tog hlaa dlej, hab moog moog lug lug ib yaam le tej mivnyuas noog kws muab tshem tawm ntawm lub zeg.

Puab has rua cov Yudas has tas, “Thov qha saib peb yuav ua le caag. Thov mej tsomkwm peb ib yaam le tug ntoo kws ua dluab ntxoov ntxoo txag zag thaus taav su, hab thov ca peb su huv mej tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo. Peb yog tuabneeg tawg rog; thov muab peb zais rua ntawm qhov chaw kws tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj nrhav tau hlo le.

Thov ca peb nyob huv mej lub tebchaws, hab tsomkwm kuas peb dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws nrhav peb tua.” (Cov tuabneeg limham tub yuav dlhau moog, kev puamtsuaj tub yuav kawg, hab cov tuabneeg kws tsim kev kub ntxhuv rua lub tebchaws kuas puamtsuaj tub yuav pluj moog.

Ces yuav tsaa Daviv ib tug xeebntxwv ua vaajntxwv, nwg yuav tswjfwm tsoom pejxeem ntawm lub sab ncaaj nceeg hab kev hlub. Nwg nrhav txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab maaj ceev nrooj ua kuas txujkev ncaaj nceeg ntawd tav.)
Cov Yudas teb has tas, “Peb tub nov has tas cov Mau-am yog cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb. Peb paub puab yog tuabneeg khaavtheeb hab muaj plhus, tabsis puab tej lug khaavtheeb tsi muaj qaabhau le.”

Cov tuabneeg Mau-am yuav quaj vim tej kev txomnyem kws puab raug ntawd. Puab txhua tug yuav quaj heev thaus puab ncu txug tej zaub mov qaab kws puab noj huv lub nroog Kis Heles. Yuav muab puab lawv tawm tsiv kuas pluj qaab ndlais.

Tej teb kws nyob ze lub nroog Hesenpoos hab cov Xinpemas tej vaaj txiv maab raug puamtsuaj taag. Cov txiv maab ntawd yog cov kws luas dle lug ua cawv rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg haus. Muaj ib zag cov txiv maab ntawd hlaav moog dleb heev, moog txug ndlua ntawm lub nroog Yaxes saab nubtuaj hlaav moog txug ndlua taj suabpuam hab saab nubpoob, hab hlaav moog txug dlua ntawm Havtxwv Tuag saab tim u.

Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj quaj rua cov Xinpemas cov txiv maab ib yaam le kuv quaj rua cov tuabneeg Yaxes. Kuv tej kua muag poob rua lub nroog Hesenpoos hab Ele-ales, vim muaj kev sis ntaus sis tua qw ntshu nrooj lug raug mej tej qoobloo hab tej nplej kws mej tub sau tau lawm.

Nwgnuav tsi muaj leejtwg zoo sab rua tej teb kws zoo qoobloo. Tsi muaj leejtwg qw lossis hu nkauj huv tej vaaj txiv maab. Tsi muaj leejtwg tsuam tej txiv maab ua cawv; tej suab qw zoo sab los ntsag taag lawm.
Kuv seev tu sab nrho rua lub tebchaws Mau-am, hab lub nroog Kis Heles.
Thaus cov Mau-am pluav qaug quas zig nce moog rua sau lub roob kws yog qhov chaw puab teev dlaab, hab thaus puab moog txug rua huv lub tsev teev dlaab, puab thov los tsi tau dlaabtsi.
Tej ntawm yog tug TSWV cov lug kws tub has rua cov Mau-am ntxuv lug lawm.
Tabsis nwgnuav tug TSWV has tas, “Tshuav peb xyoos lawm xwb. Cov Mau-am lub meejmom yuav poob moog. Feem coob yuav puamtsuaj, tsuas tshuav qee leej seem nyob lawm xwb, puab yuav qaug zug kawg le.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Damaxes yuav tsi tau ua ib lub nroog ntxiv lawm; nwg yuav puamtsuaj taag ua ib pawg.
Cov Xilias tej nroog yuav ua suabpuam moog ibtxhis le.  Tej nroog ntawd yuav ua tshaav zaub rua yaaj hab nyuj noj, hab tsi muaj leejtwg yuav lawv tau tej tsaj ntawd tawm tsiv.

Cov Yixalayees tej chaw faajxwm kws txhim pobzeb zoo heev yuav pob puag taag hab lub nroog Damaxes yuav poob fwjchim. Cov Xilias los yuav poob ntsejmuag ib yaam le cov Yixalayees. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuv has cov lug nuav ntaag.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Nub ntawd cov Yixalayees lub fwjchim yuav raug muab txu kuas qeg, hab kev pluag yuav lug hloov puab kev npluanuj.
Cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws yuav zoo ib yaam le thaaj teb kws tub hlais nplej hab sau qoob taag hab zoo ib yaam le dlaim teb huv lub Haav Lefayees thaus kws tuabneeg muab tej qoobloo sau taag lawm.

Cov Yixalayees qee leej txhaj yuav dlim xwb, puab yuav zoo ib yaam le tsob txiv ntoo roj kws luas muab tej txiv dle taag tshuav ob peb lub txiv nyob sau ntsis lossis seem lub puav txiv nyob rua huv tej ceg kws qeg xwb. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, kuv has tej lug nuav ntaag.”
Nub ntawd tej tuabneeg yuav tig rov lug cuag tug kws tsim puab, kuas paab puab, nwg yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv.

Puab yuav tsi mob sab rua tej thaaj kws puab txua tau ntawm puab teg lossis tsi ca sab rua tej kws puab txhais teg txua, tsi has tej mlom quaspuj Aselas hab tej thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab hlo le.
Nub ntawd tej nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv yuav raug muab rhuav kuas puamtsuaj ib yaam le cov Hivis hab cov Amaules  tsiv cov Yixalayees hab muab puab tej nroog tso tseg ntaag.

Cov Yixalayees, mej muab Vaajtswv kws yog mej tug cawmseej hab tug tiv thaiv mej ib yaam le phaab zeb tso tseg lawm. Mej tau moog xov tej vaaj tseemceeb  kuas tau chaw pehawm cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tej vaajtswv.
Txawm yog tej noob ntawd tuaj mog nyoos hab tawg paaj kag taagkig sawv ntxuv kws mej cog ntawd los mej yuav tsi tau sau le. Nub ntawd tsuas muaj kev txomnyem hab kev mob nkaus xwb.
Ntau tsaav tuabneeg tej suab quaj nrov ntsoog qeeg cuag le dlej havtxwv ndlaas, cov tuabneeg tej suab quaj suab qw nrov ntsoog qeeg cuag le dlej ntsawj.

Ntau tsaav tuabneeg sawv lug ua suab nrov ntsoog qeeg cuag le dlej ndlaas, tabsis Vaajtswv tshev puab hab lawv puab tsiv moog dleb kawg le lawm, nwg muab puab lawv tsiv ib yaam le cua ntsawj tej moov aav sau roob, hab ib yaam le khaub zeeg cua ntsawj tej quavnyaab yaa ri quas nab.
Thaus tsaus ntuj puab moog tsim kev kub ntxhuv, tabsis thaus kaaj ntug tsi muaj puab lawm. Tej ntawd yog nqe zug rua txhua tug kws tuaj fuab peb lub tebchaws.
Tsuas nov tej suab tis ntxuaj nrov tim lub tebchaws kws nyob ntawm tug ntug Dlej Sudaas

kws yog cov numtswv tsaav cov nkoj kws muab tej lojkov ua, tawm huv lub tebchaws taug tug dlej Niles tuaj. Mej cov tuabneeg xaa xuv kws dlha ceev heev, mej ca le moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws muaj cov tuabneeg luj hab nqaj tawv mog nyoos, moog rua ntawm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob dleb hab nyob ze los luas ntshai, hab moog rua ntawm tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim hab muaj zug heev kws muaj dlej quas puab lub tebchaws lawm.
Txhua tug kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav ca le noog! Tsaa qhovmuag saib tug chij kws yuav tsaa rua sau hauv roob! Hab thaus nov luas tshuab raaj tshuab xyu, ca le noog!
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Kuv yuav nyob sau ntuj nuav saib tuaj, ib yaam le ntsu lwg thaus mo ntuj lub caij ntuj tsaug kws sau qoobloo, hab ib yaam le tshaav tuaj zab thaus nruab nub.
Ua ntej sau qoobloo, thaus kws tej paaj txiv maab zeeg hab tej txiv maab pib sav, yeebncuab yuav tuaj tua cov Sudaas yoojyim ib yaam le muab rag txav tej ceg txiv maab.
Luas yuav muab puab cov tubrog kws tuag lawm tso tseg rua tej tsaj qus hab noog noj. Lub caij ntuj qhua noog yuav tau noj puab, hab lub caij ntuj no tej tsaj yuav tau noj puab.”

Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav tau txais tej khoom fij kws luas coj tim lub tebchaws kws muaj dlej quas nruab nraab tuaj pub rua nwg. Tsaav tuabneeg ntawd yog tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj zug hab muaj fwjchim heev. Puab luj sab hab nqaj tawv mog nyoos, tej tuabneeg kws nyob dleb hab ze los puavleej ntshai puab. Puab yuav tuaj rua sau Roob Xi-oos, qhov chaw kws pehawm tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.

Ntawm nuav yog cov lug kws has txug lub tebchaws Iziv. Saib lauj, tug TSWV caij rawv ib tauv fuab ceev heev nqeg lug rua huv lub tebchaws Iziv lawm. Cov tuabneeg Iziv tej mlom yuav raug tsuj taabmeeg ntawm nwg xubndlag, puab poob sab hab zug ntaug taag.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav tshoov cov Iziv sab kuas puab tej kwvtij sawv tawmtsaam tej kwvtij, zej zog yuav sawv tawmtsaam zej zog, ib lub nroog yuav sawv tawmtsaam ib lub nroog, hab ib lub tebchaws yuav sawv tawmtsaam ib lub tebchaws.

Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Iziv tej tswvyim pluj taag, hab ua kuas puab tej kev xaav puamtsuaj. Puab yuav moog thov puab tej mlom paab puab, moog saib yaig hab moog thov cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm tej ntsujplig paab puab.

Kuv yuav muab cov Iziv cob rua tug nom kws sab tawv heev txhais teg, hab tsaa tug vaajntxwv kws nruj tsiv tshaaj plawg kaav puab. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuv has tej lug nuav ntaag.”
Tug dlej Niles yuav nqhuab, hab tug nam dlej yuav tu.
Tej kwj dleg yuav tsw lwj ntxag, hab cov dlej huv tebchaws Iziv kws ndlwg lug tshuam tug dlej Niles yuav tu hab nqhuab taag. Tej lojkov hab kavtheej los yuav qhuav nkig nkuav,
tej nroj tsuag kws tuaj ntawm ob saab ntug dlej Niles, hab tej qoobloo kws cog lawv ob saab ntug dlej los yuav qhuav nkig nkuav hab cua yuav muab ntsawj yaa taag.
Cov kws nrhav noj yug nwg lub neej kws yog nuv ntseg hab muab vaag ntaus ntseg huv tug dlej Niles, yuav tu sab hab quaj; puab yuav tsi siv puab tej nuv hab tej vaag ntxiv lawm.
Cov tuabneeg ntsis paaj los yuav pluj, hab cov tuabneeg ntus ntaub los yuav taag kev ca sab;
cov tuabneeg ntus ntaub huv lub tebchaws yuav raug caij tsuj, hab cov tuabneeg kws moog nrhav zug yuav tu sab heev.

Cov thawjcoj huv lub nroog Xau-as, puavleej yog tuabneeg ruag! Falaus cov tuabneeg txawj ntse los tuavxaam ruag kawg le! Mej yuav ua le caag has rua Falaus has tas, “Peb puavleej yog tub txawg tub ntse hab peb yog cov vaajntxwv thaus u tej xeebntxwv?”
Falaus, koj cov tuavxaam kws txawj ntse nyob qhov twg? Ca puab maam le qha rua koj hab ua rua koj paub, saib tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, muaj homphaj le caag rua lub tebchaws Iziv?

Cov thawjcoj huv lub nroog Xau-as puavleej yog tuabneeg ruag, cov thawjcoj huv lub nroog Meephis raug kev ntxeev ntxag, cov kws ua ncej zeb txheem nwg tsaav tuabneeg, tau coj cov Iziv moog yuam kev taag.
Tug TSWV ua kuas puab muab tej lug tuavxaam tsi totaub lug has. Cov Iziv txhaj ua txhua yaam yuam kev hab qaug puj poog ib yaam le tug tuabneeg qaug cawv kws nwg rov tsuj nwg cov ntuav qaug.
Tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi kws yuav paab tau lub tebchaws Iziv le, tsi has taubhau lossis kutwv, nplooj toovlaaj lossis tej lojkov.
Nub ntawd cov Iziv yuav muaj lub sab muas ib yaam le tej quaspuj. Puab yuav ntshai tshee nyo, thaus puab pum tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tsaa nwg txhais teg rau txim rua puab.
Cov Yudas yuav ua rua cov Iziv ntshai heev; txhua tug kws nov yuav ntshai kawg nkaus, rua qhov tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus npaaj tseg rua puab lawm.

Thaus ntawd tsuas tshuav tsib lub nroog huv tebchaws Iziv txhaj has lug Henplais lawm xwb. Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv yuav tuav tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lub npe thov. Cov nroog ntawd muaj ib lub yuav hu ua “Lub Nroog Nub.”
Nub ntawd yuav muaj ib lub thaaj rua tug TSWV nyob huv tebchaws Iziv, hab muaj ib tug ncej zeb muab fij rua tug TSWV nyob ntawm Iziv tug nrimteb.

Ob yaam ntawd yuav ua cim hab ua timkhawv rua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus nyob huv tebchaws Iziv. Thaus puab quaj hu thov txug tug TSWV, vim muaj tuabneeg tuaj tsimtxom puab, tug TSWV txhaj khaiv ib tug lug cawm puab, tsomkwm puab, hab tso puab dlim.

Nub ntawd tug TSWV yuav qha nwg rua cov tuabneeg Iziv paub, puab yuav paub tug TSWV hab pehawm nwg, puab yuav coj khoom hab khoom theej txhoj tuaj fij rua nwg. Puab coglug rua nwg hab ua lawv le tej lug kws puab cog tseg.
Tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua cov Iziv, tabsis nwg yuav rov khu kuas puab zoo. Puab yuav tig lug cuag nwg hab nwg yuav noog puab tej lug thov, hab yuav khu kuas puab tej mob zoo.

Nub ntawd yuav muaj ib txuj nam kev luj nraag tebchaws Iziv moog txug rua peg tebchaws Axilias. Cov Axilias yuav moog nraag tebchaws Iziv, cov Iziv yuav tuaj peg tebchaws Axilias, hab cov Iziv yuav nrug cov Axilias pehawm Vaajtswv ua ke.
Nub ntawd cov Yixalayees yuav muaj vaajfuam sis luag ib yaam le cov Iziv hab cov Axilias, hab peb tsaav tuabneeg nuav yuav ua rua tuabneeg nplajteb tau koob moov.

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav foom koob moov rua puab has tas, “Kuv foom koob moov rua cov Iziv kws yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg, cov Axilias kws kuv tsim, hab cov Yixalayees kws kuv xaiv tseg.”
Xyoo kws Xalenkoos ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Axilias, nwg tau tso ib tug thawj tubrog tuaj tua lub nroog Asedaus hab txeeb tau lub nroog ntawd.

Lub sijhawm ntawd, tug TSWV has rua Yaxayas kws yog Amauxes tug tub has tas, “Ca le muab cev rig tsho ntaub maag kws koj naav hab muab nkawm khau khab kws koj rau hle tseg.” Yaxayas moog kev labqaab hab tsi rau khau le tug TSWV tau has rua nwg ntawd.

Thaus lub nroog Asedaus raug luas txeeb tau lawm, tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv tug tubkhai Yaxayas moog kev labqaab hab tsi rau khau tau peb xyoos. Qhov nuav ua lub cim qha has tas, yuav muaj tej xwmtxheej lug raug cov Iziv hab cov Sudaas.

Axilias tug vaajntxwv yuav muab cov Iziv hab cov Sudaas kws nwg nteg tau ntawd hle rig tsho labqaab coj moog ua tuabneeg poob tebchaws. Cov hluas hab cov laug yuav moog kev labqaab pobtw lab vog hab tsi rau khau, ua rua cov Iziv txaajmuag kawg le.
Cov tuabneeg kws ca sab rua cov Sudaas hab khaavtheeb rua cov Iziv yuav thim rov qaab hab txaajmuag heev.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawm ntug havtxwv kws npuab tebchaws Axilias has tas, ‘Mej sim saib, cov tuabneeg kws peb ca sab rua hab cov tuabneeg kws peb moog cuag kuas coj peb tsiv tawm ntawm cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv, raug luas nteg lawm! Zag nuav peb yuav ua le caag txhaj tsiv dlim?’ ”
Zaaj lug kws has ntsig txug cov tuabneeg Npanpiloos tej kev puamtsuaj tawm huv lub tebchaws kws txaus ntshai heev tuaj ib yaam le cov khaub zeeg cua ntsawj hlaa taj suabpuam tuaj.

Tej xwmtxheej phem kws kuv ua ywgtoog pum, cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab tawm moog tsim kev kub ntxhuv hab cov tuabneeg tubsaab tawm moog nyag luas. Cov Elames, ca le tawm moog ua rog los mas! Cov Medias, ca le tawm moog vij luas tej nroog! Kuv yuav ua kuas tej suab quaj suab qw kws yog cov Npanpiloos ua ntawd ntsag moog.
Thaus kuv ua ywgtoog pum zaaj nuav, kuv ntshai heev hab ua rua kuv mob dluav npaum nkaus le tug quaspuj kws mob plaab yug mivnyuas ntaag.
Kuv taubhau kiv heev, hab kuv ntshai ua ib ce tshee nyo. Kuv tog ib nub tsaus ntuj, tsi muaj dlaabtsi ua rua kuv ca sab, tsuas yog kev txhawj kev ntshai xwb.

Nyob rua huv zaaj ywgtoog ntawd, muaj ib rooj mov kws tub npaaj tav lawm; luas muab cov ntaub tuab nthuav pua rua cov qhua nyob. Thaus puab taabtom noj haus, taamsim ntawd txawm muaj lug saamfwm tuaj has tas, “Cov numtswv, ca le npaaj mej cov thaiv nav ntaaj!”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Ca le tso ib tug txivneej moog saib, hab ca nwg qha tej kws nwg pum rua mej.
Yog has tas nwg pum cov txivneej caij neeg, ib nkawg quas ib nkawg, hab cov txivneej kws caij neeg luav hab caij ntxhuav tuaj, mas nwg yuavtsum ua tuab zoo saib kuas tseeb tseeb.”
Tug faajxwm hu lug has tas, “Kuv tug tswv, kuv tau sawv sau qhov chaw faajxwm saib taag nub taag mo.”
Saib maj! cov txivneej kws caij neeg, ib nkawg quas ib nkawg tuaj lawm lauj! Puab teb has tas, “Lub nroog Npanpiloos tub poob lawm! Tej vaajtswv kws puab pe poob rua huv aav hab tawg taag lawm.”

Kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, mej raug ntaus ib yaam le ntaus nplej, tabsis nwgnuav kuv yuav qha rua mej paub txug tej xuv zoo kws kuv nov lug ntawm tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.
Zaaj lug kws has txug lub nroog Edoos. Muaj ib tug tuabneeg hu tom Xe-iles tuaj rua kuv has tas, “Tug faajxwm, tshuav ntev le caag maam kaaj ntug? Qha rua kuv saib thaus twg maam kaaj ntug?”
Kuv teb has tas, “Tub kaaj ntug lawm, tabsis tub yuav rov tsaus ntuj dlua. Yog koj xaav rov nug ntxiv, ca le hu rov tuaj hab nug los tau.”
Zaaj lug kws has txug cov Alavv. Cov tuabneeg Dedaas, mej taug kev tsheej paab lug su rua ntawm cov Alav tej roob mojsaab qhua,
muab dlej rua cov tuabneeg kws tuaj nrhav dlej ntawm mej haus. Mej cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Temas, muab zaub mov rua cov tuabneeg tawg rog noj.
Vim puab tsiv ntawm tej nav ntaaj nav rag kws yuav tua puab, hab tsiv ntawm tej neevnti kws ntaa tog yuav tua puab, hab ntawm tej kev tsuv kev rog.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Tshuav ib xyoos ib yaam le luas ndlav tub zug lawm xwb, mas cov Kedas lub meejmom kws luj yuav dlhau moog.
Cov Kedas kws txawj tua neevnti hab sab tawv, tsuas tshuav qee leej seem lawm xwb. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, kuv has tej lug nuav.”
Ntawm nuav yog cov lug kws has rua lub Haav Ywgtoog. Muaj xwmtxheej dlaabtsi? Vim le caag cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog nce taagnrho moog rua sau ruv tsev?
Lub nroog kws puv nkaus tej suab luag ua nqaaj ua nqug, hab tej suab lomzem zoo sab. Mej cov tuabneeg kws tuag, tsi yog tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag lossis tuag rua huv tshaav rog.
Mej cov thawjcoj tau tsiv tawm hab tsi raug tua ib nee le; puab puavleej raug nteg. Txawm yog puab tsiv dleb lawm los, puab tseem raug nteg coj lug rau txim.
Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj has tas, “Tsi xob quavntsej kuv; ca kuv quaj rua txujkev lwj sab kws kuv tsaav tuabneeg tuag taag lawm. Tsi xob tuaj nplig kuv sab le.”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tau teem ib nub tseg, tso tej kev mob kev nkeeg, kev swb hab kev ntxuv sab lug rua peb huv lub Haav Ywgtoog. Tej ntsaa yeej kws thaiv peb lub nroog tau qaug tawg taag hab tej suab quaj thov paab nrov ntxhe moog thoob plawg peg tej ncov roob.
Cov tubrog caij neeg huv tebchaws Elames tuaj, puab khuam rawv neevnti hab xub vug. Cov tubrog kws tuaj huv tebchaws Kis tuaj, npaaj rawv puab tej thaiv nav ntaaj.
Tsheb neeg yuav nyob puv nkaus rua huv cov haav kws aav zoo heev huv tebchaws Yudas, hab cov tubrog caij neeg tuaj sawv tsheej paab ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees tej roojvaag.
Tug TSWV tau muab tej cuabyeej tiv thaiv cov Yudas tshem povtseg lawm. Nub kws muaj tej xwmtxheej nuav, mej yuav moog nrhav tej cuabyeej ntawd huv lub Tsev Haav Zoov,
mas mej pum tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv Daviv lub Nroog hab lub paag dlej kws mej tauv rua ntawm Theem Qeg tawg ntau qhov,
mej suav cov tsev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab mej muab cov tsev ntawd tsoo yuav tej pobzeb moog txhim tug ntsaa yeej kws tawg ntawd.

Mej ua tau ib lub rhawv rua ntawm ob tug ntsaa yeej kis nruab nraab ntim cov dlej kws ndlwg huv lub qub paag dlej lug. Tabsis mej tsi tig qhovntsej noog Vaajtswv tug kws npaaj tej nuav, hab ua kuas muaj tej nuav thaus u lug tej lug hlo le.
Nub ntawd tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has kuas mej quaj hab nyav, chais mej tej plaubhau hab naav ntaub tsaaj.
Tabsis mej tseem zoo sab hab khaav, mej tua nyuj hab tua yaaj lug noj, hab muab cawv txiv maab lug haus. Mej has tas, “Peb ca le noj hab haus kuas txaus! Vim pigkig peb yuav tuag taag.”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tau has rua kuv tas, “Tej kev phem kev qas nuav yuav tsi muaj kev zaam txim rua puab moog txug thaus puab tuag taag. Kuv kws yog Vaajtswv tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, yog tug has tej lug nuav ntaag.”
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus khaiv kuas kuv moog cuag Senas kws yog tug thawj saib lub tuamtsev, hab has rua nwg tas,
“Koj tuaj ua dlaabtsi hab leejtwg tso cai rua koj tuaj khawb qhov ntxaa faus koj, txaug koj lub qhov ntxaa rua sau ncov roob sab, hab puab koj qhov chaw su rua sau roob zeb nuav?
Saib maj, tug tuabneeg kws muaj zug, tug TSWV yuav tuaj nqaa koj moog povtseg. Nwg yuav tuav koj ca,

hab nwg yuav muab koj dlov ua ib thooj hab muab koj pov moog rua ntawm lub tebchaws kws dlaav heev. Koj yuav tuag rua qhov ntawd, hab koj tej tsheb neeg ua rog yuav nyob rua qhov ntawd, vim koj tau ua rua koj tug tswv tsev tuabneeg raug kev txaajmuag.
Tug TSWV yuav tshem koj tawm ntawm koj lub chaw ua num hab yuav txu kuas koj poob koj lub meejmom.”
Tug TSWV has rua Senas has tas, “Nub ntawd kuv yuav hu kuv tug tubkhai Eli-akees kws yog Hilekiyas tug tub tuaj,

kuv yuav muab mej cov numtswv tej tsho ntev rua nwg naav, hab muab mej tej hlaab rua nwg sa; hab kuv yuav muab mej tej meejmom cob rua nwg teg; nwg yuav ua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov Yudas leej txiv.
Kuv yuav muab tug yumsij kws qheb Daviv lub tsev tso rua sau nwg xubpwg; nwg qheb, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg kaw; hab nwg kaw, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg qheb tau.
Kuv yuav muab nwg cog rua ntawm lub chaw kws ruaj khov ib yaam le tug ntsa hlau kws tub ntsa khov lawm, hab nwg yuav yog lub zwmtxwv kws luas fwm rua ntawm nwg yawmkoob caajceg.
“Tabsis taagnrho nwg cov kwvtij hab nwg tej tubki yuav ua ib lub nraa nyaav heev rua nwg; puab yuav khuam rua sau nwg ib yaam le tej laujkaub hab tej taig phab kws khuam rua ntawm tej ncej!

Txug nub ntawd, thaus muaj tej xwmtxheej nuav tshwmsim tuaj, tug ncej kws cog rua qhov chaw ruaj yuav rhu tawm hab yuav qaug. Txhua tsaav yaam kws yog lub nraa nyaav khuam sau nwg yuav poob taag.” Tug TSWV has le ntawd.

Cov lug nuav yog has rua lub nroog Tiles. Cov tuabneeg kws ua num huv tej nkoj tom plawv havtxwv, mej ca le quaj tu sab los mas! Mej lub chaw nreg nkoj huv Tiles, tej vaaj tse hab tej chaw nreg nkoj huv lub tebchaws raug puamtsuaj taag. Mej yuav nov xuv thaus mej cov nkoj rov tim tebchaws Xaipas lug.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv koog povtxwv, hab cov tuabneeg ua laag ua luam huv Xidoos, mej ca le quaj ntsaaj ntsoog qeeg!
Mej khaiv tuabneeg hlaa havtxwv moog yuav hab muag tej nplej kws luas cog nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab moog cog kev laag kev luam nrug ntau tsaav tuabneeg.
Xidoos, koj ca le txaajmuag los mas! Havtxwv hab qaab thu havtxwv kws tub heev has tas, “Kuv tsi tau muaj dlua mivnyuas. Kuv tsi tau tu dlua tub lossis ntxhais le.”
Thaus cov Iziv nov tej xwmtxheej nuav, puab yuav ceeb hab nyuaj sab txug lub nroog Tiles tej chaw nreg nkoj kws raug puamtsuaj taag lawm.
Cov tuabneeg huv koog povtxwv, ca le quaj qw hab nrhav kev tsiv hlaa kuas dlhau lawm tim Xapees los mas!
Lub nroog Tiles nuav puas yog lub nroog kws thaus u ua rua mej muaj kev lomzem? Lub nroog nuav puas yog lub kws pheej khaiv tuabneeg hlaa havtxwv moog txeeb luas tej tebchaws nyob.
Leejtwg npaaj sab le nuav tawmtsaam lub nroog Tiles kws yog lub nroog num nroog tswv, cov tub laag tub luam kws nyob huv puavleej yog cov numtswv kws muaj meejmom tshaaj plawg huv nplajteb nuav los?

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tub npaaj sab rua lub nroog ntawd lawm. Nwg yuav rhuav puab tej kev khaavtheeb, tej kws puab muaj, hab muab cov tuabneeg kws muaj koob muaj meej txu kuas poob ntsejmuag.
Mej cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Xapees, ca le moog ua mej tej teb kuas thoob plawg huv mej lub tebchaws! Nyob qhov ntawd tsi muaj leejtwg tsomkwm mej lawm.

Tug TSWV tsaa nwg txhais teg rua sau havtxwv hab nwg muab txhua lub tebchaws cu ua zug koog. Nwg tau saamfwm kuas muab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub xeev Faunikias tej chaw ua laag ua luam rhuav kuas puamtsuaj.

Hab nwg has tas, “Lub nroog Xidoos kws yog tug ntxhais nkaujxwb, koj tej kev zoo sab tsi muaj lawm; hab koj cov tuabneeg puavleej raug tsimtxom. Txawm yog puab tsiv moog rua tim Xaipas los puab yeej tsi muaj kev kaaj sab hlo le.”

(Tub yog cov tuabneeg Npanpiloos muab lub nroog Tiles ua tej tsaj qus lub chaw nyob, tsi yog cov tuabneeg Axilias ua.
