Tub yog cov tuabneeg Npanpiloos tuaj puab puab tej chaw tsomfaaj rua huv, puab muab lub nroog Tiles tej vaaj tse kws txhim zeb rhuav povtseg, hab muab lub nroog ntawd ua puamtsuaj taag.)
Cov tuabneeg ua num huv nkoj, mej ca le quaj nyav! Lub nroog kws mej ca sab rua tub raug puamtsuaj taag lawm.

Thaus txug nub ntawd puab yuav tsi ncu qaab txug lub nroog Tiles txug xyaa caum xyoo kws yog taag ib tug vaajntxwv simneej. Thaus taag xyaa caum xyoo lawm, yuav muaj tej yaam tshwmsim rua lub nroog Tiles lawv le tug namndlav zaaj nkauj kws has le nuav:

Nqaa koj lub nkauj nogncaas moog ncig kuas thoob lub nroog nuav, Tug namndlav kws tsi muaj tuabneeg ncu txug lawm. Ca le ntaus nkauj nogncaas hab hu koj tej nkauj coj cov txivneej rov qaab lug dlua ib zag ntxiv los mas!
Thaus dlhau xyaa caum xyoo lawm, tug TSWV yuav ca lub nroog Tiles rov qaab lug ua namndlav le qub, hab nwg yuav xaa nwg cov tuabneeg moog ua namndlav rua txhua lub tebchaws huv nplajteb nuav.

Tej nyaj kws nwg ua laag ua luam tau lug, yuav muab fij rua tug TSWV. Nwg yuav tsi khaws ib qho ca le. Cov tuabneeg kws pehawm tug TSWV ntawd yuav tau cov nyaj ntawd moog yuav zaub mov hab rig tsho naav.
Tug TSWV yuav muab lub nplajteb ua kuas puamtsuaj hab muab tso povtseg kuas nyob qhuav qhawv tsi muaj dlaabtsi. Nwg yuav muab lub nplajteb ntxeev kuas tej tuabneeg tawg moog nyob ua saab ua sua.
Yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd rua cov povthawj hab cov pejxeem, cov tswv hab cov qhev, cov pujnom hab cov ntxhais qhev, cov muag hab cov yuav, cov qev hab cov txais, cov muaj hab cov pluag.
Lub nplajteb yuav raug muab tso povtseg kuas tawg ntsoog ntxawg hab puamtsuaj taag. Tug TSWV tau has tej lug nuav hab yuav ua kuas tej ntawd tav.
Nplajteb yuav qhuav nkig nkuav; tuabneeg thoob nplajteb yuav tsaug muas; lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj yuav thooj txhij puamtsuaj moog.
Tuabneeg tau ua rua lub nplajteb poob kev txhum vim puab tsi coj Vaajtswv tej kevcai hab tsi ua lawv le nwg tej lug kws tau cog tseg moog ibtxhis.
Yog le ntawd lub nplajteb txhaj raug Vaajtswv tej lug foom. Tuabneeg txhaj raug kev puamtsuaj lawv le tej kev txhum kws puab tau ua lug lawm. Vim le ntawd txhaj le seem qee leej lawm xwb.
Cawv txiv maab tshab tsawg zuj zug, hab tej tsob txiv maab qhuav taag lawm. Txhua tug kws muaj kev zoo sab nwgnuav ntxhuv sab kawg,
hab puab tej suab nkauj nogncaas hab suab nruag kws nrov lomzem xauv npo puavleej ntsag taag.
Qhov ntawd tsi muaj kev haus cawv hu nkauj lomzem hlo le; cawv ab kawg nkaus rua cov tuabneeg kws haus cawv.
Huv lub nroog txhua yaam nyob khoob lug ca, hab tej tuabneeg suavdlawg muab puab ntsug rua huv puab tej tsev kuas tsi muaj tuabneeg moog qheb tau hlo le.
Tej tuabneeg tuaj quaj qw tom tej plawv kev vim tsi muaj cawv haus. Kev zoo sab yuav tsi muaj moog ibtxhis; txujkev zoo sab tub raug muab tshem tawm huv lub tebchaws moog lawm.
Lub nroog los raug puamtsuaj, hab muab tej roojvaag nroog rhuav povtseg taag.

Tej xwmtxheej nuav yuav lug raug txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub qaab ntuj nuav. Lub nplajteb yuav zoo ib yaam le lub caij sau qoobloo xaus, hab zoo ib yaam le dle tej txiv ntoo roj sau txhua tsob ntoo hab dle tej nyuas tw txiv maab kawg ntawm cov maab.
Cov tuabneeg seem yuav tsaa suab hu nkauj zoo sab. Cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab nubpoob yuav qw zoo sab rua tug TSWV lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus,
hab cov tuabneeg nyob saab nubtuaj yuav ua tug TSWV tsaug; tej tebchaws kws nyob lawv ntug havtxwv yuav ua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tsaug.

Peb yuav nov tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees hu nkauj dleb dleb tim qaab ntug kawg tuaj qhuas tug kws Ncaaj Nceeg. Tabsis tsi muaj kev ca sab rua kuv le! Kuv raug puamtsuaj lawm, kuv raug puamtsuaj lawm lauj! Kuv raug kev ntxhuv sab kawg le! Cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab yimfuab ntxeev sab. Puab tej kev dlaag hab kev phem fuam luj zuj zug.
Tuabneeg nplajteb! Mej ca le noog kuv has, kev txhawj kev ntshai, qhov hlauv hab ntaa npuj cuab rawv tog mej kev lawm.

Txhua tug kws tsiv txujkev ntshai yuav moog poob lub qhov hlauv, hab txhua tug kws tsiv kuas dlim lub qhov hlauv, yuav moog maag rooj ntaa npuj. Rooj ntug qheb hlo, tuamtsaam naag laub lug sau ntuj lug, hab ua rua lub nplajteb cu ua zug koog.
Lub nplajteb tub tawg ua tej nplais, lub nplajteb faib pis hlo ua tej txaug hab lub nplajteb yoj cuag tug tsi.

Lub nplajteb ndlog ib yaam le tug tuabneeg qaug cawv, hab ua yoj ua yeeg ib yaam le naag xub naag cua ntsawj lub tsev pheebsuab. Tej kev txhum nyaav kawg tsuam lub nplajteb, nwg txhaj qaug hab sawv tsi taug ib zag ntxiv le lawm.
Nub ntawd tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua cov muaj fwjchim kws nyob sau nruab ntug hab cov vaajntxwv huv lub nplajteb nuav.
Vaajtswv yuav sau taagnrho cov vaajntxwv tuaj kaw ua ke rua huv lub qhov aav; nwg yuav muab puab kaw nkaus rua huv tsev lojcuj moog txug nub kws nwg txav txim rua puab.

Lub hli yuav tsaus hab lub nub yuav tsi ci lawm, rua qhov tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav ua vaajntxwv kaav sau lub Roob Xi-oos hab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, nwg tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab yuav tshwm lug rua nwg cov txwjlaug pum.

Tug TSWV, koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv; kuv yuav fwm koj hab qhuas koj lub npe. Koj tau ua ntau yaam txujci tseemceeb tav taag lug lawm, koj ua ncaaj ua nceeg hab ua tseeb lawv le koj tau npaaj tseg thaus u lug lawm.

Koj tau ua rua ntau lub nroog raug kev puamtsuaj taag, hab muab puab tej chaw faajxwm rhuav povtseg huv tuabsi. Tej loog kws peb cov yeebncuab ua tseg rua huv lub nroog yuav tsi txhim khu ntxiv moog taag ibtxhis.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj zug yuav qhuas koj; tej nroog kws tej tsaav tuabneeg limham nyob yuav ntshai koj.

Koj ua lub chaw cawm sav rua cov tuabneeg pluag hab txomnyem, hab cawm puab dlim thaus lub sijhawm kws puab ntsib kev nyuaj sab. Koj ua tsev rua puab nraim naag xub naag cua hab ua dluab ntxoov ntxoo rua puab nraim tshaav. Cov tuabneeg limham ntaus puab ib yaam le cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj tug ntsaa yeej

hab ib yaam le tshaav kub heev huv lub tebchaws ntuj qhua teb nkig. Tabsis Vaajtswv, koj tau ua rua peb tej yeebncuab pluj taag lawm; koj ua rua cov tuabneeg limham tej suab qw ntsag taag ib yaam le tauv fuab roog tshaav ntuj kub.
Nyob sau Roob Xi-oos, tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav npaaj ib rooj mov rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv nplajteb noj, yog ib rooj mov kws muaj tej zaub mov hab tej cawv kws qaab heev.
Thaus nyob sau lub roob nwg yuav muab txhua tsaav tuabneeg tej kev nyuaj sab kws zoo ib yaam le tauv fuab tshem povtseg.

Tug TSWV kws kaav txhua tsaav yaam yuav rhuav txujkev tuag kuas puamtsuaj moog ibtxhis, nwg yuav so txhua tug lub kua muag, hab nwg yuav rhuav qhov kws lub nplajteb nuav tsimtxom nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Tug TSWV yog tug has tej lug nuav.

Thaus muaj tej xwmtxheej nuav lawm, txhua tug tuabneeg yuav has tas, “Nwg yog peb tug Vaajtswv! Peb tso sab plhuav rua nwg, hab nwg tau cawm peb txujsa. Nwg yog tug TSWV! Peb tso sab plhuav rua nwg, nwgnuav peb zoo sab hab xyivfaab heev vim nwg cawm peb dlim lawm.”
Tug TSWV yuav tsomkwm lub Roob Xi-oos nuav, tabsis cov Mau-am yuav raug tsuj ib yaam le tsuj tej quavnyaab npleg rua huv paag hawv.
Puab tsaa teg ib yaam le yuav ua luam dlej, tabsis tug TSWV yuav ua kuas puab poob ntsejmuag, hab puab tej npaab yuav tsaug leeg.
Nwg yuav muab cov Mau-am tej chaw tsomfaaj hab puab tej ntsaa yeej kws sab rhuav kuas puamtsuaj hab tsoo kuas tawg taag xyaw moov aav.
Nub ntawd yuav hu zaaj nkauj nuav nyob huv tebchaws Yudas: “Peb muaj ib lub nroog ruaj khov heev; Vaajtswv yog tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv lub nroog kuas muaj kev cawm dlim.
Ca le qheb tej roojvaag moog tso tsaav tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg kws ua lawv le Vaajtswv lub sab nyam moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.
Tug TSWV, koj muab txujkev kaaj sab kws zoo kawg nkaus rua cov tuabneeg kws muab sab npuab koj; vim puab tso sab plhuav rua koj.
Ca sab rua tug TSWV, nwg yuav ua phaab pobzeb thaiv peb moog ibtxhis.
Nwg txu kuas cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb poob fwjchim; nwg muab cov tuabneeg kws muaj zug lub nroog rhuav kuas puamtsuaj, hab muab tej ntsaa yeej tsoo kuas qaug taag rua huv aav.
Nwgnuav cov tuabneeg txomnyem hab cov tuabneeg pluag yuav muab lub nroog ntawd tsuj nthi rua huv puab xibtaws.”
Tug TSWV, koj ua txujkev dlu rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg taug; txujkev kws puab taug taj heev.
Peb yeej coj rawv koj txuj kevcai, hab peb tog rawv koj tuab leeg xwb; peb ncu ntsoov koj lub npe rua nruab sab.
Mo ntuj kuv lub sab xaav ntsoov txug koj; nruab nub kuv lub sab xyivfaab hlo nrhav koj. Thaus koj txav txim rua tuabneeg nplajteb, puab yuav paub koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg.

Txawm yog koj ua zoo npaum twg rua cov tuabneeg sab phem los puab yeej tsi paub txujkev ncaaj nceeg hlo le. Txawm yog puab nyob huv lub tebchaws kws muaj kev ncaaj nceeg nuav los puab tseem pheej ua kev txhum tsi tseg, hab tsi leeg paub koj lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus.

Tug TSWV, koj yeej tsaa teg sab kawg tabsis puab tsi pum le; ca puab pum koj txujkev mob sab rua koj tsaav tuabneeg, hab ca puab raug txaajmuag. Ca cov suavtawg kws koj npaaj tseg rua koj cov yeebncuab kub puab.
Tug TSWV, koj pub kev thaajyeeb rua peb; txhua yaam kws peb ua tav lawm, tub yog koj paab peb ua.
Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, peb raug lwm tug tswv kaav peb, tabsis peb leeg paub koj lub npe nkaus xwb.
Nwgnuav puab tub tuag taag hab tsi caj sa le lawm. Puab tej ntsujplig yuav tsi sawv; vim koj yog tug rau txim r ua puab hab ua kuas puab puamtsuaj.
Tabsis tug TSWV, koj tau ua rua peb tsaav tuabneeg fuamvaam, hab nthuav peb lub tebchaws kuas dlaav; koj yuav tau txais koob meej zoo kawg nkaus le.
Tug TSWV, koj rau txim rua koj tsaav tuabneeg, hab puab yuav thov koj thaus puab raug kev nyuaj sab.
Tug TSWV, koj ua rua peb quaj, ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws quaj thaus nwg mob plaab yug mivnyuas.
Peb suab mivnyuas hab mob plaab, tabsis peb yug tsi tau dlaabtsi. Peb coj tsi tau kev cawm dlim lug rua huv lub nplajteb; hab peb muab tsi tau txujsa rua tuabneeg lug yug huv nplajteb nuav.

Peb cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm, yuav rov muaj sa dlua! Puab tej cev yuav sawv rov qaab lug muaj sa. Cov tuabneeg kws pw huv tej qhov ntxaa yuav sawv lug hu nkauj zoo sab. Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv yuav tsaa cov tuabneeg kws tuag tau ntev lawm sawv lug; ib yaam le lub lwg dlej kws ci rua lub nplajteb thaus sawv ntxuv.
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le tsiv rov qaab moog rua huv mej tej tsev, hab kaw qhovrooj rua. Nkaum tog kuas Vaajtswv txujkev chim dlhau tsaiv.

Tug TSWV nqeg sau ntuj kws yog nwg qhov chaw nyob lug rau txim rua tuabneeg nplajteb, vim puab tej kev txhum. Aav yuav tsi nqug cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tua tej ntshaav, hab lub nplajteb yuav tsi faus cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tua tuag lub cev.

Nub ntawd tug TSWV yuav siv nwg lub fwjchim hab nwg raab ntaaj rau txim rua tug Levi-athas  kws yog tug naab txwj naab laug kws tsiv lawm, tug zaaj ntawd yog tug naab txwj naab laug kws nkhaus ntswj pis yog, hab nwg yuav muab tug zaaj kws nyob huv havtxwv tua povtseg.
Nub ntawd tug TSWV yuav has tas, “Lub vaaj txiv maab kws ntxim sab:
‘Kuv kws yog tug TSWV, kuv tsomkwm nwg; hab kuv rau sab ntso ywg dlej rua nwg txhua lub sijhawm. Kuv zuv rawv nwg nruab nub mo ntuj, kuas tsi xob muaj leejtwg tuaj ua phem rua nwg.
Kuv tsi chim rua lub vaaj txiv maab lawm. Yog tej maab xuavpaug hab ntoo xuavpaug sawv ua rog tawmtsaam kuv, kuv yuav muab puab hlawv kuas kub nyab taag huv tuabsi.
Tabsis yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg cov yeebncuab xaav kuas kuv tsomkwm puab, ca puab cog kev phoojywg nrug kuv. Ca puab cog phoojywg nrug kuv.’ ”
Muaj ib nub tom ntej nuav, Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv yuav nrhau caag ib yaam le ntoo, tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees yuav hlaav nplooj hab tawg paaj. Hab tej txiv yuav puv nkaus lub nplajteb.
Nwg puas tau ntaus puab ib yaam le nwg ntaus cov tuabneeg kws tuaj ntaus puab? Lossis puab puas raug hlais ib yaam le hlais cov tuabneeg kws tuaj hlais puab?
Tug TSWV rau txim rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws yog tso lwm tsaav tuabneeg tuaj nteg puab. Nwg coj puab tawm nrug cov cua phem kws ntsawj saab nubtuaj tuaj moog.

Qhov kws yuav zaam tau Yakhauj lub txim, yog yuavtsum muab tej pobzeb kws teeb ua lub thaaj tsoo kuas tawg ua moov taag ib yaam le moov sib, hab tsi tseg ib lub thaaj teev tug mlom quaspuj Aselas lossis tej thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab nyob qhov twg le lawm.

Lub nroog kws txhim zeb khov kho raug puamtsuaj taag. Nwg yuav ua suabpuam ib yaam le tej roob mojsaab qhua tsi muaj dlaabtsi. Hab nwg yuav caj ua ib lub tshaav zaub rua tej mivnyuas yaaj noj, pw hab zum zaub.
Thaus tej ceg ntoo qhuav lawm ces yeej yuav luv, hab tej quaspuj yuav moog khaws lug ua tawg rauv. Vim tsaav tuabneeg nuav tsi totaub, mas Vaajtswv tug kws tsim puab yuav tsi hlub puab.

Nub ntawd, txij ndlua ntawm tug dlej Efalates moog txug ndlua nraag cov Iziv tug nrimteb; tug TSWV yuav txheeb nwg tsaav tuabneeg ib tug zuj zug, ib yaam le cais tej npluag nplej tawm ntawm cov tseem nplej.

Hab nub ntawd, luas yuav tshuab raaj tshuab xyu, cov Yixalayees kws moog pluj rua peg tebchaws Axilias hab raug ntab moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm, yuav rov qaab lug pehawm tug TSWV sau lub roob dlawbhuv  huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Cov Efalayees yuav raug kev puamtsuaj lauj! Cov thawjcoj kws quav cawv lub mom yuav poob sau puab taubhau lug ib yaam le tej paaj ntoos zeeg. Puab pleev roj tsw qaab hab tsaa taubhau sab sab, tabsis puab pw ib yaam le tug tuabneeg qaug cawv kws tub yuav tuag.

Saib maj, tug TSWV npaaj tau ib tug kws muaj fwjchim hab muaj zug heev tuaj tawmtsaam puab; nwg yuav tuaj ib yaam le ib nthwv cua dlaaj cua dlub nrug lawg, hab zoo ib yaam le ib nthwv naag xub naag cua ua rua dlej nphau nphwv lug nyaab thoob plawg puab lub tebchaws.
Cov Efalayees tej thawjcoj kws quav cawv hab khaavtheeb yuav raug muab tsuj ntag rua huv xibtaws.
Hab cov thawjcoj kws khaavtheeb ntawd, lub koob meej taabtom yuav pluj moog ib yaam le thawj phaum txiv ncuav pas kws xub sav, hab leejtwg pum los ca le dle noj.
Muaj ib nub tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav ua puab lub mom yeebkoob kws muaj meejmom kawg nkaus, hab ci ntsaa ab rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws seem.
Nwg yuav pub lub sab kws muaj kev ncaaj nceeg rua tug tuabneeg kws txav txim hab txhawb cov tubrog kws zuv ntawm cov roojvaag nroog kuas muaj lub sab tawv.

Cov povthawj hab cov cevlug puavleej qaug cawv ndlog puj poog. Vim puab haus cov cawv kws muaj zug heev, puab txhaj tsi sis hum, puab ndlog puj poog tsi meejpem, puab txhaj tsi totaub tej ywgtoog kws Vaajtswv qha, hab tsi paub tu tej plaub ntug kws luas coj tuaj rua puab has.
Puab tej rooj lu ntuav qas quas ntsuav, tsi muaj ib qho kws yuav huv sab hlo le.
Puab ywg kuv kawg le. Puab has tas, “Nwg yuav qha tej kev txawj ntse rua leejtwg? Hab nwg yuav pav nwg tej lug rua leejtwg? Nwg qha rua cov mivnyuas kws nyavnyuas tso mig tseg los?
Nwg ua tuab zoo qha rua peb kawg le, nwg qha ib lus rua ib lus, ib kaab rua ib kaab hab ib zaaj rua ib zaaj.”
Yog mej tsi noog kuv lug, ces Vaajtswv yuav khaiv lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws has lug txawv tuaj qha mej.
Tug TSWV caw kuas mej suavdlawg ca le su hab nyob tso sab plhuav tabsis mej tsi noog nwg lug le.

Tub yog vim le nuav tug TSWV txhaj le qha mej ib lus rua ib lus, ib kaab rua ib kaab hab ib zaaj rua ib zaaj. Mej txhaj dlawm txhua kaujruam; hab mej yuav maag ntaa npuj, raug mob hab raug nteg coj moog kaw.
Mej cov thawjcoj khaavtheeb kws kaav cov pejxeem huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, mej ca le noog tug TSWV has.
Rua qhov mej has tas, “Peb tau coglug nrug kev tuag hab tubtuag teb lawm, mas peb tso sab has tas thaus kev puamtsuaj lug, peb yuav tsi tuag, vim peb vaamkhom tej lug dlaag ntawd tsomkwm peb.”

Tub yog vim le ntawd tug TSWV kws kaav txhua tsaav yaam txhaj has tas, “Kuv muab ib lub pobzeb kws tub sim hab tawv heev kws yog tug caag cog ruaj khov lug tag lub nroog Xi-oos: ‘Yog leejtwg ntseeg nwg, tug ntawd yuav tsi raug kev ntxhuv sab.’

Kuv yuav muab kev ncaaj nceeg ua txuj hlua ntsuag qhov ntev, hab kuv muab kev tseeb ua lub thauj ntsuag qhov ntseg;” Hab lawg yuav ntaus tej kev dlaag kws mej vaamkhom, hab dlej yuav kuav mej tej chaw cawm sav kuas puamtsuaj.
Tej lug kws mej tau cog nrug kev tuag yuav raug muab rhuav moog, hab tej lug kws mej pum zoo nrug tubtuag teb yuav muab tso povtseg; thaus kev puamtsuaj lug, mej txhaj raug kev pemsij.

Txhua zag kws kev puamtsuaj yuav lug coj mej moog, nwg yuav lug ib taagkig dlhau rua ib taagkig, ib nub dlhau rua ib nub hab ib mos dlhau rua ib mos. Txhua zaaj lug kws Vaajtswv has yuav coj kev ntshai lug ntxiv xwb.
Koj zoo ib yaam le tug tuabneeg nyob huv zaaj paajlug kws has tas, nwg pw lub txaaj kws tuab lu tsi txaus xyaab, hab vuv dlaim choj nqaim kws npug tsi taag nwg lub cev.
Tug TSWV yuav sawv sau lub Roob Pelaxees hab huv lub haav Nkinpe-oos, ua nwg teg num, yog teg num kws suavdlawg tsi tau pum dlua. Nwg yuav ua kuas nwg teg num tav, yog teg num kws txawv kawg le.

Tsi xob saib tsi taug kuv tej lug ceebtoom, nyob tsaam txuj saw hlau hajyam yuav khi mej ruaj. Kuv tub nov tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus txav txim sab yuav muab lub tebchaws ua kuas puamtsuaj lawm.
Tig qhovntsej noog lub suab kws kuv has; ua tuab zoo noog tej lug kws kuv qha.
Tug tuabneeg laij teb tseb nplej, nwg naj nub laij le los? Nwg naj nub moog laij hab haiv kuas tej aav ntxheev los?

Thaus nwg moog pheej cov aav taj lawm, nwg txawm tseb noob zaub txhwb qab hab zaub txhwb nyug rua. Nwg cog nplej ua tej kaab hab cog pobkws  rua tej thaaj kws ca cog pobkws, hab muab lwm yaam noob moog tseb rua ntawm nwg tej ntug teb.
Nwg yeej paub ua nwg yaam num, rua qhov Vaajtswv qha rua nwg.
Nwg tsi siv qws ntaus nplej moog ntaus zaub txhwb nyug lossis nwg tsi thawb tsheb moog luam zaub txhwb qab le; tabsis nwg siv tug paas kws sib moog ntaus zaub txhwb qab hab zaub txhwb nyug xwb.
Yuavtsum muab nplej zum ua moov puab ncuav; tsi yog nwg naj nub tsoov nplej moog ibtxhis le. Txawm yog nwg caab neeg hai tsheb moog tsuj nplej los neeg yeej tsi tsuj tej ntsab kuas ntsoog le.
Tej tswvyim ntawd puavleej yog lug ntawm tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lug xwb. Nwg yog tug tuavxaam kws zoo heev hab muaj tswvyim kawg nkaus le.
Yeluxalees kws yog Vaajtswv lub thaaj hab lub nroog kws Daviv tsuam yeej yuav raug puamtsuaj lauj! Ca le ua kevcai hab ua rooj noj rooj haus ib xyoos dlhau ib xyoos lawv le caij nyoog kws teem tseg,

Vaajtswv maam tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug lub nroog kws hu ua, “Vaajtswv lub thaaj.” Thaus ntawd yuav muaj kev quaj nyav, hab taagnrho lub nroog yuav zoo ib yaam le lub thaaj kws muaj ntshaav plooj nkaus sau.
Vaajtswv yuav tsuam yeej hab ua chaw tsomfaaj puagncig lub nroog, hab yuav tawmtsaam koj. Kuv yuav tsuam yeej tawmtsaam koj ib yaam le Daviv.

Ces koj yuav has lug huv lub qhov kws tub heev tuaj, koj yuav has lug huv qaab tivtxwv tuaj; koj lub suab yuav has huv qhov aav tuaj ib yaam le dlaab lub suab, hab koj yuav has lug ntxhi huv aav tuaj.

Yeluxalees, koj cov yeebncuab kws coob ua npoj ntwg tuaj tua koj yuav raug ntsawj yaa ib yaam le moov aav, hab puab cov tubrog kws txaus ntshai, yuav raug ntsawj yaa ib yaam le tej npluag nplej. Tuab plag ntshis xwb
tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav lug cawm mej, nwg yuav ua xub nroo, ua aav qeeg, ua cua dlaaj cua dlub hab ua tej nplaim tawg kws hlawv kuas kub dlu lug lug paab mej.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws tuaj tua lub nroog kws yog Vaajtswv lub thaaj, puab tej cuabyeej ua rog hab txhua yaam puavleej yuav yaaj hab pluj huv tuabsi ib yaam le ua npau suav mo ntuj,

hab zoo le tug tuabneeg tshaib plaab kws ua npau suav noj mov, tabsis thaus tsim lug tseem tshaib plaab le qub lossis zoo le tug tuabneeg nqhes dlej kws nwg ua npau suav haus dlej, tabsis thaus tsim lug tseem nqhes dlej hab qaa qhuav qhawv. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws tuaj tua lub nroog Yeluxalees yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd ntaag.
Ca le ua tuabneeg ruag los mas! Ca le ua tuabneeg dligmuag los mas! Ca le vwm loj vwm leg, tabsis tsi yog vwm cawv, ca le qaug puj poog tabsis tsi yog qaug kua txiv maab.
Tug TSWV ua kuas mej ncaws dlaab ndlub hab tsaug zug looj hlas. Tub tsimnyog cov cevlug ua suavdlawg lub qhovmuag pum kev, tabsis Vaajtswv muab puab tej qhovmuag npug lawm.

Lub ntsab lug kws txhua tug cev Vaajtswv lug ua ywgtoog pum yuav muab zais tsi pub mej paub zoo ib yaam le thooj ntawv kws ntaus homthawj rua lawm. Yog mej coj moog rua ib tug kws paub nyeem hab thov kuas nwg nyeem rua mej noog, nwg yuav teb has tas, “Kuv tsi nyeem rua qhov ntaus homthawj rua lawm.”
Yog mej muab thooj ntawv ntawd rua tug kws tsi paub nyeem hab thov nwg nyeem rua mej noog, nwg yuav teb has tas, “Kuv tsi paub nyeem.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov tuabneeg nuav lub ncauj qhuas kuv, tabsis puab lub sab tsi npuab kuv, tej lug kws puab qhuas kuv tsi muaj qaabhau le. Qhov kws puab pehawm kuv tsuas yog ua lawv le kevcai hab lawv le tuabneeg qha xwb.

Vim le ntawd, kuv yuav rov ua tej txujci kws txawv heev rua cov tuabneeg nuav pum dlua, kuas puab xaav tsi thoob le; cov tuabneeg ntse lub tswvyim yuav ruag taag, hab kev txawj ntse ntawm cov tuabneeg ntse yuav pluj taag.”

Puab cov kws muab tej tswvyim zais tsi pub tug TSWV paub yuav raug puamtsuaj lauj! Puab ua tej yaam nraim nkoog huv qhov tsaus ntuj nti, hab xaav has tas tsi muaj leejtwg pum hab paub has tas puab ua dlaabtsi.

Puab pum qhov zoo yog qhov phem! Tug puab laujkaub aav hab cov aav, yaam twg yog yaam tseemceeb dlua? Yaam kws tug tuabneeg ntawd ua, puab puas muaj cuabkaav has rua tug kws puab tas, “Koj tub tsi tau puab kuv los sav”? Lossis yaam kws nwg puab ntawd puas has rua tug puab tas, “Koj tub tsi muaj kev txawj ntse le.”
Puas yog tshuav tsi ntev lawm, lub haav zoov Lenpanoos yuav dlhau moog ua teb, hab tej teb yuav rov ua haav zoov?
Thaus ntawd, cov tuabneeg kws laag ntseg yuav nov luas nyeem ntawv, hab cov tuabneeg dligmuag kws ua neej tsaus ntuj nti yuav pum kev.
Cov tuabneeg pluag hab cov tuabneeg txu fwjchim yuav tau kev kaaj sab lug ntawm tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv.
Tug kws tsimtxom luas lwm tug, hab pheej thuam Vaajtswv yuav pluj moog. Txhua tug tuabneeg kws pheej nyam ua txhum yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.

Cov tuabneeg kws saib tsi taug lwm tug, cov tuabneeg kws txheem tej plaub ntug tua tuabneeg, hab cov tuabneeg kws ua timkhawv tsi tseeb ntxo cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg kuas raug txav txim, Vaajtswv yuav muab ua kuas puamtsuaj taag.

Vim le ntawd tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws cawm Anplahaas dlim tej kev ntxhuv sab has tas, “Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej yuav tsi raug txaajmuag, hab mej lub ntsejmuag yuav tsi ntshaus ntxiv le lawm.
Thaus mej pum tej tubki kws kuv yuav pub rua mej, ces mej yuav paub has tas, kuv yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv. Mej yuavtsum fwm kuv hab paub ntshai kuv.
Cov tuabneeg ruag yuav totaub, hab cov kws ywg tujtawg yuav nyam kawm Vaajtswv txuj kevcai.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Yudas cov thawjcoj raug puamtsuaj vim puab ntxeev sab rua kuv. Puab ua lawv le puab lub tswvyim kws tsi yog kuv muab rua puab, hab puab moog coglug nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg tawmtsaam kuv, puab txhaj ua kev txhum tsub kev txhum ntxiv zuj zug.
Puab moog cuag cov Iziv kuas paab puab, tabsis puab tsi saablaaj rua kuv le. Puab xaav kuas cov Iziv paab puab, yog le ntawd puab txhaj tso sab rua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv.
Tabsis Falaus txujkev paab yuav ua rua puab raug kev txaajmuag, hab cov Iziv txujkev tiv thaiv yuav ua rua puab poob ntsejmuag.
Txawm yog puab cov numtswv moog txug rua huv cov Iziv lub nroog Xau-as hab lub nroog Hanes lawm los

cov Yudas yuav raug kev txaajmuag, rua qhov tsaav tuabneeg ntawd ibtxwm paab tsi tau puab, tsaav tuabneeg ntawd yeej paab tsi tau lossis tsi muaj nqes rua puab le, tabsis tsuas coj kev txaajmuag hab kev poob ntsejmuag lug rua puab xwb.”

Ntawm nuav yog cov lug kws Vaajtswv has rua cov tsaj kws nyob nraag taj suabpuam tas: “Cov numtswv taug kev moog hlaa huv lub tebchaws kws muaj kev txhawj ntshai, muaj tsuv ntxhuav, muaj naab hab muaj tej zaaj kws txwj yaa nyob. Puab muab puab tej khoom muaj nqes rua puab tej neeg luav hab ntxhuav thauj moog pub tsaav tuabneeg kws paab tsi tau puab.
Cov Iziv txujkev paab tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi le. Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj tis ib lub npe tshab rua cov Iziv hu ua, ‘Tug zaaj kws ua tsi tau dlaabtsi.’ ”
Taamsim nuav koj ca le moog nyob taabmeeg puab hab muab sau ua ib phoo ntawv khaws tseg, kuas yaav tom ntej txhaj le muaj ntawv ua povthawj has txug puab tej kev txhum moog ibtxhis le.
Vim puab yog cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab rua Vaajtswv, hab yog cov tuabneeg dlaag kws tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug qhuab qha.
Puab has kuas cov cev Vaajtswv lug nyob tuabywv. Puab has tas, “Tsi xob qha tej qhov tseeb rua peb paub. Qha tej kws peb nyam rua peb noog xwb. Ca peb ua lawv le peb lub sab nyam xwb.
Ca le tsiv moog hab tsi xob thaiv peb kev. Peb tsi xaav nov mej has txug cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv hlo le.”
Tabsis cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv has tas: “Mej saib tsi taug kuv tej lug qha, mej tsuas nyam ua limham hab dlaag ntxag xwb.
Mej yog tuabneeg txhum plaub. Mej zoo le tug ntsaa yeej sab sab kws tawg pleb thoob plawg lawm; tuab plag ntshis xwb mej yuav qaug tawg taag.
Mej yuav tawg ua tej dlaim ib yaam le tej laujkaub aav, tej txhais kws tawg ntawd tsi muaj ib dlaim kws yuav zoo khaws lug yawm hluav ncaig lossis tub tsi zoo has dlej huv thoob lug haus le.”

Cov Yixalayees tug TSWV dlawbhuv kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua suavdlawg has tas, “Ca le tig rov lug hab su, mej txhaj yuav dlim; nyob tuabywv hab ca sab rua kuv, mej txhaj yuav muaj zug.” Tabsis mej tsi kaam ua le ntawd.
Tabsis mej caij neeg tsiv kuas dlim mej cov yeebncuab. Mej ca le tsiv los mas! Mej xaav has tas mej cov neeg dlha ceev heev, tabsis cov kws caum mej qaab tseem ceev tshaaj mej lawm hab!

Thaus yeebncuab ib tug tubrog tuaj hem mej, txawm yog mej muaj ib txheeb leej los mej yuav ca le tsiv; hab luas tsib tug tubrog tuaj hem mej xwb los mej yuav tsiv taagnrho. Mej yuav tsi tshuav ib yaam dlaabtsi seem le, tsuas tshuav tug ncej chij kws txhus sau ncov roob xwb.

Tug TSWV tog ntev lawm yuav foom koob moov rua mej; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj lug hlub mej. Rua qhov tug TSWV yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj kev ncaaj nceeg; cov tuabneeg kws tog nwg yuav tau txais koob moov.
Mej cov kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees yuav tsi quaj ib zag ntxiv le lawm. Tug TSWV yog tug kws muaj kev hlub, thaus mej thov nwg paab, nwg yuav teb mej tej lug thov.

Tug TSWV yuav muab lub ncuav kws yog txujkev txomnyem lug rua mej noj hab cov dlej kws yog kev nyuaj sab lug rua mej haus, txawm le ntawd los mej tug Xwbfwb yuav tsi tsiv nkaum mej le lawm, mej lub qhovmuag yuav pum nwg.
Thaus mej taug kev moog saab xis lossis saab txhumphem, mej yuav nov nwg lub suab hu tom qaab tuaj has tas, “Txujkev tseeb yog txuj nuav. Ca le taug txuj nuav ntaag.”
Ces mej yuav muab mej tej mlom kws muab nyaj nchuav hab tej mlom kws muab kub vuam, coj moog povtseg ib yaam le tej quaspuj dlaim khaub dluag coj ntxhua, hab qw has tas, “Ca le tawm ntawm kuv moog.”

Tug TSWV yuav tso naag lug ywg mej tej noob qoob kws tseb rua huv aav, kuas tej qoobloo yuav tuaj hlub mog nyoos, hab yuav ua rua mej sau tau qoobloo ntau, hab mej tej tsaj txhu yuav tau lub tshaav zaub kws mog nyoos noj.
Mej tej nyuj hab tej neeg luav kws laij teb, yuav tau noj tej zaub zoo kws muab dluav hab rawg hlau yawm lug rua noj.

Nub kws mej txeeb tau mej cov yeebncuab tej chaw faajxwm hab tua puab cov tuabneeg tuag taag lawm, thaus ntawd tej kwj dleg sau tej hauv roob hab tej pov roob sab yuav muaj dlej txhawv ndlwg ntshab si lug.

Lub hli yuav ci ib yaam le lub nub, hab lub nub yuav ci tshaaj le lub nub ibtxwm ci lug lawm xyaa npaug ntxiv, ib yaam le muab xyaa nub lug ua ib zag ci. Thaus ntawd tug TSWV yuav qhwv hab khu nwg tsaav tuabneeg tej qhov txhaab kws nwg tso lug raug puab.
Saib maj! Yuav pum tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab tim qaab ntuj kawg tuaj. Nplaim tawg hab paa tawg yog nwg txujkev chim. Nwg tej lug kub ib yaam le nplaim suavtawg.

Nwg tso ib nthwv cua ntsawj ua nwg ntej ib yaam le dlej tshoob txhua yaam moog. Nthwv cua ntawd ua rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg raug kev puamtsuaj, hab muab khawb hlau lug saam xauv rua cov tuabneeg ntawd coj puab moog yuam kev.

Tabsis mej cov kws yog Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg, mej yuav zoo sab hab hu nkauj le mo kws mej ua kevcai noj rooj mov dlawbhuv. Mej yuav zoo sab ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws tshuab raaj tshuab xyu moog rua sau tug TSWV lub Roob kws yog cov Yixalayees lub Pobzeb.

Tug TSWV yuav ua rua suavdlawg nov nwg lub suab kws muaj fwjchim hab pum nwg txujkev chim kws luj kawg nkaus. Qhov ntawd yuav muaj nplaim tawg, fuab dlub, lawg pobzeb hab naag xub naag cua tsaus nti nrov nroo ntwg lug.
Thaus puab nov tug TSWV lub suab hab nwg muab nwg raab qws ntaus puab, cov Axilias yuav ntshai heev.

Txhua qhov kws tug TSWV muab raab nplawm kws yog txujkev rau txim lug nplawm puab, mas yuav muaj suab raaj suab xyu hab suab nkauj nogncaas nrov ntsoog qeeg; Vaajtswv yuav tua cov Axilias huv tshaav rog kuas puab puamtsuaj taag.

Lub cubtawg cig ntsaa thuav kws tub npaaj tseg yuav hlawv cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv ntawd tub hab dlaav heev, hab muab tawg lug teeb puv nkaus rua. Tug TSWV yuav tshuab nplaim tawg leejfaaj moog kub cov tawg kuas cig.

Cov tuabneeg kws moog thov kuas cov Iziv paab, yuav raug puamtsuaj lauj! Puab ca sab rua cov Iziv cov tubrog caij neeg, tej tsheb neeg ntaus rog, hab cov tubrog, tabsis puab tsi ca sab rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv Dlawbhuv kuas nwg paab puab le.

Tug TSWV yeej paub tej kws nwg ua lawm! Nwg tso kev puamtsuaj lug, nwg tsi thim nwg tej lug rov qaab. Nwg rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws ua phem ua qas hab cov kws paab cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas ntawd.

Cov Iziv yog tuabneeg xwb, tsi yog Vaajtswv; puab tej neeg yog tsaj xwb, tsi yog ntsujplig. Thaus tug TSWV xyaab teg tuaj, cov tuabneeg kws tuaj paab puab yuav raug tsuj, hab puab cov tuabneeg kws tau kev paab los yuav qaug pawg lug, hab puab suavdlawg yuav raug puamtsuaj ua ke.

Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Txawm yog cov tswv yug yaaj qw hab nthe npaum twg los tug tsuv ntxhuav kws tum tau tug yaaj lawm yeej tsi ntshai hab tsi tsiv le; ib yaam le ntawd ntaag, yeej tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi txwv tau kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuas tsiv tsi xob tsomkwm lub Roob Xi-oos le.
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav tsomkwm hab tiv thaiv lub nroog Yeluxalees ib yaam le tug noog yaa sau nwg lub zeg tsomkwm nwg cov mivnyuas ntaag.”
Vaajtswv has tas, “Tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, mej ua txhum rua kuv hab tawmtsaam kuv lawm. Tabsis nwgnuav, mej ca le rov lug cuag kuv!
Nub ntawd mej txhua tug yuav muab tej mlom nyaj mlom kub kws mej nchuav ntawd, sau huv tuabsi coj moog povtseg.
Cov Axilias yuav raug puamtsuaj taag rua huv tshaav rog, tabsis tsi yog tuabneeg lub fwjchim ua. Cov Axilias yuav tsiv tawm huv tshaav rog, hab puab cov tub hluas yuav raug nteg moog ua luas qhev.

Puab tug fuabtais ntshai heev hab tsiv tshee nyo lawm, hab cov numtswv los ntshai kawg nkaus le, puab yuav muab puab tej chij ua rog tso povtseg huv tuabsi.” Tug TSWV kws muaj lub chaw pehawm nyob sau lub Roob Xi-oos, hab nwg lub cubtawg kws hlawv khoom fij nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees yog tug has ntaag.
Mej saib, yuav muaj ib tug vaajntxwv kaav ncaaj nceeg, hab nwg cov numtswv los yuav tswjfwm lawv le txujkev ncaaj nceeg.

Cov numtswv ntawd txhua tug yuav zoo ib yaam le lub tsev kws thaiv cua hab lub chaw nkaum cua dlaaj cua dlub. Puab yuav zoo ib yaam le tej dlej kws ndlwg huv taj suabpuam, hab zoo ib yaam le lub tsua kws ntxoov lub taj mojsaab qhua.
Cov tuabneeg kws qhovmuag pum kev yuav pum moog le, hab cov tuabneeg kws qhovntsej nov lug yuav nov moog le.
Cov tuabneeg kws ua dlog ua dlig yuav txawj ntse hab paub qaabhau, hab cov tuabneeg kws nplaig txhaav yuav has tau lug meej.
Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg xaav has tas, tuabneeg ruag yog tuabneeg tsimtxaj lossis has tas tug tuabneeg sab nkhaus yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg.

Tug tuabneeg ruag yeej has tej zaaj ruag hab nwg lub sab yeej xaav ntsoov ua tej yaam phem; nwg ua tsi ncaaj, has lug saib tsi taug tug TSWV, nwg tsi pub mov rua cov tuabneeg tshaib plaab noj, hab nwg tsi pub dlej rua cov tuabneeg nqhes dlej haus.
Tug tuabneeg sab nkhaus yeej muaj lub sab phem hab nwg ua kev phem nkaus xwb; nwg dlaag noj dlaag haus hab tuavhuv txuv cov tuabneeg pluag lub neej hab yuam cov tuabneeg txomnyem txuj cai.
Tabsis tug tuabneeg tsimtxaj ua qhov ncaaj hab tuav rawv txuj cai xwb.
Cov quaspuj kws ua neej nyob qhuas ntxhas tsi txob tsi txhawj dlaabtsi, mej ca le noog tej lug kws kuv has!
Nwgnuav mej noj nyob tsau npo, tabsis lwm xyoo txug lub caij nuav mej yuav txomnyem ntsuav, vim yuav tsi muaj txiv maab rua mej dle lawm.
Cov quaspuj kws ua neej nyob qhuas ntxhas tsi txob tsi txhawj dlaabtsi; nwgnuav mej ca le ntshai ua ib ce tshee nyo; ca le hle mej tej tsoog tsho povtseg hab muab ntaub tsaaj lug npua.
Ca le ntaus mej hauvsab hab tu sab, vim mej tej teb kws zoo qoobloo, hab tej vaaj txiv maab kws txi txiv ncw tub puamtsuaj taag,
nroj tsuag hab maab xuavpaug tub tuaj laum kuv tsaav tuabneeg tej aav lawm; txhua lub tsev kws tuabneeg nyob kaaj sab lug, hab tej nroog kws muaj tuabneeg nyob lomzem xauv npo ca le quaj!

Txawm yog tug vaajntxwv lub loog los yuav muab tso povtseg hab lub tuamceeb nroog los yuav ua suabpuam taag. Tej tsev hab tej chaw faajxwm yuav raug puamtsuaj moog ibtxhis. Yuav ua qhov chaw rua tej neeg luav qus tau kev zoo sab hab ua tshaav zaub rua yaaj noj.
Tabsis tug TSWV yuav khaiv nwg tug ntsujplig lug rua peb dlua ib zag ntxiv. Lub tebchaws kws ua quavpoj yuav rov ua lub tebchaws kws aav zoo, hab tej teb yuav zoo qoob heev.
Yuav muaj kev ncaaj nceeg nyob huv taj suabpuam, hab kev ua zoo nyob huv tej teb kws muaj qoobloo nplua mag.
Thaus ntawd txhua tug yuav ua ncaaj ua nceeg, yuav muaj kev thaajyeeb hab nyob kaaj sab lug moog ibtxhis.
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg yuav nyob tso sab lug ntawm qhov chaw kws muaj kev thaajyeeb huv lub tsev kws nyob kaaj sab lug hab tsi muaj kev ntxhuv sab dlaabtsi.
(Txawm yog lawg yuav lug ntaus tej haav zoov, hab lub nroog yuav raug muab tsoo kuas puamtsuaj taag)
los mej txhua tug ca le zoo sab, vim muaj dlej txaus lug ywg tej noob qoob kws mej tseb, hab muaj tshaav zaub txhua qhov rua mej tej neeg luav hab tej nyuj noj.

Thov kuas peb cov yeebncuab raug kev puamtsuaj! Txawm yog tsi muaj leejtwg fuab hab ntxeev sab rua puab los puab moog fuab hab ntxeev sab rua luas. Tabsis thaus kawg puab yuav raug luas fuab hab ntxeev sab rua puab.
Tug TSWV, thov koj taabncuab peb. Peb ca sab ntsoov rua koj xwb. Thov tsomkwm peb ib nub dlhau ib nub hab cawm peb thaus peb raug kev ntxhuv sab.
Thaus koj tuaj peb tog tua peb cov yeebncuab, mas puab tawg tsiv ri sua.
Tej khoom kws mej fuab tau lug yuav raug luas muab sau moog tso ua ke ib yaam le nteg tej kooj txomfaav.
Tug TSWV yog tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, nwg kaav txhua tsaav yaam. Nwg yuav ua rua lub nroog Yeluxalees muaj txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab kev tseeb.

Hab nwg ua rua tsaav tuabneeg nyob ruaj khov. Nwg tsomkwm nwg tsaav tuabneeg txhua lub sijhawm, nwg pub puab muaj tswvyim, kev txawj ntse hab kev cawm dlim. Qhov kws puab fwm tug TSWV yog kev vaammeej hab kev npluanuj rua puab.
Cov tuabneeg sab tawv taabtom tsaa suab hu kuas luas paab. Cov numtswv kws nrhav kev sis humxeeb, puab quaj tu sab nrho.

Tej nam kev luj nphob xuav tseg, hab tsi muaj leejtwg tau luag taug. Puab tsi ua lawv le tej lug cog tseg, hab puab tsi ua lawv le tej lug kws ua timkhawv, hab puab ib leeg yuav tsi fwm ib leeg le lawm.

Lub tebchaws quaj ntsuag hab tsaug muas heev; tej ntoo peg Roob Lenpanoos ntsws hab qhuav taag. Lub Haav Saloos kws zoo qoobloo ua suabpuam taag. Tej ntoo huv tebchaws Npasaas hab sau Roob Kalemees tuag hab zeeg nplooj taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg tas, “Nwgnuav kuv yuav ua ib yaam num qha rua suavdlawg pum has tas kuv muaj Fwjchim Luj npaum le caag.
Mej npaaj sab ua tej kws tsi muaj nqes hab txhua yaam kws mej ua tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi. Mej cov paa zoo ib yaam le cub suavtawg kws yuav kub kuas mej puamtsuaj moog.
Mej yuav tawg ntsoog ntxawg le tej pobzeb kws muab hlawv ua moov sib, ib yaam le tej haav xuavpaug kws muab hlawv ua tshauv taag lawm.
Kuas mej cov kws nyob dleb hab nyob ze tau nov tej kws kuv ua taag lug nuav, hab leeg paub kuv lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus.”
Cov tuabneeg txhum huv Xi-oos ntshai tshee nyo. Puab has tas, “Vaajtswv txujkev txav txim zoo le cubtawg kws kub moog ibtxhis. Peb puas yuav tsiv dlim lub cubtawg ntawd?”

Yog mej has lug tseeb hab taug txujkev ncaaj nceeg xwb, mej yeej yuav dlim. Mej tsi xob muab mej lub fwjchim moog dlaag ntxag cov pluag hab tsi xob yuav tej nyaj kws luas nqaa tuaj xab mej. Tsi xob koom nrug cov tuabneeg tuav tswvyim tua tuabneeg lossis ua kev phem kev qas.
Ces mej yuav tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug; mej yuav tau nyob ntawm lub chaw kws ruaj khov ib yaam le lub chaw faajxwm. Mej yuav tau mov noj hab tau dlej haus tsau npo.
Muaj ib nub mej yuav pum ib tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab, nwg yuav kaav lub tebchaws kws luj hab dlaav heev.
Qhov kws mej ibtxwm ntshai lwm tsaav tuabneeg cov numtswv, cov sau se, hab cov tuabneeg tshuajxwm thaus u los tsuas zoo le mej ua npau suav lawm xwb.
Mej yuav tsi pum lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws has lug khaavtheeb hab has tej lug txawv kws mej tsi paub ntxiv le lawm.

Ca le tsaa qhovmuag saib lub nroog Xi-oos kws yog qhov chaw peb ua kevcai fwm Vaajtswv. Ca le tsaa qhovmuag saib lub nroog Yeluxalees kws yog qhov chaw suavdlawg yuav nyob kaaj sab lug! Hab nwg yuav zoo le lub tsevntaub kws luas tsi tshem, tej tswg los tsi rhu hab tej hlua khi los yeej tsi tu le.

Tug TSWV yuav ua rua peb pum nwg tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab. Peb yuav nyob huv tej taj nraag kws dlaav lawv tej ntug dlej luj hab tej dlej miv, yeebncuab yuav tsi tsaav nkoj moog lug huv tej dlej ntawd le lawm.
Vim tug TSWV yog tug kws txav txim, tug TSWV yog tug kws kaav peb, hab tug TSWV yog peb tug vaajntxwv; nwg yuav cawm kuas peb dlim.

Mej cov hlua tub xoob taag, txhaj khi tug ncej tsi ruaj lawm, dlaim ntaub txhaj le nthuav. Ces peb txhaj le txeeb tau tej khoom ntau heev coj lug sis faib; txawm yog tej tuabneeg saav ceg los puavleej tau huv tuabsi.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv peb lub tebchaws yuav tsi muaj leejtwg nroo has tas, “Kuv muaj mob;” hab tug TSWV yuav zaam puab lub txim huv tuabsi.

Txhua tsaav tuabneeg, ca le txaav lug kuas ze! Sis sau lug nyob ua ke hab tig qhovntsej noog. Taagnrho lub qaab ntuj hab txhua tug kws nyob huv lub nplajteb ca le lug ntawm nuav hab tig qhovntsej noog.
Vim tug TSWV chim heev rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg hab puab cov yeebncuab. Nwg txhaj rau txim nyaav rua puab hab muab puab cob rua luas tua kuas taag huv tuabsi.
Tsi muaj tuabneeg muab puab log, tabsis yuav tso puab tsw lwj ntxag rua qhov ntawd; hab ntshaav yuav ndlwg lab ploog sau tej roob.

Lub nub, lub hli, hab tej nubqub yuav poob taagnrho lug rua huv nplajteb. Lub ntuj yuav pluj moog ib yaam le thooj ntawv kws muab dlov ca, hab tej nubqub yuav poob ib yaam le tej nplooj txiv maab lossis tej nplooj txiv ncuav pas.
Tug TSWV tub npaaj nwg raab ntaaj tseg rua sau ntuj lawm, nwgnuav nwg yuav lug tawmtsaam cov Edoos kws yog cov nwg tub teem txim tuag rua lawm.

Nwg raab ntaaj yuav lu puab tej ntshaav hab tej roj, ib yaam le tej roj hab tej ntshaav yaaj ntshaav tshis kws muab ua khoom fij. Tug TSWV yuav muab tej khoom fij nuav coj moog fij rua huv lub nroog Npauxelas; nwg yuav tua kuas tuabneeg tuag coob heev rua huv tebchaws Edoos.

Tej txiv nyuj qus yuav qaug pawg lug nrug puab, hab tej ntsuag nyuj los qaug nrug cov txiv nyuj kws cejdlaab ntug ntoob. Puab lub tebchaws yuav caam ntshaav lab ploog hab puab tej aav muaj roj meem quas mag.
Vim tug TSWV muab ib nub lug ua pauj, hab muab ib xyoos lug rau txim rua tej kws lub nroog Xi-oos ua taag lug lawm.
Tej dlej huv tebchaws Edoos yuav hloov ua kua roj maab, hab aav yuav hloov ua leejfaaj. Taagnrho lub tebchaws yuav kub nyab ib yaam le roj maab.

Lub tebchaws yuav kub nyab taag nub taag mo hab tej paa yuav nchu moog ibtxhis. Lub tebchaws ntawd yuav raug muab tso povtseg nyob qhuav nkuag ca ib tam dlhau ib tam, hab tsi muaj leejtwg yuav kaam taug kev moog hlaa lub tebchaws ntawd le.
Plaas hab uab laag yuav lug ua zeg nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd. Tug TSWV yuav rov muab lub tebchaws ntawd tso povtseg dlua ib zag ntxiv kuas nyob qhuav nkuag ib yaam le thaus tsi tau tsim nwg.
Yuav tsi muaj vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws ntawd lawm, hab puab tej thawjcoj los tsi paub qaabhau dlaabtsi.
Maab xuavpaug hab ntoo xuavpaug yuav tuaj laum nkaus huv tej loog hab thoob plawg tej ntsaa loog, maa hab plaas yuav lug nyob huv tej nroog ntawd.
Tsaj qus yuav nyooj zum zawg qhov ntawd tuaj, hab tej dlaab yuav sis hu ib tug dlhau ib tug. Tug dlaab mo ntuj  yuav lug nrhav chaw su qhov ntawd.
Plaas yuav lug ua zeg, nteg qai, puag qai hab tu puab tej mivnyuas. Dlaav npoj yuav sis sau lug nyob qhov ntawd.

Nrhav tug TSWV thooj ntawv hab muab nyeem saib has le caag: Tej tsaj ntawd tsi muaj ib tug pluj le, hab tsi muaj ib tug kws yuav tsi muaj nkawm le. Vim tug TSWV tau has kuas muaj le ntawd, hab nwg tug ntsujplig yuav coj puab lug ua ke.
Tug TSWV yuav muab lub tebchaws faib rua puab kuas nyag muaj nyag tug. Puab yuav nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd ib tam dlhau ib tam, hab lub tebchaws yuav yog puab tug moog ibtxhis.
Taj suabpuam hab lub tebchaws kws qhuav nkig nkuav yuav zoo sab heev hab yuav muaj paaj tawg ntsaa ab rua sau tej aav qhuav.

Taj suabpuam yuav hu nkauj hab qw zoo sab; nwg yuav zoo nkauj ib yaam le tej Roob Lenpanoos, hab aav yuav rog ib yaam le tej teb sau lub Roob Kalemees hab Saloos. Txhua tug yuav pum tug TSWV lub koob meej hab lub fwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab.
Ca le txhawb txhais teg kws tsaug leeg, hab lub hauvcaug kws tshee naa tsi muaj zug lawm.
Has rua txhua tug kws tsi muaj kev ca sab has tas, “Cuab zug khov kho hab tsi xob ntshai! Vaajtswv yuav lug cawm kuas mej dlim, hab rau txim rua mej cov yeebncuab.”
Tug tuabneeg dligmuag yuav pum kev, hab tug laag ntseg yuav nov lug.
Cov tuabneeg saav ceg yuav sawv dlha cus plawg hab seev cev, hab cov tuabneeg has tsi tau lug yuav qw zoo sab. Dlej cag yuav ndlwg moog rua huv taj suabpuam;
Tej xuabzeb kws kub heev yuav ua paag dlej, hab aav qhuav yuav txhawv dlej txhua qhov. Maa tej chaw nyob yuav tuaj nroj hab lojkov taag.
Nyob qhov ntawd yuav muaj ib txuj nam kev hu ua “Txujkev Kws Dlawbhuv.” Tsi muaj tuabneeg txhum yuav taug txujkev ntawd le; hab cov tuabneeg ruag yuav tsi taug txujkev ntawd ib zag le.
Yuav tsi muaj tsuv ntxhuav nyob qhov ntawd, tsi muaj tej tsaj nyaum taug txujkev ntawd. Cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV tub txhwv lawm txhaj taug txujkev ntawd xwb.
Puab yuav rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees zoo sab hlo, hu nkauj hab qw ntshu nrooj zoo sab kawg. Puab yuav muaj kev zoo sab moog ibtxhis, kev quaj ntsuag hab kev tu sab yuav tsi muaj le lawm.

Thaus Hexekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau kaum plaub xyoo lawm, Xenakhelis kws ua fuabtais kaav lub tebchaws Axilias, tau tuaj tua cov Yudas tej nroog kws txhim ntsaa loog ruaj khov hab txeeb tau tej nroog ntawd huv tuabsi lawm.

Ces nwg tso Lasakes kws yog cov Axilias ib tug thawj tubrog huv lub nroog Lakhis nrug ib paab tubrog moog rua huv Yeluxalees, moog nug vaajntxwv Hexekiyas saib nwg puas zeem. Lasakes txhaj tuaj sawv ze rua ntawm txujkev kws cov tuabneeg nyob ntawm tug kwj dleg kws ndlwg peg lub paag dlej theem sau.

Muaj peb tug tuabneeg Yudas kws yog Hilekiyas tug tub Eliyakees kws yog tug saib lub loog; Senpanas kws yog tug teev ntawv; hab Asas tug tub Yau-as kws yog tug ceev tej ntaub ntawv txhaj tawm moog cuag Lasakes.
Ces cov Axilias tug thawj tubrog Lasakes has rua puab tas, fuabtais xaav paub saib vaajntxwv Hexekiyas ca sab rua dlaabtsi?
“Koj has tas, koj muaj tswvyim zoo hab tubrog coob, tabsis tej lug kws koj has ntawd tsi muaj qaabhau. Koj ca sab rua leejtwg, koj txhaj ntxeev sab rua kuv?

Koj ca sab rua cov Iziv tuaj paab koj, tabsis puab yuav zoo le muab tauj ab lug ua paas nreg, nwg yuav luv hab chob koj teg. Falaus kws ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Iziv yuav zoo le ntawd rua txhua tug kws ca sab rua nwg ntaag.”

Cov Axilias tug thawj tubrog naam zog moog ntxiv hab has tas, “Puas yog mej has rua kuv tas, mej ca sab rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv? Puas yog Hexekiyas muab tej chaw teev dlaab sau roob sab hab tej thaaj rhuav puamtsuaj taag, nwg txhaj has kuas cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees moog pehawm Vaajtswv rua ntawm tuab lub thaaj nkaus xwb los?
Kuv yuav nrug mej sis coglug ntawm kuv tug tswv kws yog cov Axilias tug fuabtais lub npe: kuv yuav muab ob txheeb tug neeg rua mej, yog mej nrhav tau tuabneeg coob lug caij cov neeg ntawd.
Mej tub tsi muaj peevxwm tawmtsaam tau kuv tug tswv ib tug nyuas tubrog kws miv tshaaj plawg nuav, ua caag mej laam moog ca sab rua cov Iziv tej tsheb neeg hab cov tubrog caij neeg ua dlaabtsi?
Mej xaav has tas kuv tuaj tua mej lub tebchaws hab muab ua kuas puamtsuaj, tsi muaj tug TSWV paab kuv nua los? Tub yog Vaajtswv khaiv kuv tuaj tua hab rhuav kuas mej puamtsuaj ntaag.”

Ces Eliyakees, Senpanas hab Yau-as has rua Lasakes has tas, “Thov koj has lug Alamais rua koj cov tubkhai, peb txhaj totaub; tsi xob has lug Henplais rua peb, rua qhov taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws sawv sau tug ntsaa yeej puavleej noog koj has huv tuabsi.”

Tabsis Lasakes has tas, “Mej xaav has tas kuv tug tswv tso kuv tuaj has cov lug nuav rua mej tug tswv hab mej xwb nuav los? Tsi yog le ntawd, kuv has rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob sau tug ntsaa yeej kws puab yuav rov noj puab cov quav hab haus puab cov zig, kuas nov ib yaam le mej hab.”
Ces Lasakes txhaj sawv tseeg hab has ua lug Henplais nrov nrov has tas, “Ca le noog cov Axilias tug fuabtais tej lug kws has rua mej nuav!”
Fuabtais has tas, “Tsi xob ca Hexekiyas ntxag tau mej, vim Hexekiyas yeej cawm tsi tau mej le.
Hab tsi xob ca Hexekiyas coj mej moog ca sab rua tug TSWV kws pheej has tas, Tug TSWV yeej yuav cawm tau peb xwb; lub nroog nuav yuav tsi raug muab cob rua cov Axilias tug fuabtais teg ib zag le.

Tsi xob noog Hexekiyas tej lug hlo le! Cov Axilias tug fuabtais has tas: Ca le ua phoojywg rua kuv hab tawm tuaj cuag kuv. Mej txhua tug txhaj yuav tau noj mej tej txiv maab, txiv ncuav pas, hab haus tej dlej huv mej tej qhov tshij
moog txug thaus kws kuv tuaj coj mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws zoo le mej lub tebchaws kws muaj txiv maab ntau ua cawv hab muaj nplej ntau ua ncuav.

Tsi xob ca Hexekiyas dlaag mej has tas, tug TSWV yuav paab kuas mej dlim ntawm txujkev nyuaj sab. Luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv puas cawm tau kuas puab tej tebchaws dlim ntawm cov Axilias tug fuabtais txhais teg?
Taamsim nuav Hamathas hab Alepas tej vaajtswv nyob qhov twg? Xefavais tej vaajtswv nyob qhov twg? Puab Puas paab tau cov Xamalis dlim ntawm kuv txhais teg?

Taagnrho cov vaajtswv huv tej tebchaws nuav, tug vaajtswv twg cawm tau nwg lub tebchaws dlim ntawm kuv txhais teg? Tug TSWV yuav ua le caag txhaj cawm tau lub nroog Yeluxalees kuas dlim ntawm kuv txhais teg?”
Tabsis cov pejxeem nyob ntsag tu hab tsi has ib lu lug le, rua qhov Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas saamfwm has tas, “Tsi xob teb nwg hlo le.”

Ces Eliyakees kws yog Hilekiyas tug tub kws yog tug saib lub loog, Senpanas kws yog tug teev ntawv, hab Yau-as kws yog Axafes tug tub kws yog tug ceev ntaub ntawv, puab dlua rhe puab tej tsho hab dlha moog qha tej lug kws Lasakes has ntawd rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas noog.
Thaus Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas nov le ntawd, nwg nyuaj sab heev, nwg txhaj dlua rhe nwg lub tsho hab muab ntaub tsaaj lug naav, hab dlha moog rua tom tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev.

Nwg txhaj tso Eliyakees kws yog tug saib lub loog, Senpanas kws yog tug teev ntawv hab tug povthawj laug moog cuag Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws yog Amauxes tug tub. Puab puavleej naav ntaub tsaaj taag huv tuabsi.

Puab has rua Yaxayas has tas, “Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas has le nuav: Nub nua yog nub kws tau kev nyuaj sab; peb taabtom raug luas rau txim hab txaajmuag heev. Peb zoo ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws txug caij yug mivnyuas, tabsis tsi muaj zug yug le.

Cov Axilias tug fuabtais tau khaiv nwg tug thawj tubrog Lasakes tuaj has lug tuam mom Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob. Thov tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv nrug nov tej lug kws tuam mom nuav hab rau txim rua tug tuabneeg kws tau has tej lug ntawd. Yog le ntawd, koj ca le thov Vaajtswv paab peb cov pejxeem kws seem nyob nuav.”
Thaus Yaxayas nov Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas tej lug lawm,

Yaxayas has rua puab tas, “Ca le rov moog has rua vaajntxwv has tas, tug TSWV has le nuav: ‘Tsi xob ntshai cov Axilias tug fuabtais tej lug kws nwg tso nwg tug tubkhai tuaj has tuam mom kuv rua koj nov ntawd.

Kuv yuav tso ib tug ntsujplig lug tshoov nwg sab kuas nwg nov ib cov lug xaiv, hab tig tsiv rov qaab moog rua peg nwg lub tebchaws; hab nwg yuav moog raug nav ntaaj tuag nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.’ ”
Thaus Lasakes nov has tas, cov Axilias tug fuabtais tawm huv lub nroog Lakhis moog lawm, nwg txhaj thim rov qaab hab moog ntsib fuabtais taabtom tua lub nroog Linpenas nyaav heev.

Muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua cov Axilias tug fuabtais nov has tas, “Cov Sudaas tug Vaajntxwv Tilehakas coj ib paab tubrog Iziv tuaj tua koj lawm.” Thaus nwg nov dlheev tej lug nuav, nwg txhaj xaa ib tsaab ntawv moog rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas
kws kaav tebchaws Yudas has tas, “Tsi xob ca koj tug Vaajtswv kws koj ca sab rua ntxag tau koj has tas, nwg yuav tsi muab lub nroog Yeluxalees cob rua cov Axilias tug fuabtais txhais teg hlo le.
Koj puas tau nov tej kws cov Axilias tug fuabtais tau ua rua ntau lub tebchaws raug kev puamtsuaj taag lawm. Koj xaav tas, koj tseem yuav tsiv dlim hab nua los?

Thaus u kuv cov yawmkoob tub muab lub nroog Nkauxaas, lub nroog Halaas hab lub nroog Lexefas tua puamtsuaj taag, hab muab cov tuabneeg Npethees kws nyob huv lub nroog Telaxas tua tuag taag huv tuabsi, hab puab tej vaajtswv tub cawm tsi tau puab dlim hlo le.
Lub nroog Hamas, Alepas, Xefavais, Henas hab Ivas tej vaajntxwv nyob qhov twg lawm?”

Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas txais tsaab ntawv ntawm cov tuabneeg xaa ntawv tuaj hab muab nthuav nyeem; Hexekiyas txhaj nqaa tsaab ntawv ntawd moog rua huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev, hab muab nthuav tso taabmeeg tug TSWV.
Hexekiyas thov tug TSWV has tas,

“Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, koj nyob rawv sau tug qhelunpees ob phob tis, koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog tug Vaajtswv kws kaav txhua lub tebchaws huv nplajteb nuav. Koj yog tug kws tsim lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj.
Tug TSWV, thov tig qhovntsej noog; tug TSWV, thov tsaa qhovmuag saib; thov noog Xenakhelis tej lug kws nwg xaa tuaj has tuam mom koj kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj sa nyob.
Tug TSWV, peb paub has tas, cov Axilias tug fuabtais tau muab ntau tsaav tuabneeg tua puamtsuaj taag hab ua rua puab tej tebchaws nyob dlo dlus ca,
hab muab puab tej vaajtswv kws tsi yog Vaajtswv tag, hlawv puamtsuaj taag, tej ntawd tsi yog Vaajtswv, tabsis yog tuabneeg txhais teg muab ntoo hab muab pobzeb lug txua ua xwb.

Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, thov paab kuas peb dlim ntawm cov Axilias txhais teg, txhaj ua rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav paub has tas, koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv.”

Ces Amauxes tug tub Yaxayas khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas has tas, tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has le nuav: “Vim koj tau thov kuv has txug Xenakhelis kws yog cov Axilias tug fuabtais,
cov lug nuav yog tug TSWV has rua Xenakhelis: Xi-oos tug ntxhais yuav luag koj plig hab yuav thuam koj; Yeluxalees tug ntxhais yuav cu hau tom koj qaab.

Tug kws koj thuam hab saib tsi taug yog leejtwg? Koj tau qheb koj lub qhovncauj hab tsaa koj lub qhovmuag tawmtsaam leejtwg? Tub yog koj tawmtsaam cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv ntaag los sav!

Koj tau tso koj tug tubkhai tuaj tuam mom tug TSWV, koj has tas, ‘Kuv muaj tsheb neeg ntau heev, kuv yuav coj tuaj nce rua sau tej roob sab kws yog tej roob sab tshaaj plawg peg Lenpanoos, kuv moog txav tej ntoo thuv kws sab tshaaj plawg, hab tej ntoo cab kws zoo tshaaj plawg sau roob, hab moog rua huv lub plawv zoov kws muaj ntoo sab heev.
Koj khaav has tas, koj tau khawb ntau lub qhov tshij, hab haus tej dlej kws nyob huv luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej tebchaws, hab kuv yuav tsuj tej dlej nraag tebchaws Iziv kuas nqhuab huv tuabsi.’

“Koj tsi tau nov has tas, kuv tub npaaj sab lug tau ntev lawm nua los? Tej kws thaus u kuv npaaj tseg lawm, nwgnuav kuv muab rhu tawm lug. Kuv tub pub fwjchim rua koj muab cov nroog kws ruaj khov tsoo tawg taag huv tuabsi lawm.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tej nroog ntawd tsi muaj fwjchim dlaabtsi le; puab ntshai hab yoob taag. Puab zoo ib yaam le tej nroj kws tuaj huv tej teb lossis tej nroj kws tuaj sau ruv tsev, thaus cov cua kub kws ntsawj saab nubtuaj tuaj,  puab ca le ntsws taag huv tuabsi lawm.
“Tabsis kuv paub thaus koj nyob quastsawg, thaus koj tawm moog, hab thaus koj rov qaab lug, hab kuv paub tej lug phem kws koj tshev kuv huv tuabsi.

Vim koj tau tshev kuv hab kuv tub nov koj tej lug khaavtheeb lawm, nwgnuav kuv yuav muab kuv tug nqailauj lug chaws koj qhovntswg hab kuv muab fwm xauv lug saam koj qhovncauj, hab kuv yuav muab koj tig xubndlag taug txuj qub kev kws koj tuaj rov qaab.”

Ces Yaxayas has rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas tas, “Ntawm nuav yog ib lub cim kws qha rua mej paub. Xyoo nuav hab lwm xyoo mej yuav tau noj tej nplej kws nwg tuaj nwg, tabsis xyoo peb mej yuav cog nplej hab sau qoobloo hab cog txiv maab hab yuav tau tej txiv maab ntawd noj.
Cov tuabneeg kws seem nyob huv tebchaws Yudas yuav vaammeej ib yaam le tej txiv ntoo kws nrhau caag ntsa aav tub tub hab txi txiv ncw heev.
Tsuas tshuav cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab sau lub Roob Xi-oos txhaj seem xwb, rua qhov tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus npaaj sab kuas muaj tej xwmtxheej nuav lawm.

“Cov lug nuav, yog tug TSWV has rua cov Axilias tug fuabtais: ‘Nwg yuav tsi tau tuaj rua huv lub nroog nuav hab tsi tau tua ib xibxub vug rua huv lub nroog nuav le. Tsi muaj tubrog yuav nqaa tej thaiv nav ntaaj tuaj ze lub nroog nuav lossis tuaj puab ntswg vij lub nroog nuav le.
Nwg taug txujkev twg tuaj, nwg yuav taug txujkev ntawd rov qaab moog tsev, hab nwg yuav tsi tau nkaag lug rua huv lub nroog nuav hlo le. Kuv kws yog tug TSWV, kuv yog tug has tej lug nuav ntaag.
Kuv yuav tiv thaiv hab tsomkwm lub nroog nuav, vim kuv tej lug cog tseg lawm, hab vim tej lug kws kuv tau cog tseg rua kuv tug tubkhai Daviv lawm?’ ”

Tug TSWV tug timtswv txhaj lug rua huv cov Axilias lub yeej hab tua ib puas yim caum tsib txheeb leej tubrog tuag taag. Taagkig kaaj ntug txoog kws taav lub caij tuabneeg sawv, puab txawm pum tuabneeg tuag pawg lug.
Cov Axilias tug fuabtais Xenakhelis txhaj rov qaab moog tsev hab moog nyob huv lub nroog Nineves.

Muaj ib nub, thaus nwg taabtom moog pe nwg tug mlom Nixelaus huv tsev teev mlom, ces Alamelej hab Salexes kws yog nwg ob tug tub, nqaa obtug ob raab ntaaj moog muab nwg tua tuag rua huv lub tsev teev mlom ntawd, hab obtug tsiv moog nyob rua tim tebchaws Alalaj lawm. Ces Esahadoos kws yog dlua nwg ib tug tub txhaj ua fuabtais hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus ntawd Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas mob nyaav heev hab nwg yuav zoo tsi taug. Amauxes tug tub Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tau moog saib Hexekiyas hab has tas, “Vaajtswv has tas koj yuavtsum npaaj txhua yaam kuas txhij txhua tseg rua koj tsev tuabneeg, rua qhov koj yeej yuav tsi zoo, koj yuav tuag xwb.”
Hexekiyas txawm tig hlo rua tim phaab ntsaa hab thov tug TSWV has tas,

“Tug TSWV, thov koj ncu ntsoov has tas, kuv ua koj teg num ntawm lub sab ncaaj nceeg hab muab sab npuab koj, hab kuv rau sab ntso ua txhua yaam zoo kws koj xaav kuas kuv ua.” Hab nwg quaj tu sab kawg le.
Tug TSWV rov has rua Yaxayas has tas,

“Koj ca le rov moog cuag Hexekiyas hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog koj yawmkoob Daviv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tub nov koj tej lug thov hab pum koj tej kua muag lawm; kuv yuav ntxiv noobnyoog rua koj ua neej nyob kaum tsib xyoos ntxiv.
Kuv cawm koj hab lub nroog Yeluxalees kuas dlim ntawm cov Axilias tug fuabtais txhais teg, hab kuv tseem yuav tiv thaiv lub nroog nuav moog.’
“Yaxayas has tas, ‘Tug TSWV yuav muab ib yaam lug ua lub cim qha rua koj has tas nwg yuav ua lawv le nwg tej lug cog tseg lawm.
Tug TSWV yuav muab tug dluab nub thim rov qaab kaum theem qeb ntai kws Vaajntxwv Ahaj ua.’ ” Ces tug dluab nub txawm thim rov qaab kaum theem qeb ntai.
Tom qaab kws Hexekiyas tug mob zoo lawm, nwg sau zaaj nkauj nuav hu ua Vaajtswv tsaug:
Kuv has tas kuv txujsa kws tseemceeb tshaaj plawg yuav moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws yog txujkev tuag; kuv yuav tsi muaj sa nyob ib zag ntxiv le lawm.
Kuv has tas, kuv yuav tsi pum tug TSWV huv cov tuabneeg kws muaj sa nyob lub tebchaws; kuv lub qhovmuag yuav tsi pum cov tuabneeg kws muaj sa huv lub nplajteb nuav ib zag le lawm.
Kuv txujsa tub raug muab txav tu hab tub kawg lawm, ib yaam le lub tsevntaub kws muab rhuav taag lawm, zoo le tej ntaub kws muab txab txav tu lug. Kuv xaav has tas Vaajtswv tub rhu kuv txujsa  lawm.
Kuv quaj ib mos kaaj ntug rua kuv tug mob. Vaajtswv muab kuv tej pobtxhaa luv taag ib yaam le tsuv ntxhuav cua, kuv xaav has tas, Vaajtswv yuav rhu kuv txujsa moog.

Kuv ntsaaj mog nyoos ib yaam le tug luv lossis tug noog dlej quaj, hab kuv tsaa hlo suab quaj ib yaam le tug nquab. Kuv qheb tsi taug kuv ob lub qhovmuag saib sau ntuj. Tug TSWV, kuv ntxhuv sab heev, thov paab kuv!
Kuv yuav has le caag? Tug TSWV tub has rua kuv, hab nwg tub ua lawv le nwg has lawm. Kuv nyuaj sab heev hab pw tsi tsaug zug le.
Tug TSWV, qhov kws tuabneeg muaj txujsa nyob tub yog vim muaj koj tuab leeg xwb, hab qhov kws kuv muaj txujsa nyob, tub yog koj cawm. Thov paab khu kuv tug mob kuas zoo hab pub kuv rov muaj txujsa.
Kuv tej kev nyuaj sab yuav hloov moog ua kev kaaj sab lug. Koj cawm  kuv txujsa dlim ntawm lub qhov kws yog txujkev puamtsuaj lug; koj zaam taagnrho kuv tej kev txhum.
Tsi muaj ib tug nyob huv tubtuag teb yuav txawj ua koj tsaug; cov tuag lawm yeej tsi txawj ca sab rua koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg le.
Tsuas yog tug kws muaj sa nyob txhaj txawj ua koj tsaug ib yaam le nub nua kuv ua xwb. Tej lug kws leej txiv qha cov mivnyuas yog tej kws has tas, koj yog tug ncaaj nceeg tag.
Tug TSWV, koj tau khu kuv tug mob zoo lawm. Peb yuav ntaus nkauj nogncaas hab hu nkauj ua koj tsaug, peb yuav ua koj tsaug huv koj lub Tuamtsev moog taag simneej.
Ces Yaxayas has tas, “Mej ca le muab txiv ncuav pas lug tsoo qhwv vaajntxwv lub rwj, nwg txhaj yuav zoo.”
Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas nug has tas, “Yaam dlaabtsi ua lub cim qha rua kuv paub has tas, kuv yuav tau moog rua huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev.”

Lub sijhawm ntawd Npaladaas tug tub Melaudas Npaladaas kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos nov has tas Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas mob, nwg txhaj sau ib tsaab ntawv hab xaa ib co khoom tuaj pub rua Hexekiyas.

Hexekiyas tog txais puab hab coj puab moog saib nwg tej txhaab nyaj txhaab kub, tej txumlom, tej roj tsw qaab, hab tej cuabyeej ua rog. Tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi huv nwg tej txhaab lossis huv nwg lub tebchaws kws nwg tsi tau coj puab moog saib le.

Ces Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug txawm tuaj cuag Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab nug nwg has tas, “Cov tuabneeg ntawd tuaj qhov twg tuaj hab puab has le caag rua koj?” Hexekiyas teb has tas, “Puab tuaj tim tebchaws Npanpiloos kws dleb heev tuaj.”
Yaxayas nug has tas, “Puab pum dlaabtsi huv koj lub loog?” Hexekiyas teb has tas, “Puab pum txhua yaam huv tuabsi; tsi tshuav ib yaam nyob huv tej txhaab kws kuv tsi tau qha rua puab le.”
Ces Yaxayas txawm has rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas has tas, “Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le nuav:

Saib lauj, lub sijhawm tub lug ze zuj zug rua txhua yaam kws nyob rua huv koj lub loog nuav lawm, hab txhua yaam kws koj cov yawmkoob khaws ca thaus u lug txug naj nub nua, yuav raug luas coj moog kuas taag rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos, tsi seem ib yaam dlaabtsi hlo le, tug TSWV has le ntawd.
Koj cov tub kws koj yug hab koj tej xeebntxwv puavleej yuav raug puab nteg coj moog hab muab saam ca ua num nyob huv tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Npanpiloos lub loog.”
Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas teb Yaxayas has tas, “Tug TSWV tej lug kws koj has nuav zoo kawg le. Vim kuv xaav has tas, yuav muaj kev thaajyeeb hab kev kaaj sab rua tam kws kuv tseem ua neej nyob nuav.”
Vaajtswv has tas, “Nplig kuv tsaav tuabneeg lub sab, nplig puab sab los mas!

Txhawb cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees zug. Qha rua puab has tas, puab tub raug kev txomnyem txaus lawm hab nwgnuav kuv tub zaam puab tej kev txhum taag lawm. Kuv rau txim ob npaug rua puab tej kev txhum.”
Muaj ib lub suab qw has tas, “Khu kev tom roob mojsaab qhua tog tug TSWV! Khu kev tom taj suabpuam kuas ncaaj tog peb tug Vaajtswv.
Txhub txhua lub kwj haa kuas puv, khawb txhua lub roob hab txhua lub pov roob kuas taj; tej qhov zawj muab txhub kuas sis txig, muab qhov sab hab qhov qeg pheej kuas taj xwmyeem.
Thaus ntawd tug TSWV yuav muab nwg tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab nthuav qha rua tuabneeg txhua tug pum. Tug TSWV yog tug has tej lug nuav ntaag.”

Muaj ib lub suab qw has tas, “Ca le qha rua suavdlawg!” Kuv nug has tas, “Kuv yuav qha dlaabtsi? Qha has tas, txhua tug tuabneeg zoo ib yaam le tej nroj ntsuag; hab puab zoo ib yaam le tej paaj ntoos.
Thaus tug TSWV tshuab paa tuaj ntsawj, tej nroj tsuag qhuav, tej paaj los yuav zeeg taag; tuabneeg zoo ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag ntawd.
Tej nroj yeej txawj qhuav hab tej paaj yeej txawj zeeg; tabsis peb tug Vaajtswv txujlug nyob moog ibtxhis le.”
Yeluxalees, ca le nce moog sau roob sab, hab qha txujmoo zoo! Xi-oos, ca le hu nrov nrov tshaajtawm txujmoo zoo!
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv nrug nwg lub fwjchim lug, hab nwg txhais npaab yuav tswjfwm. Nwg coj nqe zug lug rua cov tuabneeg kws nwg cawm dlim lawm.

Nwg yuav tu nwg paab yaaj ib yaam le tug tswv yug yaaj, nwg yuav sau zog tej mivnyuas yaaj lug puag rua ntawm nwg ob txhais npaab, nwg yuav muab puab puag hlo rua huv nwg lub xubndlag, hab ua sab ntev coj tej yaaj kws muaj mivnyuas mog.

Leejtwg muaj peevxwm muab phoov teg yeem dlej havtxwv saib nyaav npaum le caag, lossis muab nwg txhais teg ntsuag tau lub ntuj? Leejtwg muaj peevxwm muab lub nplajteb nuav sau lug ntim rua huv khob, lossis muab tej hauv roob hab tej ncov roob lug tso rua sau teev luj?
Leejtwg txhaj muaj peevxwm qha tau tug TSWV tug ntsujplig, lossis ua tau nwg tug tuavxaam kws qha nwg?
Vaajtswv nrug leejtwg tuavxaam kuas nwg thoob tsib to nrog, hab leejtwg qha kev ncaaj nceeg, kev txawj ntse, kev totaub, hab kev paub rua nwg?

Txhua tsaav tuabneeg tub tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi rua tug TSWV le, tub tsi npaum le teev dlej nrug ntawm lub tshuajtaub lug; nwg suav puab zoo le tej moov aav kws lu ntawm raab teev xwb; hab nwg nqaa tej koog povtxwv sib ib yaam le tej moov aav.
Txawm yog tej tsaj peg Lenpanoos los tub tsi txaus tua hlawv fij rua Vaajtswv, hab tej ntoo los yeej tsi txaus ua tawg hlawv.
Tug TSWV suav has tas txhua tsaav tuabneeg yeej tsi tseemceeb dlaabtsi hab tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi rua tug TSWV hlo le.
Mej yuav muab Vaajtswv pev rua leejtwg? Mej yuav ua le caag pav tau has tas nwg tug yaam ntxwv zoo le caag?
Nwg tsi zoo le tug mlom kws tuabneeg puab kws muab kub lug vuam rua hab muab saw nyaj lug dlai rua.

Tug tuabneeg pluag kws tsi muaj nyaj tsi muaj kub coj moog fij, nwg moog xaiv tej ntoo kws tsi txawj lwj coj lug fij. Nwg coj moog rua tug kws txua ntoo txua ib tug mlom kws tsi txawj txaav taw le rua nwg.
Tsi muaj tuabneeg qha rua mej paub le los? Mej tsi tau nov dlua le los? Mej tsi paub has tas lub nplajteb nuav pib le caag lug le los?

Tug tsim lub nplajteb nuav yog tug kws nyob sau lub zwmtxwv kws sab kawg nkaus. Nwg tuaj sau saib tuabneeg nplajteb luaj le tug kooj xwb; nwg muab lub ntuj nthuav ib yaam le dlaim ntaub qhovrais, hab nthuav lub ntuj ib yaam le lub tsevntaub rua tuabneeg nyob.
Nwg muab cov numtswv txu kuas poob fwjchim, hab ua rua puab tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi hlo le.
Puab zoo ib yaam le tej yub zaub kws muab cog kag ces txawm nrhau caag, thaus Vaajtswv ua paa, tej yub zaub ca le ntsws hab tuag taag, hab yaa ri nab ib yaam le tej quavnyaab npleg.
Vaajtswv tug kws dlawbhuv nug has tas, mej muab kuv pev rua leejtwg, hab kuv zoo le leejtwg?

Tsaa koj ob lub qhovmuag saib sau nruab ntug saib! Leejtwg yog tug tsim tej nubqub kws koj pum ntawd? Nwg coj tej nubqub ntawd tawm tuaj ua tsheej paab ib yaam le paab tubrog, nwg paub muaj pistsawg lub hab nwg tis npe rua txhua lub nyag muaj nyag npe. Nwg lub fwjchim hab tug zug kaav tej ntawd txhaj tsi muaj ib lub pluj le.
Cov Yixalayees, vim le caag mej txhaj ywg has tas, tug TSWV tsi pum txug mej tej kev txomnyem lossis tsi paab thaus mej raug luas ua tsi ncaaj rua mej?

Mej tsi tau paub dlua le los? Mej tsi tau nov dlua le los? Tug TSWV yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob moog ibtxhis; nwg tsim taagnrho lub nplajteb nuav. Nwg ibtxwm tsi tsaug leeg lossis qaug zug ib zag le. Tsi muaj leejtwg paub txug nwg lub sab xaav hlo le.
Nwg ntxiv zug rua tug kws qaug zug hab tsaug leeg kuas nwg rov muaj zug tuaj.
Txawm yog tej hluas los puab yeej txawj qaug zug, hab cov tub hluas los qaug puj poog;

tabsis cov tuabneeg kws ca sab ntsoov rua tug TSWV puab yuav muaj zug, puab yuav nthuav tis yaa ib yaam le tug dlaav. Thaus puab dlha, puab yuav tsi qaug zug? Thaus puab moog kev, puab yuav tsi tsaug leeg?

Vaajtswv has tas, “Tej tebchaws kws nyob dleb, mej ca le noog kuv has hab nyob tuabywv! Mej ca le npaaj moog has plaub huv tsev tu plaub; mej yuav muaj sijhawm has mej zaaj. Ca peb ua ke moog txav txim saib leejtwg yog tug muaj cai.

“Leejtwg moog zig tug kws muaj yeej tim saab nubtuaj tuaj? hab ca nwg kovyeej txhua qhov txhua chaw kws nwg moog lawm? Leejtwg ca nwg tua yeej txhua tug vaajntxwv hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg? Nwg raab ntaaj tua puab qaug pawg lug ib yaam le puab yog tej moov aav xwb. Nwg raab neevnti tua puab tawg tsiv ri sua ib yaam le cua ntsawj tej quavnyaab npleg yaa.
Nwg caum puab qaab hab dlha dlhau puab moog tsi raug xwmtxheej dlaabtsi, nwg dlha ceev heev kutaw yuav laug tsi chwv aav.
Leejtwg yog tug ua kuas muaj tej xwm nuav tshwmsim tuaj? Leejtwg yog tug kws teev caij nyoog keebkwm thaus u lug? Kuv yog tug TSWV kws nyob thaus chivkeeb, hab yog tug kws yuav nyob thaus kawg.
“Cov tuabneeg kws nyob tej tebchaws dleb, pum tej num kws kuv ua taag lug lawm; puab ntshai tshee nyo. Yog le ntawd puab txhaj sis sau tuaj ua ke.
Txhua tug nyag paab nyag tej kwvtij zej zog hab has rua puab tej kwvtij tas, ‘Ua sab luj tsi xob ntshai.’

Tug kws txua ntoo txhawb tug kws nchuav kub zug has tas, ‘Zoo kawg le!’ Tug kws muab rauj ntaus tej mlom kuas dlu ndlaug quas leeg, txhawb tug kws muab ntsa lug ntsa zug. Puab has tas, ‘Haam zoo kawg le,’ hab puab muab ntsa hlau ntsa tug mlom ntawd rua ntawm nwg qhov chaw.
“Tabsis mej cov Yixalayees kws yog kuv cov tubkhai, Yakhauj tug kws kuv tau xaiv tseg, hab yog kuv tug phoojywg Anplahaas cov xeebntxwv;

mej yog cov kws kuv tau coj tim qaab ntuj kawg rov lug, hab hu mej tim plaub ceg kaum ntuj kws dleb kawg nkaus lug, kuv has rua mej tas, ‘Mej yog kuv cov tubkhai, kuv tub xaiv mej ca lawm, hab kuv tsi tso mej tseg ib zag le’;
Mej tsi xob ntshai, rua qhov kuv nrug nraim mej, kuv yog mej tug Vaajtswv, mej tsi xob poob sab; kuv yuav paab mej hab txhawb kuas mej muaj zug, kuv saab teg xis yuav puag rawv mej.
“Cov tuabneeg kws chim rua mej, puab yuav swb hab raug txaajmuag; cov tuabneeg kws ua rog tawmtsaam mej, puab yuav puamtsuaj hab tuag taag.
Mej moog nrhav cov yeebncuab kws tawmtsaam mej, tabsis mej tsi ntsib puab, cov tuabneeg kws ua rog rua mej puab tub puamtsuaj hab tuag taag lawm.
Kuv yog tug TSWV, mej tug Vaajtswv; kuv yeej tuav rawv mej saab teg xis, hab kuv has rua mej tas, ‘Tsi xob ntshai kuv yuav paab mej!’ ”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees kws yog Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv! Kuv yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv. Kuv yuav paab mej, hab txhwv kuas mej dlim.

Kuv yuav ua kuas mej zoo ib yaam le lub tshuab zum nplej kws nav tshab hab ntse zuag plag. Mej yuav ntaus tej hauv roob hab muab tsoo kuas tawg ntsoog ntxawg, hab mej yuav muab tej ncov roob tsoo kuas ua moov taag.

Mej yuav tsuab puab w rua sau nruab ntug, cua yuav muab puab ntsawj yaa moog povtseg, hab cua dlaaj cua dlub yuav muab puab ntsawj yaa ri nab. Hab mej yuav zoo sab heev, rua qhov kuv yog mej tug Vaajtswv; mej yuav qhuas kuv kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv.

“Thaus kuv tsaav tuabneeg kws pluag hab txomnyem tuaj nrhav dlej haus, thaus puab nqhes dlej qaa qhuav qhawv lawm, kuv kws yog tug TSWV maam le teb puab tej lug thov, kuv kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tsi tso puab tseg le.
Kuv yuav ua kuas muaj dlej txhawv sau tej roob qhua, hab ua kuas dlej txhawv huv tej haav. Kuv yuav ua rua tej taj suabpuam kuas muaj paag dlej txhua qhov.

Kuv yuav ua kuas ntoo thuv, ntoo akaxias, ntoo lwgzaaj, hab ntoo ntseej, tuaj taug sau tej roob mojsaab qhua kws qhuav nkig nkuav. Kuv yuav ua kuas taj suabpuam caj zoov nujtxeeg, ntoo thuv, ntoo cab hab ntoo thwjsuab yuav tuaj ua ke.
Ca tuabneeg nplajteb pum hab paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws ua tej nuav. Puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv yog tug kws tsim tej nuav.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Ca le tuaj has mej rooj plaub,” Yakhauj tug Vaajntxwv has tas, “Coj mej lub tswvyim sis caav kws zoo tshaaj plawg nrug mej tuaj ntawm nuav!”

Ca puab coj tej mlom tuaj, hab kuas tej mlom ntawd qha rua peb saib yuav muaj dlaabtsi tshwmsim tuaj. Qha tej xwmtxheej thaus u rua peb saib yog dlaabtsi, peb txhaj paub tej ntawd, hab peb txhaj paub has tas puab tawm qhov twg lug; lossis qha tej yaam kws yuav tshwmsim lug yaav tom ntej nuav rua peb.
Qha rua peb saib yuav muaj dlaabtsi tshwmsim lug yaav tom ntej nuav, kuas peb txhaj paub has tas, mej yog vaajtswv tag! Ua tej yaam zoo lossis tej yaam phem kuas peb ntshai hab yoob taag le saib.
Mej tsi tseemceeb dlaabtsi, hab tej kws mej ua los tsi muaj qaabhau; cov tuabneeg kws xaiv mej ua puab tej vaajtswv, mas vuabtsuab kawg le.

“Kuv tub xaiv ib tug tuabneeg kws nyob saab nubtuaj tseg lawm, kuv yuav coj nwg peg saab qaumteb tuaj tua mej. Nwg yuav tsuj cov numtswv ib yaam le tsuj tej moov aav, hab zoo le tug puab laujkaub tsuj tej aav nplaum.

Leejtwg qha zaaj nuav thaus u lawm peb txhaj paub, lossis qha ua ntej, peb txhaj has tau tas ‘Nwg has yog lawm’? Mej tsi muaj ib tug twg has txug zaaj nuav, tsi muaj leejtwg nov mej pav ib lus hlo le.
Kuv yog tug TSWV, tug kws xub qha xuv zoo rua lub nroog Xi-oos; kuv khaiv ib tug xaa xuv moog qha lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, ‘Koj cov pejxeem taabtom lug lawm! Puab taabtom lug tsev!’
Thaus kuv saib cov mlom ntawd, puab has tsi tau lug, tsi muaj ib tug twg teb tau tej lug kws kuv nug hlo le.
Taagnrho cov mlom nuav tsi muaj qaabhau kag le; puab ua tsi tau ib yaam dlaabtsi, cov mlom ntawd tsi muaj zug hab tsi muaj fwjchim.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Tug nuav yog kuv tug tubkhai kws kuv txhawb nwg tug zug, nwg yog tug kws kuv xaiv tseg, kuv txaus sab heev rua nwg. Kuv muab kuv tug ntsujplig rua nwg, hab nwg yuav coj kev ncaaj nceeg lug rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Nwg yuav tsi qw lossis tsaa suab quaj lossis has lug nrov huv tej plawv kev.
Tug lojkov kws tub po lawm, nwg yuav tsi muab luv, lossis lub teeb kws tub yuav tuag nwg tsi muab tshuab kuas tuag. Nwg yuav coj txujkev ncaaj nceeg moog ibtxhis lug rua suavdlawg.
Nwg yuav tsi taag kev ca sab lossis qaug zug hlo le, nwg yuav rhawv kuas muaj kev ncaaj nceeg nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav; hab tej tebchaws kws nyob dleb tog ntsoov nwg txuj kevcai.”

Vaajtswv tsim lub ntuj hab muab lub ntuj nthuav khwb rua sau; nwg tsim lub nplajteb hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv; nwg rau sav hab rau paa rua txhua tug tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nplajteb. Hab nwgnuav tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv has rua nwg tug tubkhai has tas,

“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws tau hu koj lug hab muab lub fwjchim rua koj kuas pum txujkev ncaaj nceeg kws nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav. Kuv yuav muab koj ua lu lug coglug tseg rua txhua tug tuabneeg; kuv yuav muab koj ua lub teeb ci moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Koj yuav ua rua tej tuabneeg dligmuag pum kev, hab yuav tso cov tuabneeg kws raug kaw huv tsev lojcuj kws tsaus ntuj nti tawm lug.
“Kuv tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv. Tsi pub ib tug vaajtswv twg muaj feem koom kuv lub fwjchim; kuv tsi pub tej mlom muaj feem koom kuv lub koob meej.
Tej kws kuv has tseg tub muaj lawm, nwgnuav kuv yuav qha tej yaam tshab rua mej ua ntej thaus kws tej ntawd tsi tau tshwm lug.”

Ca le hu ib zaaj nkauj tshab qhuas tug TSWV, tuabneeg nplajteb ca le hu nkauj qhuas nwg! Mej cov kws tsaav nkoj huv huv havtxwv, ca le qhuas nwg, txhua tsaav yaam tsaj kws nyob huv havtxwv, ca le qhuas nwg. Cov tebchaws kws nyob dleb hab txhua tug tuabneeg kws nyob huv ca le hu nkauj qhuas nwg!
Ca taj suabpuam hab tej nroog kws nyob huv qhuas Vaajtswv; ca cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Kedas qhuas nwg! ca cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Xelas qw sau tej ncov roob tuaj.
Ca puab txhawb nqaa tug Tswv lub koob meej, hab ca cov tuabneeg kws nyob tej tebchaws dleb qhuas nwg.

Tug TSWV tawm moog ntaus rog ib yaam le tug tubrog kws muaj zug heev, nwg npaaj txhij hab kub sab lug moog sis tua huv tshaav rog, nwg nthe nqho ntaus rog hab nwg qw nrov heev; nwg qha nwg lub fwjchim rua nwg cov yeebncuab pum.

Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv ua tuabywv tau ntev lug lawm, kuv tsi teb kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Tabsis nwgnuav tub txug lub sijhawm kws kuv pib ua num lawm; kuv qw ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws taabtom yug mivnyuas.

Kuv yuav rhuav tej hauv roob hab ncov roob kuas puamtsuaj, hab muab tej xyoob ntoo hab tej nroj tsuag ua kuas qhuav taag. Kuv yuav ua kuas tej dlej nqhuab ua suabpuam hab muab tej paag dlej ua kuas nqhuab huv tuabsi.

“Kuv yuav coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg kws dligmuag taug txujkev kws puab ibtxwm tsi tau taug dlua. Kuv yuav muab puab txujkev tsaus ntuj hloov ua kev kaaj, hab muab tej kev kws tsi xwmyeem ncaws kuas taj rua puab taug. Tej nuav yog tej kws kuv yuav ua, hab kuv yuav tsi muab tej nuav tso tseg ib zag le.
Cov tuabneeg kws ca sab rua tej mlom, puab hu tej mlom ntawd has tas, ‘Mej yog peb cov vaajtswv,’ puab yuav raug txaajmuag hab poob ntsejmuag.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej cov tuabneeg laag ntseg, ua tuab zoo noog! Mej cov tuabneeg dligmuag, ua tuab zoo saib kuas tseeb tseeb!
Puas muaj leejtwg dligmuag tshaaj kuv tug tubkhai, lossis laag ntseg tshaaj tug xaa xuv kws kuv khaiv lug?
Cov Yixalayees, mej tub pum ntau yaam lug lawm, tabsis zoo le mej tsi pum le. Mej muaj qhovntsej, tabsis zoo le mej tsi nov le.”

Tug TSWV yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj lub sab kub lug cawm kuas tuabneeg dlim, nwg txhaj muab nwg tej kevcai hab tej lug qhuab qha saib rua qhov sab; hab nwg xaav kuas nwg tsaav tuabneeg fwm tej kevcai ntawd.

Tabsis nwg tsaav tuabneeg tub raug luas fuab hab luas nyag; puab raug nteg kaw rua huv tej qhov kws tsaus ntuj nti, hab muab zais rua huv tej tsev lojcuj; puab puavleej raug luas fuab hab raug luas nyag, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav cawm tau puab, puab tub raug luas nyag, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj has has, “Ca le tso puab rov qaab.”
Mej cov leejtwg yuav tig qhovntsej noog zaaj nuav? Txij nuav moog mej puas yuav ua tuab zoo noog?

Leejtwg muab cov Yixalayees cob rua cov tuabneeg kws tuaj fuab puab? Tub yog tug TSWV kws peb tau ua txhum rua nwg lawm! Peb tsi ua peb lub neej lawv le nwg lub sab nyam, lossis tsi noog tej lug qhuab qha kws nwg tau qha rua peb.

Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tso nwg txujkev chim lug raug peb, hab ua kuas peb ntsib kev tsuv kev rog kws txomnyem ntsuav. Nwg txujkev chim kub cov Yixalayees ib yaam le suavtawg, tabsis peb tsi paub has tas muaj xwm dlaabtsi hab peb yeej tsi xeevxwm hlo le.
Cov Yixalayees, tug TSWV kws tsim mej has tas, “Mej tsi xob ntshai, kuv yuav cawm kuas mej dlim. Kuv tub tuav mej npe hu mej lawm, vim mej yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg.

Thaus mej hlaa tej dlej tub, kuv yuav nrug nraim mej, lossis mej moog huv dlej, dlej yuav tsi tshoob mej. Thaus mej moog huv cov nplaim tawg, suavtawg yuav tsi kub mej, txujkev sim sab nuav yuav txuv tsi tau mej.

Rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV, mej tug Vaajtswv, Kuv yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv, kuv yog tug cawm kuas mej dlim. Kuv muab cov Iziv lug ua nqe txhwv mej, muab cov Sudaas hab cov Xenpas lug pauv mej.
Kuv muab taagnrho txhua tsaav tuabneeg lug txhwv kuas tau mej txujsa, rua qhov mej muaj nqes rua kuv heev, kuv ua kuas mej tau ntsejmuag, hab kuv hlub mej kawg nkaus le.
Tsi xob ntshai, kuv nrug nraim mej! “Kuv yuav coj mej tim nubtuaj hab sau mej tim nubpoob rov qaab lug.

Kuv yuav has rua cov nyob saab qaumteb kuas tso puab lug, hab cov nyob saab qaabteb kuas tsi xob cheem puab nyob. Ca le tso kuv cov tub kws nyob dleb heev rov lug, hab cov kws nyob tim qaab ntuj kawg rov lug.
Puab yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg, kuv tsim puab lug ua kuas kuv tau koob meej, kuv yog tug puab puab hab tsim puab ntaag.”
Vaajtswv has tas, “Coj tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj qhovmuag, tabsis tsi pum kev, muaj qhovntsej, tabsis tsi nov lug tuaj!

Ca txhua tsaav tuabneeg tuaj sis sau ua ke. Leejtwg muaj cuabkaav has tau nwg zaaj, hab qha rua peb saib yuav muaj yaam dlaabtsi tshwmsim yaav tom ntej? Ca puab coj puab tej vaajtswv tuaj ua timkhawv rua puab, ca puab nov hab tau has tej lug tseeb.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees, mej yog kuv cov timkhawv, kuv xaiv mej lug ua kuv cov tubkhai, kuas mej txhaj paub kuv hab ntseeg kuv, hab paub has tas kuv tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv. Yeej ibtxwm tsi muaj lwm tug vaajtswv kws nyob ua ntej kuv, hab yaav tom ntej los yuav tsi muaj le.
“Kuv tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog tug TSWV, tsuas yog kuv tuab leeg xwb txhaj cawm tau mej dlim.

Kuv tub xub qha tej xwm nuav rua mej paub ua ntej, ces kuv maam lug paab kuas mej dlim, cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tsi muaj ib tug vaajtswv ua tau tej kws kuv ua nuav; mej puavleej yog kuv cov timkhawv.
Kuv yog Vaajtswv hab kuv yeej yuav zoo le nuav moog ibtxhis le. Tsi muaj ib tug twg yuav tsiv dlhau kuv lub fwjchim, tej kws kuv ua yeej tsi muaj leejtwg hloov tau ib zag le.”

Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv, tug TSWV kws txhwv mej dlim has tas, “Vim kuv xaav cawm kuas mej dlim, kuv txhaj txhij tubrog moog tua lub nroog Npanpiloos; kuv yuav tsoo tej roojvaag nroog kuas tawg taag, hab tej tuabneeg lub suab qw yuav ua suab quaj suab nyav.
Kuv yog tug TSWV, mej tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv. Cov Yixalayees, kuv yog tug kws tsim mej hab yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav mej ntaag.”
Tug TSWV has le nuav, leejtwg yog tug rhawv txujkev phua plhawv havtxwv rua saab tim u, yog txujkev kws tshaab plawg huv tug dlej kws ntsawj ceev heev?

Tug TSWV txhaj coj puab paab tubrog coob coob kws muaj zug heev moog raug kev puamtuaj, cov tubrog tsaav tsheb neeg hab tej neeg tog taag rua huv dlej hab puab tsi sawv le lawm, puab pluj ntshis moog ib yaam le tug nplaim teeb kws tuag lawm.
Tabsis tug TSWV has tas, “Tsi xob ncu txug tej xwmtxheej kws tub dlhau lug lawm lossis tsi xob xaav txug tej xwm ntawd le.

Kuv taabtom ua yaam tshab; nwgnuav yaam ntawd tub tshwm tuaj lawm, mej tsi pum yaam ntawd le los? Kuv yuav ua ib txujkev moog phua plhawv huv tej nraag mojsaab qhua, hab muaj dlej txhawv ndlwg ndlo huv taj suabpuam.

Txawm yog tej tsaj qus los los yuav fwm kuv, tej maa hab noog ntxhuav puavleej yuav qhuas kuv, rua qhov kuv ua kuas muaj dlej nyob huv tej nraag mojsaab qhua, hab ua kuas muaj dlej txhawv ndlwg ndlo huv taj suabpuam, tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv xaiv txhaj tau dlej haus.
Puab yog tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv tsim tseg ua kuv tug, puab yuav hu nkauj qhuas kuv!”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees, txawm yog kuv paab mej npaum le ntawd los mej tseem dlhuav kuv hab tsi pehawm kuv le.

Mej tub tsi coj mej tej yaaj tuaj tua hlawv fij rua kuv, lossis ua rua kuv tau ntsejmuag lug ntawm mej tej khoom fij le. Kuv tsi tau ua kuas mej nyuaj sab vim tej khoom fij ntawd, lossis ua kuas mej qaug zug vim tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab.

Mej tub tsi tau muab nyaj yuav moov tshuaj tsw qaab tuaj rua kuv, lossis muab tej roj tsaj kws mej tua ua khoom fij pub rua kuv. Tabsis mej ua rua kuv nyuaj sab vim mej tej kev txhum, kuv dlhuav mej tej kev txhum kawg le.
Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws zaam txim rua mej, kuv ua le nuav, vim kuv yog tug zoo, hab kuv yuav tsi cim ntsoov mej tej kev txhum ca.
“Ca le pav tej qub lug rua kuv, peb lug sis caav ua ke, hab peev mej zaaj tuaj saib mej puas yog tug kws tsi muaj txhum.
