Mej thawj tug yawmkoob tau ua txhum; mej cov thawjcoj tau ntxeev sab rua kuv,
hab mej cov numtswv saib tsi taug kuv qhov chaw dlawbhuv. Kuv txhaj tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees; kuv txhaj tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg rua luas txobthuam.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees kws yog kuv cov tubkhai, Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv yog tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv xaiv tseg lawm, nwgnuav mej ca le noog kuv has!
Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Kuv yog tug tsim mej, kuv tsim mej rua huv leej nam plaab hab kuv yuav paab mej: Yakhauj, kuv tug tubkhai, Yesuloos tug kws kuv xaiv tseg, mej tsi xob ntshai!

“ ‘Kuv yuav tso dlej lug rua huv lub tebchaws kws nqhes dlej, hab ua kuas muaj dlej ndlwg sau tej aav kws qhuav nkig nkuav. Kuv yuav tso kuv tug ntsujplig lug rua mej cov xeebntxwv, hab foom koob moov rua mej cov mivnyuas.
Puab yuav hlub mog nyoos le tej nroj kws tuaj ntawm ntug dlej, hab zoo le tej ntoo kws tuaj ntawm ntug dlej.

“ ‘Tej tuabneeg ib leeg has rua ib leeg has tas, “Kuv yog tug TSWV le tuabneeg.” Puab yuav kaav xeem ua tuabneeg Yixalayees. Nyag taug nyag sau tug TSWV lub npe rua ntawm nyag txhais npaab has tas, nwg yog Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg.’ ”

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv hab yog puab tug cawmseej, yog tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le nuav tas: “Kuv yog lub hauvpaug hab yog lub ntsis, tsi muaj dlua lwm tug vaajtswv le lawm, tsuas yog kuv tuab leeg xwb.
Leejtwg txhaj muaj peevxwm ua tau le kuv ua? Leejtwg txhaj muaj peevxwm qha txhua yaam thaus hauvpaug kws kuv tsim kuv tsaav tuabneeg lug hab moog txug thaus kawg rua peb noog?

Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej tsi xob ntshai! Kuv tub qha txhua yaam kws tshwmsim thaus hauvpaug rua mej paub lug txug naj nub nua, hab mej yog kuv cov timkhawv ntaag. Puas muaj dlua lwm tug vaajtswv lawm? Puas muaj tej tug vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim heev kws kuv tsi tau nov dlua le?”

Cov tuabneeg kws puab mlom, yeej tsi tseemceeb hab tej vaajtswv kws puab fwm tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi. Cov tuabneeg kws pe tej vaajtswv nuav yog tuabneeg dligmuag hab tsi paub qaabhau, puab yuav raug kev txaajmuag.
Qhov kws tuabneeg nchuav mlom nyaj mlom kub lug pe, tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi le.

Txhua tug kws pe mlom yuav raug kev txaajmuag; cov tuabneeg kws puab mlom, puab yog tuabneeg xwb, tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi. Ca le tso puab lug rua ntawm lub rooj txav txim, puab yuav ntshai hab txaajmuag heev.

Tug kws ntaus hlau muab ib thooj hlau coj moog hlawv rua huv lwjhlaus. Nwg saab npaab kws muaj zug tuav rauj ntaus thooj hlau ua tau ib tug mlom. Thaus nwg ua num nwg tshaib plaab, nqhes dlej hab tsaug muas kawg le.

Tug txua ntoo, muab hlua ntsuag thooj ntoo. Nwg muab cwjmem suam thoob plawg, nwg muab txaug lug txaug thooj ntoo ntawd kuas zoo nkaus le tuabneeg tug yaam ntxwv hab coj moog teeb rua huv nwg lub tsev.
Nwg ntuv tej ntoo cab lossis xaiv tej ntoo npeb lossis ntoo qheb huv haav zoov lug siv. Lossis nwg cog yub ntoo thuv ca, tog naag lug ywg kuas tej yub thuv ntawd hlub.

Tug tuabneeg ntawd muab ib tog ntoo lug ua tawg rauv hab muab ib tog lug txua ua mlom. Nwg muab ib tog ua tawg rauv nte hab rauv ci ncuav; dlua le ntawd nwg muab ib tog lug txua ua ib tug mlom rua nwg teev.
Nwg muab ibtxha ua tawg rauv; nwg ci nqaj noj qhuas ntxhas, hab nwg txaus sab heev; nwg tau tej suavtawg ntawd nte, nwg has tas, “Ua caag yuav zoo hab suv ua luaj! Tej ntoo nuav cig zoo kawg.”
Tog ntoo kws seem, nwg muab txua ua ib tug mlom; nwg pe hab teev tug mlom ntawd. Nwg thov tug mlom ntawd has tas, “Koj yog kuv tug vaajtswv, thov paab kuas kuv dlim lauj!”
Puab lub sab ruag kawg le, puab qe muag nti hab ntsaws qhovntsej, kuas puab tsi pum hab tsi paub dlaabtsi.

Tug kws txua mlom tub raag tsi txug has tas, “Kuv muab ib tog ntoo lug ua tawg rauv. Kuv ci ncuav hab ci nqaj sau cov ncaig lug noj. Tog ntoo kws seem, kuv muab txua ua ib tug mlom, hab kuv taabtom pe tog ntoo ntawd ntaag!”
Qhov kws nwg pe mlom  ntawd cuag le noj tshauv ntaag. Puab lub sab ruag coj puab moog yuam kev. Puab tsi pum has tas, tug mlom kws puab tuav rawv ntawm teg tsi yog vaajtswv hlo le.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Yakhauj, ncu ntsoov tej nuav; Yixalayees, mej yog kuv cov tubkhai kws kuv tsim. Yixalayees, mej yog kuv cov tubkhai kuv yuav ncu ntsoov mej moog le.
Kuv muab mej tej kev txhum tshem moog povtseg ib yaam le tauv fuab, hab tshem mej lub txim ib yaam le lub lwg dlej thaus sawv ntxuv. Mej ca le rov lug cuag kuv, kuv yog tug kws txhwv mej dlim.”

Lub ntuj ca le hu nkauj zoo sab, rua qhov tug TSWV ua tej nuav tav lawm; nruab tivtxwv ca le tsaa suab qw nrov nrov, tej hauv roob, ca le hu nkauj zoo sab, haav zoov hab txhua tug ntoo, ca le hu nkauj zoo sab! Tug TSWV tub txhwv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees dlim lawm, qhov kws nwg ua le ntawd, ua kuas suavdlawg pum nwg tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab.

“Kuv yog tug TSWV, mej tug Cawmseej, kuv yog tug tsim mej rua huv leej nam plaab. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws tsim ib puas tsaav yaam. Kuv tuab leeg yog tug nthuav lub ntuj, kuv tuab leeg yog tug tsim lub nplajteb.

Kuv ua kuas cov tuabneeg saib moov tej lug tsi tseeb, hab muab cov tuabneeg kws txawj saib nub, saib hli tej lug rhuav kuas tsi tshwmsim lawv le puab has. Kuv tsi noog tej lug kws cov tuabneeg ntse has, hab kuv ua kuas puab has puab tej lug tsi muaj kuab.

Tabsis thaus kuv tug tubkhai moog qha tej kws yuav tshwmsim lug, hab thaus kuv tug tubkhai moog qha tej kws kuv yuav ua, kuv yuav ua kuas tej ntawd tav lawv le tej lug kws kuv has. Kuv qha lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas yuav muaj tuabneeg rov lug nyob huv, hab puab yuav rov txhim khu cov Yudas tej nroog dlua tshab; hab kuv yuav tsaa puab tej nroog kws raug puamtsuaj lawm sawv rov lug.
Kuv has rua dlej havtxwv tub has tas, ‘Ca le nqhuab, kuv yuav ua kuas tej dlej nqhuab taag huv tuabsi.’

Kuv has rua Xailas has tas, ‘Koj yog kuv tug tub yug yaaj, koj yuav ua kuv teg num kuas tav lawv le kuv lub sab nyam; koj yuav has kuas tuabneeg txhim khu lub nroog Yeluxalees dlua tshab, hab has kuas puab rov pua lub tuamtsev dlua tshab.’ ”

Tug TSWV xaiv Xailas ua vaajntxwv. Tug TSWV tsaa Xailas ntaus kuas yeej txhua tsaav tuabneeg; nwg khaiv Xailas moog txu tej vaajntxwv kuas poob fwjchim; tug TSWV yuav qheb ntau lub nroog tej roojvaag rua nwg txeem moog rua huv. Tug TSWV txhaj le has rua Xailas has tas:

“Kuv yuav ua koj ntej moog khu kev rua koj, hab muab tej hauv roob nphau kuas taj sis txig. Kuv yuav tsoo tej roojvaag tooj kuas tawg ua tej dlaim, hab muab tej nqaaj hlau txav kuas tu taag huv tuabsi.
Kuv yuav muab tej nyaj huv qhov tsaus ntuj nti kws tsi muaj leejtwg paub pub rua koj; ces koj txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tuav koj lub npe hu koj.
Vim kuv pum txug Yakhauj kws yog kuv tug tubkhai, hab cov Yixalayees kws kuv xaiv tseg lawm, kuv txhaj tuav koj lub npe hu koj, txawm yog koj tsi paub kuv los kuv tub pub rua koj tau koob meej lawm.
“Kuv yog tug TSWV, yeej tsi muaj dlua lwm tug Vaajtswv le lawm, txawm yog koj tsi paub kuv los kuv yuav txhawb koj tug zug.
Kuv ua le nuav kuas txhua tug kws nyob thoob qaab ntuj txhaj paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV hab tsi muaj dlua lwm tug Vaajtswv le lawm.
Kuv tsim qhov kaaj hab qhov tsaus, kuv yog tug pub koob moov hab tso kev puamtsuaj lug. Kuv yog tug TSWV, tej nuav puavleej yog kuv tsim huv tuabsi.

Kuv yuav tso kev muaj yeej ib yaam le naag lug sau ntuj lug, lub nplajteb yuav tau txais txujkev muaj yeej ntawd, kev thaajyeeb hab kev ncaaj nceeg yuav tawg paaj txi txiv huv lub nplajteb. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yuav ua kuas tej nuav tshwmsim lug.”

Lub laujkaub aav muaj cuabkaav nrug tug kws puab laujkaub aav sis caav los? Nwg tsuas yog ib lub laujkaub kws zoo le lwm lub xwb los sav? Cov aav nplaum puas nug tug puab lub laujkaub has tas, “Koj ua dlaabtsi?” Lub laujkaub puas ywg tug kws puab lub laujkaub has tas, “Koj tub tsi txawj puab le los sav!”
Kev puamtsuaj yuav lug raug tug kws nug nwg nam nwg txiv has tas, “Vim le caag meb yug tau kuv zoo le nuav?”
Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv yog tug npaaj tej kws yuav muaj lug yaav tom ntej, nwg has tas: “Mej tsi muaj cai yuav nug txug kuv cov mivnyuas, lossis qha num rua kuv ua le!
Kuv yog tug kws tsim lub nplajteb hab tsim tuabneeg lug nyob rua huv. Kuv siv kuv lub fwjchim lug nthuav lub ntuj; kuv kaav lub nub, lub hli hab tej nubqub huv tuabsi.

Kuv tshoov Xailas sab kuas nwg ua tej nuav tav lawv le kuv npaaj tseg hab khu tej kws tsi zoo kuas zoo. Txhua txujkev kws nwg taug kuv yuav khu kuas ncaaj. Nwg yuav rov txhim khu kuv lub nroog Yeluxalees dlua tshab, hab tso kuv cov tuabneeg kws raug luas nteg moog kuas dlim rov lug. Tsi muaj leejtwg ndlav lossis muab nyaj xab kuas nwg ua tej nuav le.” Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, yog tug has tej lug nuav ntaag.

Tug TSWV has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Cov Iziv hab cov Sudaas tej nyaj txag yuav yog mej tug, hab cov tuabneeg Xenpas kws luj sab yuav tau ua mej qhev; puab yuav raug saw hlau khi rawv lawv mej qaab. Puab yuav txhus caug ndlua pe mej hab leeg has tas, ‘Vaajtswv nrug nraim mej nyob, hab nwg tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv.
Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg dlim kev puamtsuaj, yog tug Vaajtswv kws tsi tshwm rua leejtwg pum.
Cov tuabneeg kws puab mlom yuav raug txaajmuag hab poob ntsejmuag.
Tabsis tug TSWV yog tug kws cawm cov Yixalayees dlim, puab yuav kovyeej moog ibtxhis, hab puab yuav tsi poob ntsejmuag ib zag le.’ ”

Tug TSWV yog tug kws tsim lub ntuj, nwg tuab leeg txhaj yog Vaajtswv, nwg yog tug kws tsim lub nplajteb, nwg ua kuas nplajteb nyob ruaj khov moog ibtxhis. Nwg tsi tau tsim lub nplajteb lug nyob dlo cuas tsi muaj dlaabtsi, tabsis nwg tsim lug rua tuabneeg nyob. Nwg yog tug kws has tas, “Kuv yog tug TSWV, tsi muaj dlua lwm tug Vaajtswv le lawm.

Kuv tsi tau has nraim nkoog tsi pub leejtwg nov, lossis npog tej kws kuv ua lub ntsab tsi pub leejtwg paub. Kuv tsi tau has kuas cov Yixalayees tuaj nrhav kuv huv qhov tsaus ntuj nti. Kuv yog tug TSWV, kuv has tej lug tseeb xwb; hab yaam kws yog kuv txhaj qha rua suavdlawg paub.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej cov kws dlim kev tuag ntawm txhua tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le sis sau lug ua ke hab txaav lug kuas ze! Tej tuabneeg nqaa rawv tej mlom ntoo hab thov tug vaajtswv kws cawm tsi tau puab, puab tsi paub dlaabtsi.

Ca le tuaj rua huv tsev tu plaub hab peev mej tej lug, ca cov tuabneeg kws puab has dlaws puab zaaj sis tuavxaam ua ke. Leejtwg pav tej nuav thaus u lug lawm, tsi yog kuv kws yog tug TSWV pav los? Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug dlawbhuv hab yog tug Cawmseej; yeej tsi muaj dlua lwm tug Vaajtswv le lawm.
“Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws kws nyob huv nplajteb, ca le tig lug cuag kuv, mej txhaj yuav dlim! Kuv txhaj yog Vaajtswv, yeej tsi muaj dlua lwm tug Vaajtswv le.
Kuv tej lug cog tseg yeej yog lug tseeb hab yuav tsi hloov le. Kuv qha tseeb has tas txhua tug yuav tau txhus caug ntawm kuv xubndlag hab leeg has tas puab yuav muab sab npuab kuv.
“Puab yuav has tas, tsuas yog tug TSWV tuab leeg xwb, txhaj yuav pub puab kovyeej hab muaj zug; tabsis txhua tug kws ntxub kuv yuav raug kev txaajmuag.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws cawm taagnrho Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv kuas dlim hab puab yuav ua kuv tsaug.”
“Thaus u muaj tuabneeg tuaj pe tug mlom Npees hab tug mlom Nenpaus. Tabsis nwgnuav luas muab rua tsaj thauj lawm xwb, tej mlom ntawd tsuas ua lub nraa nyaav rua tej tsaj xwb.
Cov mlom ntawd yeej paab tsi tau kuas mlom dlim le; cov mlom ntawd txhaj raug luas muab coj moog lawm. Nuav yog qhov kawg rua lub nroog Npanpiloos tej vaajtswv.
“Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv kws yog tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kws tseem tshuav nyob, mej ca le noog kuv has, kuv yeej tsomkwm mej thaus kws nyavnyuas yug tau mej lug lawm.
Kuv yog mej tug Vaajtswv, hab kuv yuav tsomkwm mej moog txug thaus mej laug hab plaubhau dlawb lawm. Kuv yog tug tsim mej hab yuav tu mej; kuv yuav paab mej hab tso kuas mej dlim.
“Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Mej yuav muab kuv pev rua leejtwg?’ ” “Puas muaj lwm tug zoo le kuv hab?
Cov tuabneeg qheb puab tej naab rhu puab tej kub lug; hab muab puab tej nyaj lug luj sau teev. Puab ndlav ib tug txawj nchuav kub tuaj nchuav ib tug mlom; ces puab moog txhus caug pe tug mlom ntawd.

Puab tsaws tug mlom ntawd rua sau xubpwg kwv moog; puab coj moog txawb rua ib qhov chaw, tug mlom ntawd moog tsi tau qhov twg le. leejtwg thov nwg los nwg tsi paub teb, lossis nwg cawm tsi tau leejtwg dlim ntawm txujkev puamtsuaj le.
“Ncu ntsoov tej nuav hab ua tuab zoo xaav, mej cov tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab, ca le khaws nkaus ca rua nruab sab.
Ncu ntsoov tej xwmtxheej kws tshwmsim thaus u lug lawm; kuv yog Vaajtswv, tsi muaj dlua lwm tug lawm; kuv yog Vaajtswv, tsi muaj lwm tug zoo le kuv,

thaus chivkeeb kuv tub yeej qha zaaj kws yuav muaj tshwmsim lug thaus nplajteb yuav kawg lawm. Kuv has tas, ‘Tej kws kuv tub npaaj lawm, yuav nyob khov kho, kuv yuav ua txhua yaam kuas tav lawv le kuv tau npaaj tseg lawm.’ ”

Kuv taabtom hu ib tug tuabneeg dlha ceev cuag dlaav yaa tim nubtuaj tuaj; nwg nyob lub tebchaws kws dleb kawg le tuaj, nwg yuav ua kuas kuv teg num tav, kuv has le caag, kuv yuav ua le ntawd, hab kuv npaaj sab le caag, kuv yuav ua le ntawd ntaag.
“Cov tuabneeg sab tawv, yog leejtwg xaav has tas nwg tseem nyob dleb ntawm txujkev dlim, ces ca le noog kuv tej lug!

Kuv coj txujkev cawm dlim lug ze, hab nyob tsi dleb mej lawm. Kuv txujkev cawm dlim yuav tsi muab ncua tseg le; kuv yuav cawm lub nroog Yeluxalees hab yuav coj lub koob meej zoo lug rua cov Yixalayees.”

“Npanpiloos tug ntxhais nkaujxwb, koj ca le nqeg lug nyob sau c ov moov aav; Npanpiloos tug ntxhais, koj ca le nqeg lug nyob huv aav kws tsi muaj lub zwmtxwv! Vim luas yuav tsi hu has tas, koj yog tug nkauj mog kws zoo nkauj ntxiv lawm.
Muab lub zeb lug zum moov nplej, yaws koj dlaim ntaub npug ntsejmuag, hle koj lub tsho ntev, qaws koj dlaim tab, hab dlaws koj txhais nrhoob kwm dlej moog.
Koj yuav nyob labqaab hab luas yuav pum koj qhov chaw txaajmuag. Kuv yuav ua pauj hab yuav tsi tseg leejtwg le.”
Tug kws txhwv peb dlim lub npe hu ua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, nwg yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Npanpiloos tug ntxhais, koj ca le nyob tuabywv hab moog rua huv qhov tsaus ntuj nti; vim le ntawd luas yuav tsi hu koj ua ntau lub tebchaws tug puj vaajntxwv ntxiv lawm!

Yaav taag lug kuv chim heev rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg; kuv txhaj rhu kuv txuj koob moov rov qaab lawm. Kuv muab puab cob rua koj teg, hab koj tsi hlub puab hlo le. Txawm yog cov kws tub laug lawm los koj tseem muab tug quabtwg kws nyaav tshaaj plawg khuam rua sau puab xubpwg.
Koj has tas, koj yuav tau ua puj vaajntxwv moog ibtxhis,” vim le ntawd koj txhaj tsi khaws tej nuav rua nruab sab, lossis tsi xaav txug has tas tej nuav yuav txawj kawg.

“Koj tug kws nyam kev lomzem, ca le noog tej lug nuav; koj xaav has tas koj tub dlim hab tau nyob kaaj sab lug lawm. Koj has tas koj muaj fwjchim luj ib yaam le Vaajtswv, hab yeej tsi muaj ib tug zoo npaum le koj. Koj xaav has tas koj yuav tsi tau ua puj ntsuag lossis tau kev txomnyem kws koj tej mivnyuas tuag tso koj tseg.
Muaj ib nub koj tsi nwm txug ob yaam xwm nuav yuav lug raug koj; vim koj tej tswvyim phem hab koj tej khawvkoob, koj cov mivnyuas hab koj tug quasyawg yuav tuag tso koj tseg.

“Koj ca sab ntsoov rua koj tej kev phem kev qas nkaus xwb; koj has tas yeej tsi muaj leejtwg pum koj hlo le. Koj lub tswvyim hab tej kev txawj ntse tub ua rua koj yuam kev, hab koj xaav huv koj lub sab has tas, ‘Kuv yog Vaajtswv ntaag, tsi muaj dlua lwm tug lawm.’
Koj yuav raug kev puamtsuaj, hab koj tej khawvkoob yuav paab tsi tau koj; koj yuav raug tej kev pemsij kws koj nwm tsi txug; yog txujkev pemsij kws koj yeej tsi tau xaav txug le.
Ca sab ntsoov rua koj tej khawvkoob hab koj tej dlaab neeb kws koj ibtxwm coj thaus koj tseem hluas lug lawm. Tej zag tej ntawd yuav paab tau koj; hab tej zag yuav ua rua koj cov yeebncuab ntshai.

Koj qaug zug taag vim muaj ntau tug nrug koj tuavxaam. Ca le kuas koj cov tuabneeg kws txawj saib nubqub, moog sawv tom hauv ntej hab paab koj, puab cov tuabneeg kws kawm txug tej nubqub, puab yuav muab lub ntuj faib ua tej ntsuj hab qha koj ib hlis dlhau ib hlis, saib yuav muaj xwmtxheej dlaabtsi  lug raug koj.

“Puab zoo ib yaam le cov quavnyaab npleg, hab suavtawg yuav kub puab! Puab tsi muaj peevxwm paab kuas puab dlim ntawm cov nplaim tawg ntawd le. Tsi yog cov ncaig tawg kws txhab kuas suv; hab tsi yog lub cubtawg kws rauv rua puab nte.

Cov tuabneeg kws ua num rua koj yuav ua le nuav rua koj, puab yog cov txawj saib nubqub rua koj thaus koj tseem hluas lug. Puab yuav ncaim koj hab nyag moog nyag lawm, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg paab kuas koj dlim le.”
Cov Yixalayees kws yog Yudas cov xeebntxwv: mej ca le noog tej lug nuav: mej tuav Vaajtswv lub npe coglug has tas, yuav pehawm cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, tabsis mej tsi ua lawv le tej lug ntawd.
Mej has tas mej yog cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog dlawbhuv, hab tso sab plhuav rua cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, nwg lub npe hu ua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.
“Tug TSWV has rua cov Yixalayees has tas: thaus u kuv tub qha rua mej lawm has tas, yuav muaj dlaabtsi tshwmsim lug; yog le ntawd, thaus mej tsi nwm txug kuv txhaj yuav ua kuas tej ntawd tshwm lug.
Kuv yeej paub has tas, mej yog tuabneeg tawv ncauj, mej lub cejdlaab tawv npaum le hlau hab mej lub hauvplaj tawv npaum le tooj dlaag.

Yog le ntawd kuv tub xub qha txug mej lub neej yaav pegsuab rua mej paub thaus u lawm. Kuv qha ua ntej kws tej ntawd tshwmsim lug, kuas mej tsi xob khaav has tas, yog mej tej mlom ntoo lossis mlom tooj ua kuas tej ntawd tshwmsim lug.
“Mej tub nov tej nuav hab pum tej ntawd lawm. Mej txawm tsi leeg paub le los? Txij nuav moog kuv yuav qha tej yaam tshab rua mej paub, yog tej yaam zais quas nreeg kws mej tsi tau paub dlua le.
Tej xwmtxheej kws kuv nyavnyuas ua nuav mej yeej tsi tau nov dlua le. Yog mej nov lawm, mej yuav khaav has tas, ‘Peb tub paub lawm.’

Mej yeej ibtxwm tsi nov, mej yeej ibtxwm tsi paub le, txij thaus u lug mej lub qhovntsej yeej tsi qheb. Vim kuv paub mej lub sab yeej tsi ncaaj, hab mej yeej yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab thaus yug tau mej lug le lawm.
“Vim kuv xaav kuas tuabneeg qhuas kuv lub npe, kuv cheem kuv txujkev chim tseg rua nruab sab. Kuv cheem tej ntawd txhaj tsi ua rua mej puamtsuaj.
Kuv coj kev nyuaj sab lug sim mej ib yaam le nchuav nyaj huv yeejvub, tabsis kuv pum has tas mej tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi le.
Vim kuv xaav ua rua kuv, vim kuv xaav ua rua kuv xwb, kuv txhaj ua tej nuav, kuv yuav tsi pub leejtwg saib tsi taug kuv lub npe, lossis tsi pub leejtwg muaj feem koom nrug kuv tug tshwjchim le.”
“Yakhauj, koj ca le noog kuv tej lug, Yixalayees tug kws kuv tau hu! Kuv yog Vaajtswv, kuv yog lub hauvpaug hab yog lub ntsis.
Yog kuv txhais teg tsim lub nplajteb, hab kuv saab teg xis nthuav lub ntuj; thaus kuv hu, lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj tuab txhij tawm tuaj.

“Mej suavdlawg ca le sis sau lug ua ke hab noog kuv has! Puab cov ntawd, leejtwg txhaj tshaajtawm tau tej nuav rua suavdlawg? Tug TSWV hlub Xailas heev, tug TSWV txhaj tau xaiv Xailas ua nwg teg num rua lub nroog Npanpiloos, hab tug TSWV txhais teg yuav tawmtsaam lub nroog Npanpiloos.
Kuv yog tug has hab yog tug hu Xailas ntaag; kuv coj nwg lug hab ua kuas nwg vaammeej.

“Ca le txaav lug kuas ze txhaj nov zaaj kws kuv has nuav, kuv yeej qha zaaj nuav thaus chivkeeb lug tsi zais le, hab yeej tshwm muaj tseeb lawv le kuv tej lug.” (Nwgnuav tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv muab nwg lub fwjchim rua kuv hab khaiv kuv moog.)
Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv, tug TSWV kws txhwv mej dlim has tas: “Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, tug kws qha tej kev zoo rua mej, tug kws coj mej txujkev kws tsimnyog taug.
“Yog mej ua tuab zoo noog kuv tej lug saamfwm! Ces tej koob moov yuav ndlwg laub lug lug rua mej ib yaam le tug dlej ndlwg tsi paub nqhuab le. Mej tej kev vaammeej yuav zoo ib yaam le havtxwv ndlaas.
Mej tej tubki yuav fuamvaam coob suav tsi txheeb ib yaam le tej xuabzeb, puab tej npe yuav tsi raug rhu tawm ntawm kuv lossis tsi raug puamtsuaj le.”
Ca le tsiv tawm huv lub nroog Npanpiloos moog, ca le tsiv kuas dlim. Ca le hu nkauj zoo sab rua txhua qhov paub has tas, “Tug TSWV tau txhwv nwg tug tubkhai Yixalayees dlim lawm!”

Thaus tug TSWV coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg taug kev lug hlaa taj suabpuam kws tshaav ntuj kub heev ntawd, puab yeej tsi raug kev txomnyem hab nqhes dlej le. Tug TSWV ua kuas dlej txhawv huv pobzeb lug rua puab haus; nwg rua lub pobzeb dlej txhaj tawm huv lug.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tsi muaj kev kaaj sab rua cov tuabneeg ua txhum le.”

Txhua lub tebchaws kws nyob dleb, ca le noog kuv has, cov tuabneeg kws nyob dleb, tug TSWV tub xaiv kuv thaus kuv tseem nyob huv plaab, hab nwg yeej tis kuv lub npe thaus kuv tseem nyob huv nam plaab.
Nwg ua rua kuv tej lug ntse ib yaam le nav ntaaj, nwg muab nwg txhais teg tiv thaiv kuv. Nwg ua rua kuv zoo ib yaam le xibxub kws ntse heev hab npaaj rawv tog tua lawm xwb.
Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Cov Yixalayees, mej yog kuv cov tubkhai, mej yuav ua rua kuv tau koob meej.”

Kuv has tas, “Kuv tub ua num nyaav heev, tabsis tsi muaj qaabhau! Kuv tub siv kuv tug zug, tabsis tsi muaj dlaabtsi tav.” Txawm le ntawd los kuv tseem tso sab rua tug TSWV; hab kuv tug TSWV yuav coj nqe zug lug rua kuv.

Tug TSWV tub tsaa kuv ua nwg tug tubkhai thaus kuv tseem nyob huv nam plaab, tug TSWV tsaa kuv ua nwg tug tubkhai, coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kws tawg ua saab ua sua lawm, rov qaab lug cuag nwg. Tug TSWV yuav pub kuv tau ntsejmuag, hab Vaajtswv yog kuv tug zug,

Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Kuv tug tubkhai, kuv muab tej num tseemceeb dlua yaav taag lug lawm rua koj ua, koj yuav ua rua cov Yixalayees kws tseem seem nyob rov vaammeej tshaaj qub, tsi yog le ntawd xwb, kuv tseem yuav ca koj ua lub teeb ci rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg, kuas tuabneeg nplajteb txhaj yuav dlim.”

Tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv kws txhwv cov Yixalayees dlim; has rua tug tuabneeg kws raug luas thuam hab tug kws raug lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej numtswv cov tubkhai ntxub has tas, “Tej vaajntxwv yuav pum koj hab sawv hawm koj, cov numtswv puavleej pum koj hab khoov ntshis hawm; rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv, nwg yog tug ncaaj nceeg, nwg tub xaiv koj ca lawm.”

Tug TSWV has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg tas, “Thaus txug lub sijhawm kws kuv cawm mej, kuv yuav hlub mej, kuv yuav tsomkwm mej, kuv yuav teb mej tej lug thov, hab mej yuav yog kuv lu lug cog tseg rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg. Kuv yuav ca mej rov moog nyob huv mej lub tebchaws kws nwgnuav faab nyo.

Kuv yuav has rua cov tuabneeg kws raug luas nteg tas, ‘Ca le tawm moog!’ Hab has rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv qhov tsaus ntuj nti tas, ‘Ca le lug rua ntawm qhov pum kev!’ Puab yuav nrhav noj sau tej roob ib yaam le tej yaaj.

Puab yuav tsi raug kev tshaib kev nqhes. Lub nub hab tej cua suv tom taj suabpuam yuav tsi kub puab, vim tug kws hlub puab yuav coj puab kev moog. Nwg yuav coj puab moog rua ntawm qhov chaw kws muaj dlej txhawv.
“Kuv yuav rhawv ib txuj nam kev luj sau tej roob rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg taug.
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg yuav lug dleb dleb lug, puab yuav lug saab peg qaumteb, saab nubpoob hab huv lub nroog Axavas kws nyob saab qaabteb lug.”

Lub ntuj, ca le hu nkauj! Lub nplajteb, ca le qw zoo sab! Tej toj roob hauv peg ca le tsaa suab hu nkauj; tug TSWV yuav nplig nwg tsaav tuabneeg sab; nwg yuav taabncuab nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws raug kev txomnyem.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, “Tug TSWV tub tso peb tseg lawm; peb tug TSWV tsi ncu qaab txug peb lawm.”

Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV teb has tas, “Puas muaj ib leej nam twg kws tsi ncu qaab nwg tug mivnyuas mog, hab tsi hlub tug mivnyuas kws nwg yug? Txawm yog leej nam tsi ncu qaab nwg tug mivnyuas los xij, kuv yuav ncu ntsoov mej hab tsi tso mej tseg ib zag le.
Yeluxalees, kuv yeej ncu ntsoov koj, kuv sau koj lub npe rua huv kuv ob lub xibteg. Kuv yuav saib ntsoov koj moog le.
“Tshuav tsi ntev cov tuabneeg kws yuav txhim khu lub nroog Yeluxalees tub yuav lug, hab cov tuabneeg kws rhuav tshem koj yuav tsiv moog.

Ca le tsaa qhovmuag saib puagncig; saib tej xwm ntawd! Koj tsaav tuabneeg taabtom sis sau ua ke puab yuav lug cuag koj! Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Kuv yog tug kws muaj sa nyob, koj yuav zoo sab rua koj tsaav tuabneeg ib yaam le tug nkauj nyaab zoo sab rua nwg tej npauj nyag npauj kub.

“ ‘Mej lub tebchaws raug puamtsuaj nyob dlo cuas ca, nwgnuav lub tebchaws yuav tsi txaus cov tuabneeg kws taabtom lug ntawd nyob, hab cov tuabneeg kws muab koj ua puag taag lawm, yuav raug luas lawv kuas tsiv moog dleb heev.

Muaj ib nub mej cov mivnyuas kws yug thaus mej raug luas nteg moog, yuav has rua mej tas, “Lub tebchaws nuav nqaim rua peb heev, peb xaav kuas tau lub tebchaws kws dlaav dlua lub nuav, txhaj txaus peb nyob!”

Ces koj yuav xaav has tas, “Leejtwg yug cov mivnyuas nuav rua kuv? Kuv tej mivnyuas tub tuag taag hab kuv muaj tsi taug mivnyuas lawm. Kuv raug luas nteg coj moog nyob rua lwm lub tebchaws kws dleb heev, tabsis leejtwg tu cov mivnyuas nuav luj hlub? Kuv tub nyob dlo cuas ca lawm, yog le ntawd, tej mivnyuas nuav tseem lug qhov twg lug hab?” ’ ”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg tas: “Kuv yuav cu teg rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg, hab qha rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg kuas puag mej cov tub ntawm puab xubndlag, hab ris mej cov ntxhais lug tsev.

Tej vaajntxwv yuav zoo le mej txiv, tej puj vaajntxwv yuav zoo le mej nam. Puab yuav nyo taubhau hawm mej hab txu fwjchim qeg kawg le. Ces mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV; cov tuabneeg kws tog rawv kuv paab yuav tsi nkim puab tug zug le.”
Mej puas muaj peevxwm moog muab tej khoom kws cov tubrog moog fuab tau lug? Mej puas muaj peevxwm moog tso cov tuabneeg kws tug tuabneeg limham nteg lawm?

Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Txawm yog cov tuabneeg kws raug cov tubrog nteg los yuav coj moog, hab tej khoom kws cov tuabneeg limham fuab tau los yuav coj moog. Kuv yuav tawmtsaam cov tuabneeg kws tawmtsaam mej, hab kuv yuav cawm mej cov mivnyuas kuas dlim.

Kuv yuav ua kuas cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom mej rov sis tua ua lwj ua lam ib yaam le cov tuabneeg qaug cawv. Ces thaus ntawd txhua tsaav tuabneeg txhaj paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Cawmseej hab yog tug kws txhwv mej dlim; kuv yog Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.”

Vaajtswv has tas, “Koj xaav has tas, kuv tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg tseg, ib yaam le tug txivneej kws muab nwg tug quaspuj nrauj nua los? Dlaim ntawv nrauj nyob qhov twg? Koj xaav has tas kuv muab koj muag rua luas coj moog rau txim, ib yaam le tug txivneej kws muab nwg cov mivnyuas muag moog ua qhev nua los? Tsis yog le ntawd, koj raug muag vim koj tej kev txhum; koj raug xaa moog povtseg, vim koj nam tau ua txhum xwb.

“Vim le caag thaus kuv lug tsi muaj ib tug tuabneeg nyob ntawd? Vim le caag thaus kuv hu tsi muaj ib tug tuabneeg teb? Kuv txhais npaab tuab lu heev, paab tsi tau koj los? Lossis yog kuv tsi muaj fwjchim tso koj dlim? Kuv muaj peevxwm has kuas dlej havtxwv nqhuab hab muab tej haav dlej hloov ua suabpuam, tej ntseg yuav tuag tsw lwj ntxag.
Kuv muab kev tsaus ntuj lug thaiv lub ntuj, hab muab ntaub tsaaj lug qhwv lub ntuj.”
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv pub tswvyim rua kuv, yog le ntawd kuv txhaj txawj txhawb tau cov tuabneeg kws qaug zug. Txhua taagkig nwg pub kuv muaj lub sab kub lug noog tej lug kws nwg qha rua kuv.
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv ua rua kuv txawj totaub, kuv tsi tau ntxeev sab lossis tsiv tawm ntawm nwg.
Kuv tig nrausqaum rua cov tuabneeg kws nplawm kuv. Kuv tsi tau cheem cov tuabneeg kws thuam kuv, kuv tig xubndlag rua puab thaus puab rhu kuv cov fwjtxwv, hab ntu quavncaug rua kuv lub ntsejmuag.
Tabsis tej lug kws puab thuam tsi mob kuv le, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv paab kuv lawm. Kuv ua sab ntev rua puab. Kuv paub has tas, kuv yeej tsi raug kev txaajmuag ib zag le,

rua qhov Vaajtswv nyob ze kuv, hab nwg paub has tas kuv yog tuabneeg tsi muaj txim. Leejtwg xaav ua plaub rua kuv, wb ca le ua ke moog rua huv tsev tu plaub. leejtwg xaav ua yeebncuab rua kuv, nwg sim txaav lug ze kuv saib.
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv yeej paab kuv; leejtwg txhaj yuav has tau tas kuv ua txhum? Puab yuav pluj taag ib yaam le tej rig tsho kws ntsaum kaabrwg noj lawm.

Mej cov ntawm ko puas muaj leejtwg fwm Vaajtswv hab noog tej lug kws nwg tug tubkhai qha? Txawm yog nwg taug txujkev kws tsaus ntuj nti los nwg ca sab rua tug TSWV lub npe, hab tso sab plhuav rua nwg tug Vaajtswv.
Mej txhua tug kws tuav tswvyim txuv lwm tug, mej tej tswvyim ntawd yuav rov lug txuv mej. Tug TSWV yuav ua kuas tej ntawd lug raug mej ntaag. Mej yuav raug kev tsimtxom hab txomnyem kawg le.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej cov kws nrhav txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab nrhav tug TSWV, mej ca le noog kuv has. Ca le saib lub pobzeb kws mej muab txaug hab qhov chaw kws mej khawb pobzeb.

Ca le saib mej yawmkoob Anplahaas hab mej pujkoob Xalas, tug kws yug mej cov kws ua xeebntxwv; thaus kuv hu Anplahaas, nwg tsi muaj ib tug mivnyuas le, tabsis kuv foom koob moov rua nwg hab pub rua nwg muaj mivnyuas; kuv pub rua nwg muaj xeebntxwv coob suav tsi txheeb le.

“Tug TSWV yuav nplig cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab cov tuabneeg nyob huv lub nroog kws raug puamtsuaj taag lawm sab, hab yuav muab lub nroog Yeluxalees tej nraag mojsaab ua kuas zoo le lub Vaaj Edees. Yeluxalees tej taj suabpuam yuav zoo le tug TSWV lub vaaj; yuav muaj kev zoo sab hab kev kaaj sab nyob huv Yeluxalees, yuav muaj lub suab hu nkauj qhuas kuv hab ua kuv tsaug.
“Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le noog kuv has, hab mej ca le tig qhovntsej noog kuv tej lug; kuv txuj kevcai hab txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav ua lub teeb ci rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg pum kev.

Kuv yuav lug cawm puab sai sai ntaag; kuv txujkev cawm dlim tub lug lawm, hab kuv txhais npaab yuav kaav txhua tsaav tuabneeg. Cov tebchaws kws nyob dleb tog rawv kuv; hab ca sab ntsoov rua kuv txhais npaab kws yuav cawm puab dlim.

Mej ca le tsaa qhovmuag saib sau nruab ntug; hab saib rua huv nplajteb; vim lub ntuj yuav yaaj ntshis ib yaam le tej paa tawg; lub nplajteb yuav ndluag taag le tej qub rig tsho, hab tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb yuav tuag taag ib yaam le tej yoov. Tabsis kuv txujkev cawm dlim yuav nyob moog ibtxhis; hab kuv txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav nyob moog tsi paub kawg le.
“Mej cov kws paub txujkev ncaaj nceeg mej ca le noog kuv has, cov tuabneeg kws khaws kuv txuj kevcai rua nruab sab, mej tsi xob ntshai thaus tuabneeg thuam hab saib tsi taug mej;

vim ntsaum kaabrwg yuav noj puab ib yaam le noj tej qub rig tsho, hab kaas yuav noj puab ib yaam le noj tej tawv yaaj; tabsis kuv txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav muaj nyob moog ibtxhis, hab kuv txujkev cawm dlim yuav muaj rua txhua tam tuabneeg.”
Tug TSWV, sawv lug paab peb lauj! Siv koj lub fwjchim cawm peb, ib yaam le koj tau ua lug lawm. Tsi yog koj tub muab Lahaj txav ua tej thooj, hab muab tug zaaj huv havtxwv tsuav tu taag lawm los?
Tub yog koj ua rua dlej havtxwv nqhuab, hab ua kev qhuav qhawv huv dlej moog rua saab tim u, kuas cov tuabneeg kws koj tub cawm dlim lawm hlaa dlhau dlej rua saab tid.

Cov tuabneeg kws koj tub cawm dlim lawm, yuav rov qaab lug, hab hu nkauj zoo sab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees; puab yuav muaj kev zoo sab hab kaaj sab lug moog ibtxhis; kev txomnyem quaj ntsuag hab kev tu sab yuav tsi raug puab lawm.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yog tug txhawb mej tug zug. Vim le caag mej yuav ntshai cov tuabneeg kws txawj tuag kws tub tsi muaj sa nyob ntev npaum le tej nyom?

Mej tsi ncu qaab tug TSWV kws tsim mej, tug kws nthuav lub ntuj hab pua lub nplajteb lawm los? Vim le caag mej ua neej nyob naj nub ntshai cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom mej hab xaav kuas mej puamtsuaj? Puab tej kev nruj tsiv yeej ua tsi tau le caag rua mej.
Tshuav tsi ntev kuv yuav tso cov tuabneeg raug txim dlim lug; puab yuav tsi tuag hab tsi tau moog rua huv lub qhov ntxaa, hab puab yuav tsi tu ncua zaub mov noj le lawm.
“Kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, kuv yog tug dlu havtxwv kuas ndlaas nphau tej nam twv hab nrov nroo ntwg. Kuv lub npe hu ua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus!

Kuv muab kuv tej lug qha cob rua mej hab kuv txhais teg tiv thaiv mej, kuv nthuav  lub ntuj hab pua lub nplajteb, kuv has rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tas, ‘Mej yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg.’ ”
Yeluxalees, sawv los mas! Koj ca le sawv tseeg lug! Koj tub haus tug TSWV lub khob kws yog txujkev txav txim lawm. Lub khob ntawd yog nwg txujkev chim kws ua rua koj qaug puj poog.
Cov mivnyuas kws koj yug tsi muaj ib tug coj koj kev; cov mivnyuas kws koj tu hlub, tsi muaj ib tug lug tuav koj teg.

Yuav muaj ob yaam kev puamtsuaj lug raug koj; koj lub tebchaws yuav raug kev tsuv kev rog kuas pemsij taag. Koj tsaav tuabneeg yuav tuag taag rua kev tshaib kev nqhes, hab nav ntaaj nav rag. Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj nplig koj sab le.
Koj cov mivnyuas yuav tsaug muas, puab pw pawg lug ntawm tej kev, puab zoo ib yaam le tug kauv kws maag tug tuabneeg cuab tsaj lub vaag; puab raug mej tug Vaajtswv txujkev chim hab nwg tej lug tshev.
Mej cov tuabneeg kws raug kev txomnyem huv nroog Yeluxalees, mej qaug puj poog cuag qaug cawv, tabsis tsi yog haus cawv ntxws.

Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, tug kws tuaj nwg tsaav tuabneeg tog has tas, “Saib lauj! Kuv muab lub khob kws yog txujkev chim tshem tawm ntawm mej moog lawm; lub taig kws yog kuv txujkev chim, mej tsi tau haus ntxiv lawm.
Kuv yuav muab lub khob ntawd rua tug tuabneeg kws tsimtxom mej kws has rua mej tas, ‘Mej ca le pw huv aav ua kev rua peb moog; hab muab mej lub nrausqaum ua kev rua peb taug.’ ”

Yeluxalees, sawv los mas, ca le sawv, cuab koj tug zug khov kho! Vaajtswv lub nroog kws dlawbhuv, ca le naav tej rig tsho kws zoo tshaaj plawg! Cov tuabneeg kws tsi ua kevcai txav tawv hab cov tuabneeg tsi huv, yuav tsi tuaj rua huv koj ntxiv lawm.
Yeluxalees, nchus koj tej moov aav! Sawv moog nyob sau lub zwmtxwv. Xi-oos tug ntxhais, dlaws txuj saw hlau kws khi koj cejdlaab kuas nplaam.

Tug TSWV kws kaav txhua tsaav yaam has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg tas, “Thaus mej moog ua luas qhev, luas tub tsi muab nyaj yuav mej; ib yaam le ntawd tsi taag yuav muab nyaj txhwv mej rov qaab lug le hab.”

Vim tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv has tas, “Thawj zag kws kuv tsaav tuabneeg nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, tsi muaj leejtwg yuam kuas puab moog, tabsis tom qaab ntawd cov Axilias tau tuaj yuam puab moog hab tsi them ib yaam dlaabtsi le.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Nwgnuav tej xwm kws zoo le nuav tub muaj nyob huv lub nroog Npanpiloos lawm hab. Mej raug puab nteg moog ua qhev, puab tub tsi them nqe yuav mej. Cov tuabneeg kws kaav mej, puab muab hlub, khaavtheeb hab saib tsi taug kuv le.
Muaj ib nub twg mej yuav leeg paub has tas, kuv yog Vaajtswv, hab thaus ntawd mej yuav paub has tas, kuv tub has tej lug nuav rua mej lawm.”

Thaus mej pum tug tuabneeg hlaa toj roob hauv peg xaa xuv zoo tuaj, mas mej zoo sab kawg le, puab tuaj qha txujkev thaajyeeb kws yog txujmoo zoo! Nwg tshaajtawm txujkev cawm dlim; nwg has rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, “Mej tug Vaajtswv yog vaajntxwv!”
Cov tuabneeg kws zuv lub nroog qw zum zawg zoo sab heev, vim puab qhovmuag pum ntsoov tug TSWV rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm.
Lub nroog Yeluxalees kws tawg taag lawm, ca le hu nkauj zoo sab luag ntxhi! Tug TSWV yuav cawm nwg lub nroog Yeluxalees hab nplig nwg tsaav tuabneeg sab.
Ib tsoom tuabneeg thoob nplajteb yuav pum tug TSWV siv nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg.

Ca le tawm huv lub nroog Npanpiloos nuav moog kuas taag! Tsi xob kov tej yaam kws tsi huv hlo le; mej cov kws nqaa tug TSWV tej cuabyeej siv huv lub Tuamtsev, ca le tawm huv lub nroog moog hab ua kevcai ntxuav kuas mej huv.
Zag nuav tsi taag mej yuav maaj tawm, rua qhov tsi yog mej nyag kev tsiv, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav coj mej txuj hauv kev; hab cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv yuav thaiv tom mej qaab.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv tug tubkhai yuav ua nwg teg num kuas tav; nwg yuav tau ntsejmuag hab suavdlawg yuav txhawb nqaa nwg. Yuav tsaa nwg ua tug luj tshaaj plawg.
Thaus puab pum dlheev nwg, muaj coob leej yuav ntshai hab yoob taag; nwg lub ntsejmuag hab nwg lub cev txawv heev, zoo tsi thooj le tuabneeg lub.
Nwgnuav nwg yuav ua rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg xaav tsi thoob, hab tej vaajntxwv yuav yoob taag has tsi taug ib lu lug le. Tej kws puab tsi tau paub hab tsi tau pum dlua, puab yuav pum hab totaub.”
Leejtwg yuav ntseeg tej kws peb has? “Leejtwg yuav pum has tas tej nuav yog tug TSWV txhais teg ua?

Tub yog tug TSWV pum zoo kuas nwg tug tubkhai luj hlub ib yaam le tsob ntoo kws nrhau caag tuaj ntawm thaaj aav qhuav. Nwg lub cev ntaaj ntsug tsi zoo nraug peb txhaj tsi nyam nwg; nwg tsi muaj ib qho zoo txaus nyam, peb txhaj tsi ntshaw nwg.
Peb saib tsi taug nwg hab muab nwg tso povtseg, nwg raug kev txomnyem hab nyaj rawv txujkev mob, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav tig saib nwg. Peb tsi quavntsej nwg ib yaam le nwg tsi tsimtxaj dlaabtsi.
“Tabsis nwg ris peb tej kev txomnyem hab ris peb tej kev mob kev nkeeg, txawm yog nwg paab peb npaum le ntawd los peb tseem has tas qhov kws nwg raug kev txomnyem tub yog Vaajtswv rau txim rua nwg.

Tub yog vim peb tej kev txhum, nwg txhaj raug nqaj ndluag ntshaav nrug, tub yog vim tej kev phem kws peb ua, nwg txhaj raug nplawm. Qhov kws nwg raug txim txomnyem ntsuav, yog paab kuas peb tau nyob kaaj sab lug, nwg raug nplawm tub yog khu kuas peb tej kev mob kev nkeeg zoo.
Peb txhua tug zoo le tej yaaj kws yuam kev lawm; peb suavdlawg nyag moog nyag ib txujkev lawv le nyag lub sab nyam, tabsis tug TSWV muab peb lub txim kws tsimnyog peb raug tso rua nwg ris.

“Nwg raug tsimtxom, hab nwg ntxhuv sab kawg; tabsis nwg muaj lub sab mog muas, nwg tsi has ib lus le. Nwg zoo ib yaam le tug yaaj kws luas caab moog tua, hab zoo ib yaam le tug yaaj kws luas taabtom muab txav plaub los nwg tub tsi quaj ib suab le.
Nwg raug nteg, raug tsimtxom hab raug coj moog tua povtseg los tsi muaj leejtwg quavntsej nwg le. Tub yog vim peb suavdlawg lub txim, nwg txhaj raug tua tuag.

Txawm yog nwg yeej tsi tau ua ib qhov txhum, hab nwg lub qhovncauj yeej tsi tau has ib lu lug dlaag le los puab ca le muab nwg coj moog log nrug cov tuabneeg txhum, hab log rua huv tug txivneej kws npluanuj lub qhov ntxaa.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yeej pum zoo ca nwg raug kev txomnyem, Nwg tuag txhaj theej tau tuabneeg lub txhoj, hab zaam tau tuabneeg lub txim. Yog le ntawd, nwg yuav pum nwg tej xeebntxwv; nwg yuav muaj sa nyob ntev hab nwg yuav ua kuas kuv teg num tav.

Tom qaab kws nwg raug kev txomnyem dlhau lawm, nwg yuav rov muaj kev zoo sab dlua ntxiv; nwg yuav paub has tas txujkev txomnyem kws nwg raug ntawd tsi nkim nwg tug zug. Kuv tug tubkhai ncaaj nceeg kws kuv txaus sab yuav ris coob leej ntau tug lub txim, vim tej kws nwg ua ntawd, kuv txhaj zaam puab lub txim.

Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav pub koob meej rua nwg, nwg yuav tau nrug cov tuabneeg kws ua tug luj hab muaj fwjchim nyob; nwg txaus sab tso nwg txujsa tseg, nwg lug nrug cov tuabneeg txhum nyob. Nwg ris suavdlawg lub txim; hab thov tug TSWV zaam puab lub txim.”

Yeluxalees, koj zoo le tug quaspuj kws muaj tsi taug mivnyuas, tabsis nwgnuav koj yuav tau hu nkauj zoo sab! Nwgnuav koj yuav muaj mivnyuas coob tshaaj tug quaspuj kws nwg tug quasyawg nrug nraim nwg nyob.
Ca le nqug koj lub tsevntaub kuas dlaav ntxiv, txuas tej hlua tsevntaub kuas ntev, hab txhus tej tswg kuas khov!

Koj yuav txaav koj nrim dlej nrim aav kuas dlaav moog ntxiv, koj tej pejxeem yuav rov lug nyob huv puab tej qub teb qub chaw kws nwgnuav lwm tsaav tuabneeg kaav lawm. Tej nroog kws nwgnuav caj suabpuam taag lawm yuav rov muaj tuabneeg nyob puv nkaus.

Koj tsi xob ntshai, koj yuav tsi raug kev txaajmuag lawm, koj yuav tsi swb leejtwg le. Koj yuav tsi ncu txug tej kev pleeg kev yi kws koj tau ua thaus koj tseem hluas, hab tsi ncu txug tej kev nyuaj sab kws thaus koj ua puj ntsuag lawm.

Tug kws tsim koj yuav zoo le koj tug quasyawg, nwg lub npe yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus. Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv kws paab kuas koj dlim yog tug kaav taagnrho lub nplajteb nuav huv tuabsi.
Yixalayees, koj zoo nkaus le tug quaspuj hluas kws tug quasyawg muab tso tseg ua rua koj nyuaj sab kawg le. Tabsis tug TSWV hu koj rov lug cuag nwg hab has rua koj tas:
“Kuv tso koj tseg ib nyuas ntu xwb, vim kuv hlub koj heev, kuv yuav coj koj rov lug.
Vim kuv chim heev, kuv txhaj fee plhu rua koj ib ntus, tabsis kuv yuav rov hlub koj moog ibtxhis.” Tug TSWV kws paab koj dlim, yog tug has tej lug nuav.

“Thaus Nau-es tam kuv tau coglug tseg ca yuav tsi pub dlej nyaab lub nplajteb ib zag ntxiv lawm. Nwgnuav kuv coglug yuav tsi chim rua koj ib zag ntxiv le lawm hab; kuv yuav tsi tshev lossis rau txim rua koj le.

Tej zag cov hauv roob hab cov pov roob yuav tawg moog, tabsis kuv txujkev kws hlub koj yuav tsi paub kawg le. Kuv coglug tseg has tas yuav muaj kev thaajyeeb, mas kuv yuav ua lawv le kuv tej lug ntawd moog ibtxhis; tug TSWV kws hlub koj yog tug kws has tej lug nuav.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Yeluxalees, koj yog lub nroog kws raug kev txomnyem lwj sab, tsi muaj leejtwg paab hab tsi muaj leejtwg nplig koj sab le, kuv yuav muab tej pobzeb muaj nqes lug pua koj.
Kuv yuav muab tej hlaws lunpis puab ua koj tej chaw tsomfaaj, muab tej pobzeb kws ci le nplaim tawg lug ua koj tej roojvaag, hab muab tej hlaws muaj nqes ua tug ntsaa yeej thaiv puagncig koj.
“Kuv yuav qha koj tsaav tuabneeg hab yuav pub kev vaammeej hab kev thaajyeeb rua puab.
Txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav ua rua koj nyob ruaj khov kho, koj yuav tsi raug luas tsimtxom hab yuav tsi muaj kev txhawj kev ntshai.
Yog leejtwg tawmtsaam koj los tsi yog kuv tso ncauj, yog leejtwg ntaus koj, tug ntawm yuav swb koj.
“Kuv yog tug tsim tug kws ntaus hlau, nwg txhaj teeb lwjhlaus ntaus cuabyeej ua rog. Tub yog kuv tsim tug tubrog, nwg txhaj coj tej cuabyeej moog ua rog.

Tsi muaj ib yaam cuabyeej twg kws yuav tawmtsaam tau koj le, koj yuav muaj lug teb cov tuabneeg kws kom koj. Kuv yuav tiv thaiv kuv cov tubkhai hab paab kuas puab yeej.” Tug TSWV yog tug kws has tej lug nuav.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Leejtwg nqhes dlej, ca le lug haus, muaj dlej nyob ntawm nuav! Leejtwg tsi muaj nyaj, ca le lug yuav dlawb hab noj dlawb! Ca le lug yuav cawv txiv maab hab mig nyuj; tsi taag them nyaj le.

Vim le caag mej siv mej tej nyaj moog yuav tej kws tsi yog mov? Vim le caag mej siv mej tej nqe zug moog yuav tej kws tsi txaus mej sab? Ca le noog kuv has, mej txhaj tau noj tej zaub mov kws zoo, mej lub sab txhaj tsau npo rua tej zaub mov kws zoo tshaaj plawg.

“Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, nwgnuav mej ca le noog hab lug cuag kuv, mej txhaj yuav muaj sa nyob; kuv coglug ruaj khov rua mej moog ibtxhis! Hab kuv yuav muab tej koob moov kws kuv tub coglug rua Daviv lawm pub rua mej.
Kuv tsaa Daviv ua ib tug thawjcoj hab kaav txhua tsaav tuabneeg, hab kuv yuav qha kuv lub fwjchim ntawm nwg moog rua puab.

Nwgnuav mej yuav nqua hu ib tsoom tebchaws tuaj; puab yeej ibtxwm tsi tau paub mej le, tabsis nwgnuav puab yuav lug poog mej. Kuv kws yog tug TSWV mej tug Vaajtswv kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv, kuv yuav ua kuas tej nuav tshwm tuaj; mas kuv yuav ua kuas mej tau koob meej hab fwjchim.”
Ca le nrhav tug TSWV thaus kws tseem yuav ntsib tau nwg, ca le thov nwg paab thaus nwg tseem nyob ze mej.

Ca cov tuabneeg sab phem tso puab tej kev phem tseg, hab ca cov tuabneeg tsi ncaaj tso puab tej kev xaav phem tseg. Ca puab tig lug cuag tug TSWV, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav hlub puab. Lug cuag peb tug Vaajtswv, nwg txhaj yuav zaam puab lub txim.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tej kws kuv xaav zoo tsi thooj le tej kws mej xaav,” hab tej kws kuv ua zoo tsi thooj le tej kws mej ua.
Lub ntuj nyob sab tshaaj lub nplajteb nuav le caag, tej kws kuv ua hab kuv xaav nyob sab tshaaj tej kws mej ua hab mej xaav npaum le ntawd.
“Dlaus hab naag lug sau nruab ntug lug, tsi rov qaab rua sau lawm, yog lug ywg lub nplajteb kuas qoobloo luj hlub tawg paaj txi txiv, txhaj muaj noob tseb hab kuas muaj mov rua tuabneeg noj.

Tej lug kws kuv has moog lawm zoo ib yaam le ntawd ntaag: tej lug ntawd yuav tsi rov qaab lug cuag kuv dlawb dlo ib zag le; tabsis yuav tawg paaj txi txiv lawv le kuv xaav tseg lawm. Kuv tej lug yuav ua txhua yaam kws kuv tso nwg moog ua.

“Mej yuav tawm huv lub nroog Npanpiloos moog zoo sab hlo, luas yuav coj mej tawm kaaj sab lug huv lub nroog ntawd moog. Tej roob hab tej pov roob yuav tsaa suab hu nkauj, hab tej xyoob tej ntoo yuav qw zoo sab.

Ntoo cab yuav luj hlub tuaj hloov ntoo xuavpaug chaw, hab ntoo tsw qaab yuav tuaj huv haav xuavpaug. Tej nuav yuav ua rua suavdlawg ncu ntsoov, hab ua lub cim ncu txug kuv kws yog tug TSWV tug kws tau ua tej nuav moog ibtxhis le.”
Vaajtswv has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg has tas, “Ca le coj ncaaj hab ua qhov tseeb, tshuav tsi ntev lawm kuv yuav lug cawm mej.
Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua cov kws coj hab fwm nub Xanpataus. Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua txhua tug kws tsi ua kev phem kev qas.”

Tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws koom tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg tsi xob has tas, “Tug TSWV yuav tsi kaam kuv nrug nwg tsaav tuabneeg pehawm Vaajtswv.” Tug tuabneeg saam tsi xob has has tas, “Kuv tsuas zoo le tug ntoo qhuav lawm xwb.”
Tug TSWV has rua tug tuabneeg saam tas, “Yog koj fwm kuv nub Xanpataus, ua hum kuv sab hab ua ncaaj lawv le kuv txuj kevcai,
mas kuv yuav pub koj muaj npe nyob rua huv kuv lub Tuamtsev hab ntawm kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Qhov kws koj lub npe yuav tsi raug rhu tawm moog ibtxhis, yuav zoo dlua koj muaj tub hab muaj ntxhais coob.”
Hab tug TSWV has rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws lug zwm ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws hlub nwg hab tu nwg, fwm nwg nub Xanpataus hab coj lawv le nwg txujlug cog tseg has tas,

“Kuv yuav coj puab moog nyob huv Xi-oos kws yog kuv lub roob dlawbhuv,  kuas puab muaj kev zoo sab nyob huv kuv lub tsev kws yog qhov chaw pehawm kuv, kuv yuav txais puab tej khoom kws muab fij rua sau lub thaaj. Kuv lub Tuamtsev yuav hu ua txhua tsaav tuabneeg qhov chaw thov Vaajtswv.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav txhua tsaav yaam tau coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kws raug luas nteg moog lawm rov qaab lug, hab coglug has tas nwg tseem yuav coj lwm tsaav tuabneeg lug koom nrug puab hab.
Tug TSWV has rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kuas puab lug ib yaam le tej tsaj qus lug noj nwg tsaav tuabneeg.

Nwg has tas, “Taagnrho cov thawjcoj kws tsimnyog ceebtoom rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, tej qhovmuag dlig lawm! Puab tsi paub ib yaam dlaabtsi le. Puab zoo le cov dlev zuv qhovrooj kws tsi txawj tsej, puab tsuas pw ntxeev luj luam hab ua npau suav nkaus xwb. Yog le caag puab yuav nyam tsaug zug ua luaj!

Cov dlev ntawd noj ntau npaum le caag los tsi paub tsau le. Cov tub yug yaaj nuav tsi totaub ib yaam dlaabtsi le; puab nyag taug nyag tig xubndlag moog rua nyag txujkev, hab puab nyag tsuas xaav kuas nyag tau ntau xwb tsi pub rua leejtwg le.
Cov tuabneeg quav cawv has tas, ‘Ca le muab cawv lug hab haus kuas ntau npaum le peb haus tau! Pigkig peb tseem yuav haus ntau tshaaj nub nua hab.’ ”
Cov tuabneeg zoo tuag, tsi muaj leejtwg quavntsej lossis mob sab puab le. Tabsis thaus puab tuag, puab dlim kev nyuaj sab lawm.
Cov tuabneeg kws ua lub neej ncaaj nceeg tau moog su ntawm qhov chaw tau zoo hab kaaj sab lug lawm.
Cov tuabneeg txawj ua khawvkoob tej mivnyuas, cov tuabneeg ua kev nkauj kev nraug hab cov namndlav kws yog tuabneeg txhum, mej ca le lug ntawm nuav, kuv yuav txav txim rua mej!
Mej luag leejtwg plig? Mej rua ncauj hab hlauv nplaig rua leejtwg? Mej tsi yog roj ntshaa lug ntawm cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab, hab caajceg ntawm cov tuabneeg dlaag los?

Mej moog pe mlom hab pheej moog sis ntxag huv tej qaab ntoo qheb hab txhua tsob ntoo kws muaj nplooj ntxoov nyog. Mej muab mej tej mivnyuas moog tua fij rua huv tej qhov tsua kws nyob ze ntawm tej paag dlej txhawv.
Mej muab tej pobzeb kws dlu ndlaug leeg huv tej qhov ntawd lug ua mlom rua mej pe. Mej laub cawv hab coj qoobloo moog fij rua tej pobzeb ntawd. Mej xaav has tas kuv txaus sab rua tej ntawd nua los?
Mej nce moog fij khoom rua sau tej roob sab hab moog sis ntxag.

Mej muab mej tej mlom moog teeb rua ntawm mej tej paws rooj. Mej tso kuv tseg; mej cem choj hab nce lug nrug tug kws mej hlub pw sau lub txaaj kws dlaav heev, mej them nyaj rua puab nrug mej pw. Hab mej yeej ua kuas txaus nkaus mej sab.
Mej muab tshuaj tsw qaab pleev kuas mej tsw qaab ntxag moog pe tug vaajtswv Maulej. Mej khaiv mej tej numtswv moog dleb heev, txawm yog huv tubtuag teb los puab moog txug huv tuabsi.

Mej qaug zug zig vim mej taug kev dleb heev, tabsis mej tsi tau has tas, “Taag kev ca sab lawm;” vim mej xaav has tas cov vaajtswv ntawd yuav txhawb mej tug zug, yog le ntawd mej txhaj tsi txawj nkeeg hlo le.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov vaajtswv twg tau ua rua mej ntshai, kuas mej dlaag kuv hab mej tsi ncu qaab txug kuv lawm? Vim kuv nyob ntsag tu tau ntev lug lawm, mej txhaj tso kuv tseg hab tsi fwm kuv puas yog?
Kuv yuav nthuav tej kev ncaaj nceeg kws mej khaav hab tej num kws mej ua tawm, tabsis tej ntawd yuav tsi paab mej le.

Thaus mej quaj thov paab, ca mej cov mlom lug cawm mej. Khaub zeeg cua yuav nqaa cov mlom ntawd moog povtseg! Tabsis cov kws ca sab rua kuv yuav tau nyob huv kuv lub tebchaws hab pehawm kuv huv kuv lub Tuamtsev.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Ca kuv tsaav tuabneeg rov qaab lug cuag kuv. Tshem tej tog khaub ntawm kuv tsaav tuabneeg txujkev moog povtseg! Ca le khu txujkev kuas zoo hab tav log!

“Kuv yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus hab yog tug dlawbhuv kws nyob moog ibtxhis. Kuv nyob sau qhov chaw sab hab dlawbhuv, hab kuv nrug cov tuabneeg kws txu fwjchim hab leeg kev txhum nyob. Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj txhawb cov tuabneeg kws txu fwjchim hab leeg kev txhum kuas puab muaj kev ca sab.
Kuv yuav pub txujsa rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, hab kuv yuav tsi suav txim lossis tsi chim rua puab moog ibtxhis le lawm.

Kuv chim rua puab, vim puab tej kev txhum hab ua sab hlub, yog le ntawd kuv txhaj rau txim rua puab hab muab puab tso tseg. Txawm le ntawd los puab tseem ua sab tawv hab pheej ua lawv le puab lub sab nyam xwb.
“Kuv paub puab teg num lawm, tabsis kuv yuav khu kuas puab zoo mob. Kuv yuav coj puab, paab puab hab kuv yuav nplig cov kws muaj kev txomnyem sab.
Kuv yuav pub kev thaajyeeb rua txhua tug, tsi has cov kws nyob dleb lossis nyob ze! Kuv yuav khu kuv tsaav tuabneeg kuas zoo mob.
Tabsis tug tuabneeg kws ua phem ua qas, zoo le dlej havtxwv ndlaas moog ndlaas lug tsi paub tug le, hab ua rua tej yaam qas tawm tuaj.
Cov tuabneeg ua txhum tsi muaj kev kaaj sab le.” Tug TSWV yog tug has tej lug nuav.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Ca le qw kuas kawg koj tug zug! Hab qha rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kuas puab paub txug puab tej kev txhum!
Puab pehawm kuv txhua nub, puab ua txuj kub sab lug xaav paub kuv txujkev hab ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai. Puab thov kuas kuv muab txujkev ncaaj nceeg rua puab, puab txhaj txaus sab pehawm kuv.”

Cov pejxeem nug has tas, “Yog tug TSWV tsi pum, vim le caag peb tsua ua kevcai yoo mov? Yog nwg tsi quavntsej, vim le caag yuav ca peb yoo tshaib tsi noj dlaabtsi?” Tug TSWV teb puab has tas, “Yeej muaj tseeb, rua qhov nub kws mej ua kevcai yoo mov, mej tsuas ua kuas mej tau ntsejmuag hab mej tsimtxom cov tuabneeg kws ua num rua mej xwb.
Qhov tseeb, mej ua kevcai yoo mov yog ua kuas mej tau ua kev phem hab kuas tau kev sis tshe sis ntaus xwb. Mej xaav has tas mej ua le ntawd, kuv yuav noog mej tej lug thov nua los?

Thaus mej ua kevcai yoo mov tsimtxom mej, mej nyo taubhau ib yaam le dlaim nplooj, muab ntaub tsaaj hab muab tshauv pua mej pw. Ua le ntawd mej hu ua kevcai yoo mov hab xaav has tas kuv yuav txaus sab rua tej ntawd nua los?

“Txuj kevcai yoo mov kws kuv txaus sab yog le nuav: yuavtsum tshem tej kev tsimtxom kws zoo le txuj saw hlau, txu txujkev tsi ncaaj kws zoo le tug quabtwg, hab tso cov tuabneeg kws raug tsimtxom tawm moog.

Faib mej tej zaub mov rua cov tuabneeg tshaib plaab noj hab qheb qhovrooj rua cov tuabneeg pluag kws tsi muaj tsev nyob. Pub rig tsho rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem tau naav, hab yuavtsum paab mej tej kwvtij.

“Ces kuv txujkev kaaj yuav ci rua mej ib yaam le lub nub ci thaus sawv ntxuv, hab mej tej qhov txhaab yuav zoo sai. Kuv yuav nrug nraim mej nyob ua mej tug Cawmseej hab kuv lub fwjchim yuav tsomkwm puagncig mej.

Ces thaus mej thov, tug TSWV yuav teb mej; thaus mej hu kuas nwg paab, nwg yuav teb has tas, ‘Kuv nyob ntawm nuav.’ “Yog mej tso txujkev tsimtxom kws zoo le tug quabtwg, tug cwjpwm kws taw teg nki rua luas, hab tej lug phem lug qas tseg;

yog mej pub zaub mov rua cov tuabneeg tshaib plaab noj, hab paab cov tuabneeg txomnyem. Ces tej kev tsaus ntuj kws nyob puagncig mej yuav hloov ua lub teeb ci rua mej pum kev ib yaam le thaus taav su.

Kuv yuav ua tug coj mej kev moog ibtxhis, hab pub txhua yaam zoo rua mej kuas txaus mej sab. Kuv yuav pub mej muaj zug hab noj qaab nyob zoo. Mej yuav zoo ib yaam le lub vaaj kws muaj dlej ywg tsi tseg, hab ib yaam le tug dlej kws ndlwg tsi paub nqhuab le.

Mej tsaav tuabneeg yuav rov txhim khu tej vaaj tse kws thaus u tub puamtsuaj taag lawm, hab yuav rov ua vaaj ua tsev rua tej qub chaw. Luas yuav hu mej has tas, yog cov tuabneeg kws txhim khu ntsaa yeej dlua tshab, hab yog cov khu tej vaaj tse kws tub puamtsuaj taag lawm.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Yog mej ceev nub Xanpataus ua nub dlawbhuv hab nub ntawd mej tsi ua tej yaam lawv le mej lub sab nyam; hab yog mej fwm kuv nub kws dlawbhuv tsi xob taug kev, tsi xob ua num, hab tsi xob has lug phem,

ces mej txhaj yuav tau kev kaaj sab, vim mej noog kuv lug. Kuv yuav kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv qaab ntuj nuav fwm mej. Mej yuav zoo sab heev rua lub tebchaws kws kuv muab pub rua mej yawmkoob Yakhauj lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has tej lug nuav.”
Tsi xob xaav has tas tug TSWV txhais npaab tuab lu txhaj paab tsi tau mej dlim lossis nwg laag ntseg lawm, nwg txhaj tsi nov mej tej lug thov!
Tub yog vim mej tej kev txhum, nwg txhaj tsi nov mej tej lug thov. Thaus mej pehawm Vaajtswv, mej tej kev txhum quas mej hab Vaajtswv lawm.
Mej muaj txim, vim mej has lug dlaag, mej ua limham hab tua tuabneeg.
Mej moog kom luas rua huv tsev tu plaub, tabsis mej tsi ua ncaaj, mej has lug dlaag kuas mej kovyeej luas. Mej tuav tswvyim phem ua kuas luas lwm tug swb.
Mej lub tswvyim phem zoo le tug naab muaj taug cov qai, yog muab lub qai ntawd tsoo, ces naab yeej tawm huv lug.
Tabsis mej tej tswvyim ntawd tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi, tsuas zoo le muab kaab laug tsuv tej saab lug ntus ua ntaub xwb.
Mej naj nub tuav tswvyim ua phem, hab nyag kev ntshis moog ua txhum. Mej lub sab xaav ntsoov qhov phem xwb, mej moog txug qhov twg muaj kev puamtsuaj txug qhov ntawd.

Mej moog txug qhov twg, cov tuabneeg kws nyob qhov ntawd tsi muaj kev kaaj sab le. Tej kws mej ua puavleej tsi ncaaj hab mej taug txujkev nkhaus xwb. Txhua tug kws taug txujkev nkhaus yuav raug puamtsuaj.
Cov pejxeem has tas, “Nwgnuav peb paub has tas, vim le caag Vaajtswv tsi paab peb dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom peb. Peb nrhav txujkev kaaj taug, tabsis tsuas tau txujkev tsaus xwb,
hab peb maub moog kev ib yaam le tej tuabneeg dligmuag. Txawm yog taav su nrig los peb dlawm qaug puj poog ib yaam le maub mo ntuj, hab ib yaam le peb nyob huv tubtuag teb kws tsaus ntuj nti.
Peb ntshai hab poob sab heev. Peb tog ntsoov Vaajtswv lug paab kuas peb dlim ntawm txujkev tsimtxom hab ua tsi ncaaj, tabsis nwg tsi lug paab.
“Tug TSWV, peb tau ua txhum ntau kawg rua koj lawm. Peb tej kev txhum kom peb rua koj. Nwgnuav peb pum peb tej kev txhum lawm:
Peb tau ntxeev sab rua koj, tso koj tseg, hab tsi ua lawv le koj txuj kevcai. Peb tsimtxom luas hab tso koj tseg. Tej kws peb xaav los yeej tsi tseeb hab tej lug kws peb has yog lug dlaag xwb.
Peb muab txujkev ncaaj nceeg ntab tawm, hab txujkev ua zoo nyob nrug dleb peb. Peb dlawm txujkev tseeb qaug rua huv plawv nroog, hab ua sab dlawb sab zoo tsi tau chaw nyob.

Nyob huv peb cov Yixalayees, kev ncaaj nceeg muaj tsawg kawg le. Yog leejtwg tso kev phem tseg mas nwg tseem raug luas tsimtxom hab.” Tug TSWV pum tej nuav, nwg txhaj tsi txaus sab, vim tsi muaj tuabneeg ua ncaaj lawm.

Tug TSWV xaav tsi thoob, ua le caag tsi pum muaj leejtwg paab cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tsimtxom. Yog le ntawd nwg txhaj yuav siv nwg lub fwjchim paab kuas puab dlim, hab nwg yuav kovyeej tej tuabneeg phem ntawd.
Nwg yuav muab kev ncaaj nceeg lug ua lub tsho hlau naav hab muab txujkev cawm dlim lug ua lub mom hlau ntoo. Nwg muab kev pauj lug ua lub tsho ntev naav, hab muab kev sab kub lug qhwv nwg lub cev.
Tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua nwg cov yeebncuab lawv le tej kws puab tau ua lug lawm, txawm yog cov tuabneeg kws nyob tej tebchaws dleb los tug TSWV yuav rau txim huv tuabsi.
Txhua tug kws nyob saab nubtuaj moog ti saab nubpoob yuav ntshai nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus. Nwg yuav lug ib yaam le dlej fuam, hab ib yaam le cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj.
Tug TSWV has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg has tas, “Kuv yuav lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, cawm mej hab thaiv mej txhua tug kws tso kev txhum tseg lawm.

Hab kuv yuav coglug rua mej le nuav: kuv muab kuv lub fwjchim hab kuv tej lug qha cob rua mej moog ibtxhis, hab txij nub nua moog mej yuavtsum fwm kuv, qha mej cov mivnyuas hab mej tej xeebntxwv kuas txawj fwm kuv moog ibtxhis.”
Lub nroog Yeluxalees, ca le sawv, vim qhov kaaj tub lug rua koj, hab tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab lug rua sau koj lawm.

Kev tsaus ntuj roog taagnrho lub nplajteb, hab kev tsaus ntuj dlub ncab npug txhua tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis tug TSWV yuav ua qhov kaaj lug rua koj pum kev, hab luas yuav pum nwg tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab sau koj.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav lug rua huv koj txujkev kaaj, hab tej vaajntxwv yuav lug rua huv tug dluab tshaav ntuj kws nyavnyuas tawm nub tshab.

Ca le tsaa qhovmuag saib puagncig koj, hab saib tej kws taabtom tshwmsim lug: koj tsaav tuabneeg taabtom sis sau ua ke yuav rov lug tsev! koj cov tub yuav taug kev dleb rov lug; Luas yuav puag koj cov ntxhais ib yaam le puag mivnyuas lug.

Thaus koj pum tej nuav, koj yuav zoo sab kawg le, koj lub sab yuav tshee nyo hab zoo sab kawg nkaus. Puab yuav nqaa lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej nyaj lug rua koj; tej nyaj hab txhua yaam hlaa havtxwv lug cuag koj.

Yuav muaj ntau paab ntxhuav lug tim tebchaws Midias hab tebchaws Efas lug nyob puv nkaus huv koj lub tebchaws. Cov nxhuav ntawd yuav thauj kub hab tshuaj tsw qaab huv tebchaws Senpas tuaj rua koj. Tuabneeg yuav pav txug txujxuv zoo kws tug TSWV tau ua lawm rua suavdlawg noog.

Luas yuav coj cov tuabneeg Kedas hab cov tuabneeg Nenpayaus tej yaaj tuaj rua koj tua ua khoom fij, hab muab hlawv rua sau lub thaaj kuas hum tug TSWV sab. Tug TSWV yuav ua kuas nwg lub Tuamtsev muaj koob meej dlua qub.
Cov nkoj kws txawj yaa ib yaam le tej fuab hab txawj yaa ib yaam le tej nquab kws yaa lug rua huv zeg ntawd yog cov twg?

Cov nkoj ntawd tuaj ntawm tej tebchaws kws nyob dleb tuaj, yog xaa Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg lug tsev. Puab thauj nyaj hab kub lug pub rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv kuas tau koob meej. Vaajtswv ua kuas ib tsoom tebchaws fwm nwg tsaav tuabneeg.

Tug TSWV has rua Yeluxalees has tas, “Cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws yuav puab koj tej ntsaa yeej, hab puab cov vaajntxwv yuav ua koj cov tubkhai; vim kuv chim kuv txhaj rau txim rua koj, tabsis vim kuv taabncuab koj, kuv txhaj hlub koj.
Koj tej roojvaag yuav qheb taag nub taag mo; kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajntxwv txhaj tau kev coj puab tej nyaj tuaj rua koj.
Tsaav tuabneeg twg lossis lub tebchaws twg kws tsi kaam ua koj tubkhai, yuav raug kev puamtsuaj; puab tej tebchaws yuav raug muab tso tseg nyob qhuav nkuag ca.

“Lenpanoos lub koob meej yuav lug rua koj, nwg tej ntoo thuv, ntoo npeb hab ntoo cab yuav raug txav lug txhim khu kuv lub tuamtsev kuas zoo nkauj, hab kuv yuav ua kuas kuv lub nroog Yeluxalees ci ntsaa ab.

Cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom koj, puab tej tub yuav tuaj pe koj, hab cov tuabneeg kws saib tsi taug koj, yuav tuaj txhus caug ntawm koj xubndlag pe koj. Puab yuav hu koj has tas, ‘Tug TSWV lub Nroog,’ hab hu has tas, ‘Xi-oos yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv lub Nroog.’

“Luas yuav tsi ntxub koj lossis tso koj tseg ua lub nroog kws nyob lwj sab hab qhuav nkuag ca ib zag le lawm. Kuv yuav ua kuas koj vaammeej hab zoo nkauj. Koj yuav yog qhov chaw kws tuabneeg nyob kaaj sab lug moog ibtxhis.

Txhua tsaav tuabneeg hab tej vaajntxwv yuav yug koj ib yaam le leej nam pub mig rua nwg tug mivnyuas, koj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws cawm koj dlim; hab kuv yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus paab koj dlim.

“Kuv yuav muab kub lug hloov tooj lab, muab nyaj hab tooj lab lug hloov hlau hab ntoo; hab yuav muab hlau lug hloov pobzeb rua koj. Koj tej numtswv yuav tsi quab yuam koj ntxiv lawm, kuv yuav kuas puab kaav ncaaj nceeg hab kuas muaj kev thaajyeeb.

Tuabneeg yuav tsi nov tej suab sis ntaus sis tua nyob huv koj lub tebchaws; koj lub tebchaws yuav tsi raug kev puamtsuaj ntxiv lawm. Tabsis kuv yuav tiv thaiv koj ib yaam le tug ntsaa yeej, koj yuav qhuas kuv, rua qhov kuv tub paab koj dlim lawm.

“Nruab nub lub nub yuav tsi ci rua koj lossis mo ntuj lub hli yuav tsi ci rua koj lawm; tabsis kuv kws yog koj tug TSWV yuav ci ntsaa ab kaaj nrig rua koj moog ibtxhis, kuv tug tshwjchim yuav ci ntsaa ab rua sau koj.
Koj lub nub yuav tsi poob qho, hab koj lub hli yuav tsi tsaus ntxiv lawm. Vim tug TSWV yuav ua lub teeb ci rua koj pum kev moog ibtxhis, hab koj tej kev nyuaj sab tub yuav xaus.
Koj tsaav tuabneeg yuav ua ncaaj, puab yuav tau lub tebchaws lug ua puab tug moog ibtxhis. Kuv tsim puab, kuv cog puab kuas puab qha kuv lub fwjchim rua suavdlawg.
Tsev tuabneeg kws tsawg yuav dlhau moog ua ib xeem, hab xeem kws tsawg yuav dlhau moog ua ib tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim. Kuv yog tug TSWV, kuv yuav ua kuas tej nuav muaj lug sai sai ntaag!”

Tug TSWV kws kaav txhua yaam tug ntsujplig lug kaav kuv lub sab, rua qhov tug TSWV tau xaiv kuv coj txujmoo zoo moog qha rua cov tuabneeg pluag, hab moog nplig cov tuabneeg kws muaj kev lwj sab, qha txujkev dlim rua cov kws raug luas nteg, hab qha kev thaajyeeb rua cov tuabneeg raug txim.

Nwg khaiv kuv moog qha kuas suavdlawg paub has tas tub txug lub sijhawm kws tug TSWV yuav cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab nwg ntaus yeej puab cov yeebncuab lawm. Nwg khaiv kuv moog nplig txhua tug kws muaj kev quaj ntsuag

hab muab kev zoo sab pauj kev quaj ntsuag, rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Xi-oos, muab kev zoo sab hab kev kaaj sab pauj kev lwj sab, muab zaaj nkauj kws hu qhuas tug TSWV pauj kev txomnyem nyuaj sab. Puab yuav zoo ib yaam le tsob ntoo kws tug TSWV cog tseg. Puab yuav ua ncaaj ua nceeg, mas suavdlawg yuav qhuas Vaajtswv, vim tej num zoo kws nwg tau ua.
Puab yuav rov txhim khu tej qub nroog kws puamtsuaj taag lawm, hab rov khu tej chaw kws muab tso tseg tau ntau tam dlhau lug lawm dlua tshab.
Cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws yuav yug mej tej tsaj, laij mej tej teb hab tu mej tej vaaj txiv maab;

luas yuav hu mej has tas yog tug TSWV cov povthawj, hab hu mej has tas yog cov kws tuav Vaajtswv teg num. Mej yuav tau txhua tsaav tuabneeg tej nyaj, hab mej yuav khaav ntxhas rua luas tej nyaj kws mej tau lug ntawd.
Mej txujkev txaajmuag hab kev poob ntsejmuag tub dlhau lawm. Mej yuav tau nyob huv mej lub tebchaws. Mej yuav tau nyaj hab txhua tsaav yaam ib npaug ntxiv; hab mej yuav zoo sab moog ibtxhis le.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Vim kuv nyam txujkev ncaaj nceeg, kuv ntxub txujkev ua tubsaab hab ua kev txhum kawg le. Vim kuv yog tug kws ncaaj nceeg kuv yuav muab nqe zug rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, hab kuv yuav coglug rua puab moog ibtxhis le.
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg yuav tau koob meej ntawm ib tsoom tebchaws, txhua tug kws pum puab yuav paub has tas puab yog tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv foom koob moov rua lawm.”

Yeluxalees zoo sab heev rua tej kws tug TSWV tau ua lawm. Nwg zoo le tug nkauj nyaab hab nraug vauv kws naav tau cev tsoog moog rua huv rooj tshoob. Vaajtswv yuav muab kev cawm dlim hab kev muaj yeej rua nwg naav.
Ib yaam le tej noob qoob kws muab tseb lawm, yeej yuav tuaj taug kaug. Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam yuav cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav qhuas tug TSWV.

Vim Xi-oos, kuv yuav tsi nyob tuabywv; hab vim lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuv yuav tsi nyob ntsag tu moog txug thaus nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg ci le dluab nub thaus sawv ntxuv, hab nwg txujkev cawm dlim ci le teg tsau thaus tsaus ntuj.
Yeluxalees, txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav pum koj txujkev muaj yeej, hab txhua tug vaajntxwv yuav pum koj tau koob meej, hab luas yuav hu koj lub npe tshab kws tug TSWV muab rua koj.
Koj yuav yog lub mom kub kws zoo nkauj heev ntawm tug TSWV txhais teg, hab yog lub mom vaajntxwv kws nyob ntawm koj tug Vaajtswv lub xibteg.

Luas yuav tsi hu koj has tas, “Raug tso povtseg,” hab koj lub tebchaws yuav tsi raug muab tso tseg nyob qhuav nkuag ca. luas yuav hu koj has tas, “Kuv txujkev zoo sab nyob huv nwg,” hab yuav hu koj lub tebchaws has tas, “Sis yuav zoo sab,” vim tug TSWV txujkev zoo sab nyob huv koj, mas koj yuav zoo le leej txiv rua lub tebchaws.

Ib tug tub hluas yuav ib tug nkaujxwb ua quaspuj le caag, mas tug kws tsim koj yuav koj ib yaam le ntawd, tug nraug vauv txaus sab rua nwg tug quaspuj le caag, mas koj tug Vaajtswv txaus sab rua koj npaum le ntawd ntaag.

Yeluxalees, kuv ca cov tuabneeg faajxwm nyob sau koj tej ntsaa yeej, tsi has nruab nub hab mo ntuj, puab has tsi tseg rua tug TSWV, kuas ncu ntsoov nwg tej lug cog tseg, hab tsi pub kuas tug TSWV tso puab tseg ib zag le.
Puab yuav tsi pub tug TSWV moog su txug thaus nwg txhim khu lub nroog Yeluxalees tav, hab ua kuas tau lub nroog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg qhuas.

Tug TSWV tau coglug tseg hab yuav ua kuas tav lawv le nwg has: “Kuv yuav tsi pub mov rua mej coj moog yug mej cov yeebncuab ntxiv lawm, hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws yuav tsi haus tej cawv txiv maab kws mej ua tau.

Tabsis koj yog tug cog hab yog tug sau tej qoobloo ntawd; koj yuav tau noj tej ncuav ntawd hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug. Koj yog tug npaaj hab sau tej txiv maab lug ua ke, koj yuav tau tej txiv maab ntawd hab cawv txiv maab lug haus nyob huv kuv lub tuamtsev.”

Cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, mej ca le moog kuas dlhau plawg cov roojvaag, rhawv kev rua cov pejxeem taug; ca le ncaws txuj nam kev luj, khaws tej pobzeb huv plawv kev povtseg, hab tsaa chij rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg pum.

Tug TSWV tshaajtawm rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg has tas, “Mej ca le qha rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, ‘Tsaa qhovmuag saib, mej txujkev cawm dlim tub lug lawm lauj!’ Nwg coj nqe zug lug rua cov tuabneeg kws nwg tub cawm dlim lawm.”

Luas yuav hu mej has tas, “Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg kws dlawbhuv, tsaav Tuabneeg kws Vaajtswv Cawm dlim.” Luas yuav hu lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, “Lub Nroog kws Vaajtswv hlub,” hab “Yog Lub Nroog Kws Vaajtswv Tsi Muab Tso Tseg le.”

“Tug kws tuaj huv lub nroog Npauxelas kws nyob huv tebchaws Edoos tuaj yog leejtwg? Tug kws naav cev rig tsho lab kws taug kev khov kho tuaj ntawd yog leejtwg?” Tub yog tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim cawm tau tuabneeg dlim, taabtom tuaj qha nwg txujkev muaj yeej lawm.
“Vim le caag tug TSWV cev rig tsho txhaj lab zoo le tug txivneej kws tsuj txiv maab ua cawv cev rig tsho?”

Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Kuv muab txhua tsaav tuabneeg tsuj ib yaam le tsuj txiv maab, mas tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj paab kuv le. Kuv chim kuv txhaj tsuj puab, hab puab tej ntshaav txaws lu kuv cev rig tsho taag.
Tub txug lub sijhawm kws kuv cawm kuv tsaav tuabneeg; hab rau txim rua puab cov yeebncuab lawm.
Kuv tsaa qhovmuag saib puagncig, tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj paab kuv, mas kuv xaav tsi thoob le. Tabsis vim kuv txujkev chim, ua rua kuv muaj zug heev, kuv txhaj kovyeej.
Vim kuv txujkev chim, kuv txhaj muab txhua tsaav tuabneeg lug tsuj paim pis txua. Kuv muab puab cov ntshaav laub rua huv aav.”

Kuv yog Yaxayas, kuv qha tug TSWV txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg; kuv qhuas nwg vim tej kws nwg tau ua rua peb taag lug lawm. Nwg foom koob moov nplua mag rua cov Yixalayees, rua qhov nwg muaj txujkev hlub moog ibtxhis.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Puab yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg; puab yuav tsi dlaag kuv ib zag le.” Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj cawm puab

kuas puab dlim ntawm puab tej kev txomnyem. Tub yog tug TSWV tso nwg tug timtswv lug cawm puab ntaag. Vim nwg txujkev hlub hab kev ua sab ntev, nwg txhaj tso puab dlim. Nwg yeej ibtxwm tsomkwm puab thaus u lug,
tabsis puab ntxeev sab rua nwg hab ua rua nwg tug ntsujplig dlawbhuv tu sab; yog le ntawd nwg txhaj ua yeebncuab rua puab hab tawmtsaam puab.

Tabsis puab  ncu txug txheej thaus u, tam kws tug TSWV tug tubkhai Mauxes nyob, puab txhaj nug has tas, “Nwgnuav tug TSWV kws cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg cov thawjcoj kws hlaa havtxwv lug nyob qhov twg? Tug TSWV kws pub nwg tug ntsujplig rua Mauxes nyob qhov twg?

Tug TSWV kws has kuas Mauxes ua tej txujci tseemceeb qha nwg lub fwjchim rua suavdlawg pum, nwg muab havtxwv faib rua ob saab, ua kev rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg taug lug, kuas nwg tau ntsejmuag moog ibtxhis nyob twg lawm?”
Vim tug TSWV coj puab kev lug, puab kutaw muab nplua ib yaam le tej neeg qus, hab puab tsi qaug le.
Tug TSWV coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg moog su ib yaam le luas coj tej tsaj moog rua lub haav kws muaj zaub mog nyoos. Nwg coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg kev, nwg lub npe txhaj muaj koob meej.

Tug TSWV, thov tsaa qhovmuag sau ntuj saib tuaj rua peb, sau ntuj yog koj qhov chaw nyob dlawbhuv kws muaj koj tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab. Koj txujkev hlub hab mob sab rua peb nyob qhov twg lawm? Koj tsi xaam muaj peb le lawm los? Tug TSWV, thov koj tsi xob muab peb tso tseg.

Tug TSWV, koj txhaj yog peb txiv. Txawm yog Anplahaas hab Yakhauj obtug yog peb yawmkoob los obtug yeej tsi paub txug peb le. Tabsis tug TSWV, tsuas yog koj tuab leeg kws yog peb txiv, koj txhaj yog tug kws ibtxwm paab peb dlim xwb.
Vim le caag koj ca peb yuam kev ua tsi lawv le koj txujkev lawm? Vim le caag koj ca peb tawv ncauj ua luaj, peb txhaj tso koj tseg lawm? Thov tig lug saib koj cov tubkhai hab koj tsaav tuabneeg.
Peb yog koj tsaav tuabneeg kws dlawbhuv, peb raug yeebncuab lawv tawm moog ib ntus hab peb cov yeebncuab muab koj lub chaw kws dlawbhuv ua puamtsuaj taag.
Koj ua rua peb ib yaam le koj yeej tsi tau kaav peb dlua, hab ib yaam le peb tsi yog koj tsaav tuabneeg le ntaag.
Tug TSWV, ua caag koj tsi qheb hlo rooj ntug hab nqeg lug, kuas tej hauv roob txhaj yuav pum koj hab ntshai ua zug koog?

Tej roob yuav tshee ua zug kais ib yaam le dlej npau huv lub laujkaub kws rhaub huv qhovcub. Thov koj lug qha koj lub fwjchim rua koj cov yeebncuab pum, hab ua rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg ntshai tshee nyo taabmeeg ntawm koj xubndlag.
Muaj ib zag koj tau lug ua tej yaam kws peb ntshai kawg le rua peb pum, peb yeej tsi tau xaav txug has tas yuav muaj le ntawd; tej toj roob hauv peg ua zug koog thaus tej ntawd pum koj.
Txij thaus u lug yeej tsi tau muaj leejtwg pum lossis nov ib tug Vaajtswv kws zoo le koj, leejtwg ua tej num luj npaum le nuav paab txhua tug kws ca sab rua nwg.

Koj txais yuav txhua tug kws txaus sab ua tuabneeg ncaaj, cov ntawd yog cov tuabneeg kws ncu ntsoov ua lub neej lawv le koj lub sab nyam. Koj tub chim rua peb lawm, tabsis peb tseem ua txhum ntxiv hab txawm yog thaus u koj tub chim rua peb npaum le ntawd los peb pheej ua txhum tsi tseg le.

Peb txhua tug puavleej tau ua txhum huv tuabsi; txawm yog tej num zoo kws peb ua los puavleej qas zoo ib yaam le txuj phuam kws tsi tau muab ntxhua. Tub yog vim peb tej kev txhum, peb txhaj zoo ib yaam le tej nplooj qhua kws cua muab ntsawj yaa taag lawm.
Tsi muaj leejtwg tig lug thov koj; tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj thov koj paab le. Tub yog vim peb tej kev txhum koj txhaj tsiv nkaum peb hab muab peb tso tseg lawm.
Tabsis tug TSWV, koj yeej yog peb leej txiv. Peb zoo le cov aav nplaum, hab koj yog tug puab peb.
Yog le ntawd tug TSWV, thov koj tsi xob chim rua peb, hab tsi xob cim ntsoov peb tej kev txhum moog ibtxhis. Vim peb yog koj tsaav tuabneeg; thov koj hlub peb.
Koj tej nroog tseemceeb raug pemsij ua suabpuam taag; txawm yog lub nroog Yeluxalees los raug luas muab tsoo puag taag, tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob huv lawm.

Lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv hab zoo nkauj yog qhov chaw kws peb cov yawmkoob tuaj qhuas koj, tub raug suavtawg kub taag hab txhua thaaj chaw kws peb txaus sab rua puavleej raug puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Tug TSWV, koj tsi quavntsej tej nuav los? Koj txawm tsi ua ib yaam dlaabtsi le ntaag los? Koj yuav ca peb tsau rawv txujkev txomnyem kuas peb tiv tsi taug le los?

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv tog rawv yuav teb kuv tsaav tuabneeg tej lug thov, tabsis puab tsi thov kuv le. Kuv tog rawv puab lug cuag kuv, tabsis puab tsi kaam lug le hab. Txawm yog kuv has tas, ‘Kuv nyob ntawm nuav yuav paab mej’ los puab tsi kaam thov kuv le.
Kuv naj nub tog ntsoov kuv cov tuabneeg kws muaj lub sab tawv, tabsis puab pheej moog ua txhum lawv le puab lub sab nyam.
Puab tsi paub txaajmuag, puab txhaj ua kuas kuv chim. Puab muab khoom moog fij rua dlaab huv puab tej vaaj tseemceeb  hab hlawv tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua sau tej thaaj txi dlaab.
Mo ntuj puab nkaag moog rua huv tej qhov tsua hab tej qhov ntxaa, moog saablaaj rua cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm tej plig. Puab noj nqaj npuas hab haus tej kua nqaj kws muab fij rua dlaab lawm.

Hab puab tseem has rua luas has tas, ‘Txaav dleb ntawm peb, vim peb huv dlua mej.’ Cov kws has le nuav, kuv ntxub kawg le. Kuv txujkev chim raug puab, mas zoo ib yaam le lub cubtawg kws cig tsi paub tuag.
“Tub muaj lug sau tseg lawm has tas, kuv yuav tsi zaam txim rua puab le, tabsis kuv yuav ua pauj rua puab,

kuv yuav rau txim rua puab tej kev txhum hab puab cov yawmkoob tej kev txhum huv tuabsi, rua qhov puab tau moog hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua sau tej roob rhuav kuv ntsejmuag. Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj yuav rau txim kuas txaus nkaus rua tej kev phem kws puab ua lug lawm.” Tug TSWV yog tug has le ntawd.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Tsi muaj ib tug twg muab tej txiv maab zoo ua kuas puamtsuaj le; tabsis tsuas yog muab tej txiv maab ntawd lug ua cawv haus xwb. Ib yaam le ntawd, kuv yuav tsi ua rua puab raug kev puamtsuaj, vim puab yog kuv cov tubkhai kws ua kuv teg num.

Kuv yuav foom moov zoo rua cov Yixalayees kws yog xeem Yudas, mas puab caajceg yuav tau kuv lub tebchaws kws muaj roob muaj haav lug ua puab tug. Cov tuabneeg kws kuv xaiv lug ua kuv cov tubkhai yuav tau nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.
Puab yuav pehawm kuv hab yuav coj puab tej yaaj tej nyuj moog noj zaub huv lub taj Saloos kws nyob saab nubpoob hab huv lub Haav Covnyom kws nyob saab nubtuaj.
“Tabsis mej cov kws tau tso kuv tseg, mej tsi ncu txug kuv lub Roob Xi-oos kws dlawbhuv,  mej teeb thaaj teev tug mlom Nkas, hab tug mlom Menis kws yog cov vaajtswv ntawm txuj moov zoo hab moov phem.
Mej yuav tau qhov phem, mej yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag, vim thaus kuv hu, mej tsi teb hab thaus kuv has mej tsi noog. Mej too hauv li moog ua kev phem, vim mej tsi noog kuv lug.
Kuv has rua mej has tas, cov tubkhai kws fwm kuv hab noog kuv lug, yuav muaj noj muaj haus nplua mag, tabsis mej yuav tshaib nqhes. Kuv cov tubkhai yuav zoo sab heev, tabsis mej yuav poob ntsejmuag.
Kuv cov tubkhai yuav hu nkauj zoo sab, tabsis mej yuav quaj lwj sab ntsuav.

Cov tuabneeg kws kuv xaiv tseg lawm, yuav tuav mej lub npe foom tsi zoo, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv yuav muab mej tua povtseg; tabsis kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg kws noog kuv lug tis dlua npe tshab.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav thov koob moov, yuavtsum thov ntawm Vaajtswv tug kws muaj kev ncaaj nceeg. Yog leejtwg yuav coglug, yuavtsum tuav Vaajtswv tug kws muaj kev ncaaj nceeg lub npe cog. Mas mej txhaj tsi ncu txug tej kev txomnyem kws mej raug lug lawm.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav tsim dlua lub ntuj tshab hab lub nplajteb tshab, mej yuav tsi ncu txug tej kws tub muaj taag lug lawm.
Mej ca le zoo sab rua tej kws kuv tsim dlua tshab ntawd moog ibtxhis. Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tshab kws kuv tsim yuav muaj kev zoo sab hab nyob kaaj sab lug.
Kuv yuav zoo sab rua lub nroog Yeluxalees hab txaus sab kawg nkaus rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg; yuav tsi nov suab quaj suab nyav nyob huv lub nroog ntawd ib zag ntxiv le lawm.

Nyob huv lub nroog ntawd cov mivyuas mog yuav tsi muaj kev pluj kev tuag, hab txhua tug tuabneeg yuav muaj sa nyob ntev. Cov tuabneeg kws muaj noobnyoog ib puas xyoo los tseem zoo le tug hluas. Yog leejtwg tuag ua ntej ntawd, ces yog kuv rau txim rua nwg xwb.

Cov tuabneeg ua tsev, yuav tau nyob huv tej tsev ntawd, tsi muaj lwm tug tau nyob. Puab yuav cog txiv maab hab yuav tau haus tej cawv txiv maab ntawd, tsi yog lwm tug yuav tau haus. Kuv tsaav tuabneeg yuav muaj noobnyoog nyob ntev ib yaam le tej ntoo. Puab yuav zoo sab rua txhua yaam kws puab txhais teg ua tau lug.
Txhua yaam kws puab ua yeej yuav tav, hab puab tej mivnyuas yuav tsi raug kev puamtsuaj. Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua puab hab puab cov xeebntxwv ib tam dlhau ib tam moog ibtxhis le.
Thaus puab tseem thov kuv tsi tau xaus, kuv tub teb puab lawm.

Maa hab mivnyuas yaaj yuav nrhav noj ua ke, tsuv ntxhuav yuav noj quavnyaab ib yaam le nyuj noj, tuabneeg hab tsaj yuav tsi ntshai naab ntxiv lawm. Sau kuv lub Roob Xi-oos kws dlawbhuv,  yuav tsi muaj tej xwm phem dlaabtsi lawm.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Ntuj ceebtsheej yog kuv lub zwmtxwv, nplajteb yog kuv lub chaw tag taw. Mej yuav ua lub tsev zoo le caag rua kuv nyob, hab qhov chaw kws kuv nyob yuav zoo le caag?

Kuv yog tug kws tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb nuav taagnrho huv tuabsi! Kuv txaus sab heev rua cov tuabneeg kws txu fwjchim, cov tuabneeg kws hloov dlua sab tshab, cov tuabneeg kws fwm kuv hab noog kuv lug.

“Tuabneeg ua lawv le puab lub sab nyam xwb. Puab tua ib tug txiv nyuj hab tua ib tug tuabneeg hlawv fij los puab suav has tas zoo ib yaam; puab tua ib tug mivnyuas yaaj hab muab ib tug dlev luv cejdlaab hlawv fij los puab suav has tas zoo ib yaam; puab muab nplej hab ntshaav npua fij los puab suav has tas zoo ib yaam; puab hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab hab pe mlom los puab suav has tas zoo ib yaam. Puab nyam ua kev phem kev qas xwb.

Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav tso tej sub tawg sub ntshaa kws puab ntshai lug raug puab, rua qhov thaus kuv hu tsi muaj leejtwg teb, thaus kuv has tsi muaj leejtwg noog. Puab txhobtxwm tsi noog kuv lug hab moog ua phem nkaus xwb.”

Mej cov kws ntshai hab fwm tug TSWV, ca le noog nwg tej lug nuav: “Rua qhov mej muab sab npuab kuv, mej cov tuabneeg muaj qee leej txhaj le ntxub mej hab tsi kaam nrug mej sis raug zoo. Puab thuam mej has tas, ‘Ca tug TSWV ua nwg tej txujci rua mej pum hab cawm kuas mej dlim, peb xaav pum mej txujkev zoo sab kawg le.’ Tabsis puab yuav poob ntsejmuag!
Ua tuab zoo noog! Tej suab nrov ntsoog qeeg huv nroog, hab lub suab kws nrov huv lub Tuamtsev tuaj, tub yog tug TSWV rau txim rua nwg cov yeebncuab ntaag!
“Kuv lub nroog kws dlawbhuv zoo ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws yug tau mivnyuas sai heev, tsi nov mob plaab le tub yug tau nwg tug tub lawm.

Puas muaj leejtwg nov lossis tau pum dlua ib zag le? Puas muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg twg kws tuab nub xwb, txawm yuav ca le sawv ua tau ib lub tebchaws? Lub nroog Xi-oos yuav fuamvaam sai ua ib tsaav tuabneeg, nwg yuav tsi tau tiv kev txomnyem ntxiv lawm.
Mej tsi xob xaav has tas kuv coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg lug txug lub caij yug puab los kuv tseem tsi tau pub yug.” Tug TSWV yog tug kws has tej lug nuav ntaag.
Mej cov kws nyam lub nroog Yeluxalees, ca le nrug lub nroog Yeluxalees zoo sab, hab txaus sab rua nwg! Mej cov kws quaj ntsuag rua lub nroog Yeluxalees, mej ca le nrug nwg zoo sab!
Mej yuav zoo sab rua lub nroog Yeluxalees txujkev vaammeej, ib yaam le tug mivnyuas kws txaus sab tau noj nwg nam lub mig.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav coj kev vaammeej lug rua mej moog ibtxhis, txhua tsaav tuabneeg tej nyaj yuav ndlwg laub lug lug rua mej ib yaam le tug dlej ndlwg tsi paub nqhuab le. Mej yuav zoo le tug mivnyuas kws leej nam puag rawv huv xubndlag noj mig, mas nwg hlub kawg le.
Kuv yuav nplig mej sab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees ib yaam le leej nam nplig nwg cov mivnyuas sab.

Thaus mej pum tej xwm nuav tshwmsim lug, mej yuav zoo sab; qhov ntawd yuav ua rua mej muaj zug hab noj qaab nyob zoo. Ces mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws paab cov tuabneeg noog kuv lug, hab kuv chim rua kuv cov yeebncuab.”
Tug TSWV yuav nrug nplaim tawg ua ke lug. Nwg yuav caij rawv cua dlaaj cua dlub lug, hab nwg yuav rau txim rua tug kws ua rua nwg chim.
Tug TSWV yuav tso suavtawg hab ntaaj lug rau txim rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg nyob huv nplajteb kws nwg pum has tas ua txhum, mas tej tuabneeg yuav raug tua tuag coob kawg le.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws ua kevcai ntxuav kuas puab huv moog pe dlaab rua huv tej vaaj txi dlaab,  noj nqaj npuas, noj tsuag, hab noj tej zaub mov kws kuv txwv tsi pub noj, yuav raug kev puamtsuaj taag.
Kuv yeej paub  tej num kws puab ua, hab tej kws puab lub sab xaav. Kuv yuav sau txhua tsaav tuabneeg lug ua ke.  Thaus puab lug txhij lawm, puab yuav pum kuv lub fwjchim,

hab paub has tas kuv yog tug kws txav txim rua puab. “Tabsis kuv yuav tseg qee leej nyob hab khaiv puab moog qha txhua tsaav tuabneeg hab tej tebchaws dleb dleb kws tsi tau nov kuv lub npe hab tsi tau pum dlua kuv lub fwjchim, hab moog rua tim tebchaws Xapees, tebchaws Linpias  hab tebchaws Lidias kws muaj cov tuabneeg txawj tua neevnti, hab huv tebchaws Thunpas hab peg tebchaws Kilis. Puab yuav moog qha kuv lub fwjchim kws luj rua huv cov tebchaws ntawd.

Puab yuav coj mej cov kwvtij tawm huv txhua lub tebchaws rov lug rua kuv. Puab yuav coj mej cov kwvtij caij neeg, caij zaag, caij ntxhuav, caij tsheb neeg ua rog hab caij tsheb nyuj lug rua ntawm kuv lub roob dlawbhuv,  ib yaam le cov Yixalayees muab moov nplej ntim rua huv tej taig phab kws ntxuav huv lawm, hab yuav coj moog fij rua huv lub Tuamtsev.
Kuv yuav tsaa puab qee leej ua povthawj hab ua cov Levis, tug TSWV has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv lub fwjchim yuav tuav lub ntuj tshab hab lub nplajteb tshab kuas nyob ruaj, mas mej caajceg hab mej lub npe yuav nyob ruaj khov ib yaam le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Txhua nub Hli Xab hab nub Xanpataus, mas txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav tuaj pehawm kuv huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav.

Thaus puab tawm moog, puab yuav pum cov tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua kuv tej cev tuag. Cov kaas kws noj puab tej cev yuav tsi tuag, hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tua tau tej suavtawg kws kub puab ntawd le. Tej cev tuag ntawd yuav qas thoob nplajteb.”
